story:
The crowdfunding campaign has ended, register here to be first to know when the pre-sale starts!







  


    



















Refund FAQ -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Q: Why isn’t Indiegogo handling the refund, as in other crowdfunding campaigns I’ve backed?
A: Opposite to Kickstarter, Indiegogo doesn’t offer any portal for refunding Contributors. The best option they recommended was using PayPal for this. We went one step further and added the possibility to get the refund over a bank transfer in the EU (SEPA) and US, as that circumvents the transaction fees of PayPal.

Q: I haven't received any survey yet! When and where will I get it?
A: We'll be sending out the refund-survey just after we post this update to the email address with which you log in to your Indiegogo account. Anyhow, it is possible that it may have been caught by the SPAM filter, so please do look in there. Look for the email address: "noreply@protonet.info via surveymonkey.com" (member@surveymonkey.com)

Q: I don't have a PayPal account, how can I receive the funds?
A: You can create a new PayPal Account for free, and you don't need to create one before filling out the refund-request survey. Alternatively, as a EU- (SEPA) or US-Based contributor you'll have the choice to get the funds over a bank transfer. We don't expect any transaction charges within these economic regions.

Q: Do I need to do anything when I receive the PayPal payment?
A: YES, ACTION NEEDED! You'll have 30 days to accept the payment, so that the funds get allocated to your PayPal account. The funds will be transferred back to us if you don't take action within 30 days after you receive the payPal transfer notification. In case that happens, we'll send you an email to clarify the situation.

Q: How long will it take until all funds have been refunded?
A: We will only refund contributors, who fill out the survey, as we don't want to blindly send funds over PayPal without knowing the contributor's payment preference.

Q: Can I initiate a chargeback with my credit card provider or a dispute in PayPal to get the funds back?
A: Please don't try that, as it would only complicate the process. That said, credit card chargebacks can only be initiated 120 days after the transaction. PayPal transactions can only be disputed 45 days after the funds have been collected. We expect some frustration in this aspect, but please trust us.

Q: Is there a way I can get a bank transfer, and avoid the PayPal acceptance fees?
A: As a EU- (SEPA) or US-Based contributor you'll have the choice to get the funds over a bank transfer. We don't expect any transaction charges within these economic regions. If you're based anywhere else in the world, but you do have a EU-(SEPA) or US-based bank account, please send us a direct message over Indiegogo. Simply click on “ask a question” when you scroll up, just next to my profile picture on the campaign page. We'll get back to you in no time.

Q: What happens if a contributor doesn't answer the refund-request survey?
A: We'll send out the survey to all contributors just after announcing the refund. After that we will send weekly reminders to all contributors, who haven't filled out the refund-request. After four reminders, we'll send out the funds over PayPal to the contributor's Indiegogo email address. Contributors then have 30 days to accept the PayPal payment. If the contributor also fails to accept the payment within the 30 days, the funds will be automatically transferred back to our PayPal account. Contributors who fail to get the refund within our process can get in touch with us through a direct message over Indiegogo. Simply click on “ask a question” when you scroll up, just next to my profile picture on the campaign page.

Q: When will a new ZOE Campaign launch?
A: ZOE is alive and we'll keep on working on getting her to market. At this time, there is no way we can give a reliable timeline, but we will send all our current contributors an email with a special discount for when we re-launch ZOE. You can also subscribe here if you want to have ZOE-news and make sure you stay in the loop.

Q: I don't want to get a refund. I'm used to delays in crowd funding campaigns and I'd be happy to wait until you deliver some day.
A: Please accept our refund. Due to the delay, we'll be able to integrate learnings we got over this campaign. The re-launched ZOE will have different specifications and pricing.

Q: What's the partner's name?
A: We're not in liberty to communicate that, as it would reduce the future impact at the re-launch of ZOE. We know our partner has very good reasons to postpone his cooperation with us and we respect that.

Q: I contributed multiple times, will I receive the funds in multiple transactions?
A: We will consolidate the funds of contributors who contributed multiple times into one transaction.

Q: Can you please share the security in place to protect my information?
A: We’ve taken extra cautionary measures, so that our survey can’t be hacked. Our company is strong in the data security aspect of the internet, and you can trust we know this, as it’s one of our core competences. We will also delete all content from the refund-requests as soon as we send out the funds.

Q: Wasn't this just an interest free loan for you?
A: We spent a lot of time, money and tears on the development of ZOE, creation of the video and managing the campaign. On top of that we paid around 10% for Indiegogo and payment provider fees. So you can believe us if we say this wasn't such an awesome "loan".

Q: I already received the Protonet Business Server, what happens to me?
A: You'll receive a refund of the campaign value of the ZOE and Voicedrop perks.


Campaign FAQ ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Can I use ZOE with Insteon, Homematic, or Zigbee?

Yes, ZOE will support basic Insteon and Homematic functionality. Please keep in mind that more recent Insteon hubs don’t allow for direct communication but require us to use their cloud API. While we intend to provide both integrations with the first software release, we will prioritize timely delivery over full support. Missing functionality will be added via our software update mechanism.

A Zigbee integration will be available as an add-on after delivery. We are focusing on Z-Wave first to ensure timely delivery.

Will ZOE have a display?
No, but she can talk! – Anything else can be managed over the smartphone or browser.

Is Zoe is being integrated with Smart meters that control the power being generated by home solar power systems?
If these devices have an IP/HTTP API they can be integrated with ZOE.

How is ZOE powered? Is it by a cord you plug in to the wall or by batteries and are the drops powered the same way?
ZOE is powered by a plug, Voice Drops use a USB based power plug.

Does Zoe detect your in the room by voice or Bluetooth or how does that work?
Voice Drops detect the room your in by voice. Presence can be detected by your smartphone.

Does Zoe have a zwave chipset inside or is zwave enabled by using other controllers apis and http requests? And if it does what version on The chipset?
ZOE has a Zwave chipset inside - we haven't made a final decision on the chipset to use but we've currently aiming to use Z-wave plus.

Will she have internal storage e.g. for music?
She will have some internal storage but currently not intended to be used for music.

Does the Zoe support the European frequency of the Z-Wave protocol (868,4 Mhz)?
Yes

What about customs?
We intend to send out all perks to US- and EU-Based backers from a local distribution centre, so you don’t have to hassle with customs. Fort he rest oft he world, we’ll most probably send out the perks directly from our central distribution centre in China. Please note that you will be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region, which in the past have ranged from 0% to 20% in the US and EU countries, to as much as 200% for certain South American countries.

How do I install ZOE on a wall?
You just need to put two screws into the wall. It’s as easy as this! And especially beautiful when the power cable is hidden inside the wall.



Thank you for backing us! Please share!

story:
UPDATE

All orders before the 16th of June, will be delivered in July! Hurry up and put in your order, so you can get your apparel or bag by July.


Our Story

Tesmaraneh is the result of a dream of a Sierra Leonean who was fortunate to go to school, even though her mum never got that opportunity. Her vision was to see education as a right for all African girls instead of an opportunity. She decided to use fashion to support her dreams. Isatu and her team are now working assiduously to make this dream a reality, and they are now looking for funds to launch their first major production and first line . They are highly educated professionals in various subjects who want to make a change for local tailors and girls education in Sierra Leone, West Africa.


  • Tesmaraneh is not just another fashion start up looking to take the world by storm! We are a group of people who are trying to bring a change. A change for girls education and local tailors in Sierra Leone and Ghana
  • A social enterprise committed to use  15% of its profits to support girls education and local tailor. Tesmaraneh have already partner with a scholarship fund that is going to receive 7.5% of its benefits. So rest assured, the money that you pledge with us is not going into our pockets. 

  • Whenever you buy from Tesmaraneh, be contempt that you helped a tailor develop new skills to earn a living, you helped a girl go to school and look forward to a better future. You helped us launch our first line

  • This time it's for all of us: you, me and them! A quality design for you! An established brand for me! and a future for them! It's a win win for all of us!


What We Need & What You Get

Tesmaraneh would be a business that would respect the indigenous tailors and pay them fair wages for their work and designs. A business that would help girls attain education and skills. :

  • For starting the business and fulfilling our commitment to bring a change, Tesmaraneh needs $27,740.

  • Apart from a sense of pride & self satisfaction of doing your bit in educating girls, you get a great piece of apparel. A hand-made apparel with superior fabric that the people of Ghana have worn for centuries.

  • Of course we understand that raising $27,740 is no child's play, but rest assured, whatever amount of funds that we are able to raise, it will all go towards providing you a great apparel and funding girls education in Sierra Leone. We may not be able to sponsor education for 100 girls, but we will still strive to sponsor school for the maximum girls possible, even 5 or 10. Or even 2 girls. We will bring the change together.


The Impact

A few dollars would not bring a change to your life, but imagine What change it would bring to the life of less fortunate girls in Sierra Leone:

  • A girl somewhere in the interior part of Sierra Leone will get books to study in school.
  • A girl who had to dropout from school because of teenage pregnancy & poverty can go back to school.
  • A tailor who was oppressed now has a new life to look to, a life where they and their family can have basic needs.
  • And of course you would help us showcase the best of Sierra Leone and Ghana

Help us Get Started

After months of planning, analyzing, designing, we are finally ready to bring Tesmaraneh to you. We need your help to fund our initial Production. In return for your support, we are offering a discounted price and a special token of love from the Tesmaraneh Team.


View our collection here


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that many of you would not be able to contribute for many reasons, but that's okay. You can still help us, here's how:

  • Help us reach someone who can contribute
  • Get the word out and make some noise about Tesmaraneh
  • Use Social Media, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest to make us reach people
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Our team would be very grateful to you for your support.

#After the successful end of our crowdfunding, we will send you a Survey to inquire about your size preference. Indicate the size and we will design the perfect dress for you and ship to your location. Cheers :)

We may not be able to sponsor education for 100 girls, but we will still strive to sponsor school for the maximum girls possible, even 5 or 10. Or even 2 girls. We will bring the change together. 




   The Impact A few dollars would not bring a change to your life, but imagine What change it would bring to the life of less fortunate girls in Sierra Leone:  A girl somewhere in the interior part of Sierra Leone will get books to study in school. A girl who had to dropout from school because of teenage pregnancy & poverty can go back to school. A tailor who was oppressed now has a new life to look to, a life where they and their family can have basic needs.
And of course you would help us showcase the best of Sierra Leone and Ghana 

   Help us Get Started  After months
of planning,
analyzing, designing, we are finally
ready to bring Tesmaraneh to you. We need your
help to fund our initial Production. In return for your support, we are offering a discounted price and a special token of love from the Tesmaraneh Team.


   View our collection here


Other Ways You Can Help
 We understand that many of you would not be able to contribute for many reasons, but that's okay. You can still help us, here's how:  Help us reach someone who can contribute
Get the word out and make some noise about Tesmaraneh
Use Social Media, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest to make us reach people Use the Indiegogo share tools!   Our team would be very grateful to you for your support.#After the successful end of our crowdfunding, we will send you a Survey to inquire about your size preference. Indicate the size and we will design the perfect dress for you and ship to your location. Cheers :)

story:
HOW WAYRE BEGAN

  • It all started when a beloved pale blue dress worn all over the globe was lost in Seville, Spain After searching high & low for a replacement and three years of returns, we knew we had to create our own.
  • At wayre, we believe travel is not just a hobby, but a lifestyle. There aren’t many other things in life that bring the same freeing joy as pulling up to a new city ready to explore it or the thrill of communicating in a new language.

THE DILEMMA

  • But we also know, travel isn’t always as glamorous as we would like it to be. Packing can be a hassle with all the ‘unexpecteds’ we try to plan for. “What will we be doing? What will the weather be like? What if I‘m under-dressed?” That’s where we come in. 

OUR FIX

  • wayre has created a three-piece wardrobe that addresses the realities of travel. She's silky soft, spill-proof, stank-proof & made to be repeated.
  • She's responsibly-made and designed to go as far as you do ? No more packing anxiety, questionable outfit choices, or overweight luggage. With wayre, you'll be ready for the highly anticipated, like your tour of La Sagrada Familia, while welcoming the entirely unexpected, like that cute Italian boy.

 

 

  • Model is size medium, wearing size medium.
  • A classy, modern fit with a high neckline and open back. She's made with adjustable straps and is inner-lined at the top for our bra-less ladies. Equipped with deep pockets that... ZIP closed! And, no more stashing cash in your bra when you're headed out. Leave that to your hidden boobie pocket seamless bonded to the neckline. 

  • Model is size small, wearing size medium.
  • A mid-crop fit with clean lines and shoulder pleats keeps the shift & snap versatile and easy to pair with just about anything. Forget the annoying button, this tank snaps at the back for a seamless crew neckline. Peak-a-boo slits on each side help you catch a draft in all the right places.  Pair with The Flow Short for a perfect set up.

  • Model is size small, wearing size small.
  • Aka your Eat-Your-Way-Through-A-City & feel proud of it shorts.A high-waisted short that mends to your body with luxury comfort. Fitted with front pleats and an elasticized backing.  Keep your valuables close in the hidden hip pocket and keep your phone easily accessible (yet safe) in the side seam ZIP UP pockets. Flowy and ideal for all day wear, no matter where you are.  Pair with the Shift & Snap tank for the perfect match.

 

 

We use our business and our resources to build experiences all over the globe. Thus, we only manufacture with one of the best factories in the world, whose sole mission is to raise the sustainability bar: Everest Textile in Tainan, Taiwan. We believe our planet was made to travel and we have a responsibly to make it better.

As a small thank you, each pledge with Wayre will come with a city guide of either Barcelona, Spain, Bali, Indonesia or Melbourne, Australia. We’ve teamed up with our friends at Australian based company: Sceen'ry magazine to create some inspiration for where you will wear wayre.   

 

We are currently in production and expect your order to be shipped in December 2019!

 We believe inclusive sizing should be an industry standard. Our sizes will run from XXS - 3X. 

 

 

 

Follow along our journey via socials & spread the word about wayre!

 

Risks & Challenges

Travel is full of risks and challenges, but as travelers we choose to embrace them wholeheartedly. Similarly, the creation of wayre has been full of risks and challenges that we’ve chosen to meet with an open mind and a determination that is normally reserved for running through an airport to catch a flight.

When it comes to building a brand from the ground up, there’s no shortage of hard work to do. Manufacturing, logistics, and creative direction only begin to cover the tough decisions we’ve had to make. Luckily, we’ve had absolutely fantastic partners along the way that have helped us get to this point, and we are 1000% confident and ready to deliver wayre to you.

Our manufacturer is ready. Our shipping partners can’t wait to get started. Now it’s up to you!

story:
About

A shoe that’s comfortable, sustainable and stylish. Made to be your everyday companion for your feet

We started Coby with the mission to make a shoe that could improve your everyday life. With a long lasting relationship with Wool (our grandfather was a wool specialist) we developed a magical fabric that has incredible inner properties for our feet. Made from high-quality Merino Wool, and with our Softknit technology, we have been able to create a remarkable shoe that combines comfort, style and sustainability.

A Classic Design and our SoftKnit fabric; incredibly comfortable, moisture wicking, breathable, odor-reducing, lightweight and machine washable Merino Wool

You can wear them with or without socks

A fabric that repels water naturally

We source Merino Wool from sustainable and fair trade audited farms. We then knit the fibers in a small family-owned mill in Italy, resulting in our unique and super comfortable fabric. We have been able to develop along our Italian partners the SoftKnit technology, which has a structure resistant enough for footwear while, at the same time, add incredible properties Merino has naturally.

Full Sizes - If you typically wear a full size, we recommend the same size for the best possible fit and comfort.

Half Sizes - If you typically wear ½ sizes, we recommend sizing up for a more relaxed fit or sizing down for a snug fit.

Here's how you can measure for the right fit

With our Coby Awel Move, you'll receive our exclusive #shoesforgood bag

We have seen that finding a shoe that is remarkably comfortable, stylish and, at the same time, sustainable is not easy. That's why we are here and our core mission is to add comfort to classic designs. Our Brand ethos is to change the way people move around the world and that has been our obsession since the very beginning.

After years of material research, development and design we are now ready to upgrade our product and present it to you.

1. We designed a MVP (Minimum Viable Product) and tested the market over the last 6 months. Which resulted in validating the product-market fit, and at the same time the materials and functionality.

2. We have now gathered customer feedback and we have learned the details people really care the most.. and iterated!! We improved our fabric with our SoftKnit technology (more breathable, soft and water friendly). We are opening sole moulds, with an advanced shape design to fit everyone, and with comfort on the top

3. We rebranded (and renamed our brand); we were formerly called Awel and renamed to Coby, which will give us this update on quality, brand and image!

 

Risks and challenges

We have spent the last 2 years developing the product, the fabric and our sustainable technology and our team has been working night and day to dial in the design, production, and logistics. We have closely worked with our manufacturers to ensure that quality control is met at every step of the process and sustainability best practices are first. We have teamed up with a third party logistics to ensure that we deliver your package as smoothly as possible. We understand that no campaign comes without any challenges. We are a startup with few resources and, if there were, we will not pay any amount on duties or taxes. We promise to communicate with full transparency and work around the clock to ensure your expectations are met.

story:
Meet The Ultimate Dress Shirt

How It Works?

The hydrophobic application works by modifying the 100% Egyptian cotton fabric at a molecular level by attaching microscopic ‘whiskers’ to individual fibres which elevate liquids, causing them to bead up and roll off the fabric surface.

We apply this technology into our fabric at the fibre level and not just as a coating. It has no effect on comfort or breathability which means a longer lasting shirt.

The fabric repels liquids and stains and like the lotus flower does in nature by minimizing the adhesion of the fabric's surface. 

    How we need your help

    Our stain resistant shirts are made with some of the most advanced and most expensive fabrics on the market. Selling our shirts through traditional retailers with normal markup would require us to sell at a very high price. We wanted to democratize these technologies and launch our shirts at an affordable price.

    Crowdfunding provides an amazing platform to bring our products directly to customers at a low price that cannot be found anywhere else. All the funds we raise on Indiegogo will be injected into the manufacturing of our shirts, introducing new colors, and in the development of new groundbreaking products. A win-win for everyone!

    So please back our campaign and share this on social media. We thank you for your support and can't wait to serve you!

    Available Colors

    This shirt is available in white, blue or gingham. You will have the option to select your color and size option after choosing a perk.

    Perks

    As Featured On...

     

    Testimonials

     

    Timeline

    Size Chart

    Our model in this campaign is 184cm / 6ft and weighs 68 kgs / 149lbs and wears our shirt in a small.

    We know sizes are different depending on your country that's why we've set-up an email where you can check with our team that you're making the right choice. 

    Send us an email at info@threadsmiths.com.au with your dimensions and we can recommend you a size.

       

      Press Kit

      For PR enquiries please email info@threadsmiths.com.au or visit

      https://www.thethreadsmiths.com/a/press-kit

story:
Candle Heated Gloves heat up to 130℉ or 50℃ with our carbon fiber heating elements, are cold resistant, water resistant and touchscreen friendly. The integrated batteries provide up to 6 hours of warmth on a single charge.

The gloves are warm, comfortable and won’t restrict your movement on a cold, winter day. These cold and wind-resistant gloves are perfect for any winter activity and will always keep you looking stylish. 

We mean it, hotter than a hot tub! On the high setting, our gloves and socks can reach up to 130℉ / 50℃.  We're serious about the hot tub...

If you are going to make gloves that are adaptable to both regular city life and extreme adventures, the least you could do is make them touchscreen-friendly. Candle is just that, with the dexterous technology ensuring you can operate your mobile phones while the glove is on.

The gloves will last between 3-7 hours, depending on which of our 3 temperature settings you've selected. 

And our gloves use Li-Polymer batteries, making them light, reliable and rechargeable.

 

 

 

Candle Heated Gloves are designed to keep you comfortable and ready for whatever life throws at you, in any cold climate situation. Our gloves are made of a blend of milk silk, neoprene and lycra making them: soft, stretchy, light and water resistant.

Candle is designed to be the most functional and convenient pair of gloves you’ve ever owned. So, it’s only fitting that the gloves are machine washable. You do not have to disturb yourself about the method of washing that would preserve the lifespan of your gloves. Simply take the batteries out and throw the gloves in the machine and you are good to go.

Candle Gloves are designed to go with any outfit you decide on, so you no longer have to sacrifice fashion for function this winter!

The fabric is made from a unique blend of milk silk, neoprene, and lycra; conferring a natural resistance to rain and snow.

Single-use plastics are having a seriously adverse affect on our environment, and we believe it's our duty to do our best to eliminate any waste possible. Many people are still using single-use hand warmers to keep their hands warm in the winter, that's where our reusable heated gloves come in. Everything from the reusable carrying case, to the rechargeable batteries are meant to hold on to and use for winter season's to come. Join us in our mission of doing our part in keeping the planet as pristine as possible.

 Candle is endorsed by the United Nations™️ Association of Canada for it's environmental efforts as a certified Canadian "Green Corp".  ​

Candle's core mission is to help the world spend more time outside. Harvard Medical School conducted a study that found the average American only spends 7% of their life outside. Their study also shows the outdoors boosts vitamin D levels, makes people happier, more likely to exercise and even concentrate better.

Please use the sizing guide below to best determine your size

 

 

We could have never expected the amount of support we've had for our project and we've officially sold out of our heated gloves... but we've done our best to release a great new product to keep you warm this winter... Heated Socks

Candle Heated Socks heat up to 130℉ or 50℃ with our carbon fiber heating elements, are cold resistant, The integrated batteries provide up to 10 hours of warmth on a single charge.

The socks are 100% cotton, making them super comfortable, thick and well padded, absorbent, breathable and quick drying.

story:
Welcome to our campaign's page! You're going to witness the birth of Gnomon - the historical timepiece. We call it historical since it's inspired with the history of the time itself. Gnomon's design is based on appearance of ancient sundials and strives to integrate a well-known idea into contemporary style.

The great news are that the Gnomon watches are already produced and ready for shipping immediately after ordering! You can still get your Gnomon watches here on Indiegogo with the special price.


The Gnomon timepiece features an authentic outlook recreating Roman classic sundials and a single handed time telling system, referring to an actual gnomon which is reflected in the name of the watch. 

These timepiece and campaign both are the test of our skill and ambitions through which we want to develop a strong brand with individuality in our signature watches. Below you can learn even more interesting things about Gnomon and view spectacular photos of the first prototypes. Hope you'll like it!

 

The idea to create Gnomon was born from a passion of researching craftsmanship of watchmaking and the history of timepieces itself. Our very small but talented team was drown together by this goal and we started to work on the project in 2016.

We wanted to recreate one of the most vital and interesting ways to tell the time in design of a modern sophisticated wristwatch. We had several crucial points in mind that we wanted to incarnate in the watch - authenticity, uniqueness, high quality, reliability and a reasonable price.

Gnomon boasts several cool and unique design elements that make it a valuable addition to the wristwatch industry as well as some handicraft parts and an automatic Japanese made movement.


 

It may seems difficult to tell the time by Gnomon, but it's pretty easy! There are two layers with markings. The inner layer offers several indexes to get a full picture of the current time: full hour indexes have corresponding hour numbers and placed in a conventional way and separated by volumetric half hour indexes and small 10-minute indexes. After some practice you'll be feeling yourself comfortable in telling the time with precision even in 10-minute intervals!

The outer layer serves both as a supportive tool and as an aesthetic feature. It's divided on twelve areas with Roman numerals. Each area has starting point which indicates the beginning of an hour and numerals are equivalent to half hour markers. This way you can use the outer layer to help you in telling the time by the inner layer or try to read the time like Romans did!


 

The key feature of the first Solar Lab collection is its fresh, stylish outlook inspired with an appearance of sundials from Ancient Rome. It has only one hand which serves to tell both hours and minutes and refers to a gnomon.

Gnomon is a pointer of a sundial which casts a shadow on a dial during sunny parts of a day and telling the actual time. Our hand is the representation of a gnomon's shadow, slowly circling through the dial as it was meant in the ancient times.

We wanted to express this kind of leisure time telling, when a timepiece serves not only as an usual timekeeping tool but also a meditative accessoire which brings you to those ancient days when time hadn't been gradated evenly yet and people used to plan their time subconsciously without any haste.

While looking at Gnomon you won't be running after every second. You'll be enjoying your time and your new watch.

Gnomon bears an authentic dial mapping similar to Roman sundials with hour indexes filling the according stretching area.

Gnomon has been designed to look not only uniquely interesting and attractive, but also stylish, sophisticated and universal. It fits every wrist perfectly and suits tastes of both antique seekers and modern watch enthusiasts.


 

We're very proud that we've managed to create the timepiece which looks like the best representatives of the artisan watch industry. We've put a lot of effort creating the distinctive details and small things which make Gnomon to stand out among other watches in the same price range.  

We see Gnomon as the starting point of the journey to eradicate the barrier between expensive timepieces and independent designer project. It also has several hand made parts which makes Gnomon the truly unique companion to your wrist.

Our first collection has three models which are defined by our signature design as well as corresponding leather and coating palettes and a colour of the back lid mineral lens. The single hand is inspired by a shape of an actual sundial's gnomon.

The dial is made of an artificially worn out steel sheet and adds the unique touch to each timepiece. You can be sure that there's no similar pattern to any other Gnomon timepiece. The dial also has engraved minute and applied volumetric hour indexes and is protected by a domed sapphire coated crystal. 

The back side of the watch also has domed shape with a transparent crystal with our logo in the center. The steel part is engraved with zodiac signs matching hour areas of the dial as well month number in Julian calendar system.

 

As we've mentioned before, one of our goals was to create a timepiece which lacks cold manufacturing origin.That's why we've decided to go for handcrafted leather straps for our Gnomon timepieces.

Every strap for our watches is made by hand in Italy. It's hand cut from a thick and reliable high quality calf skin, which is soft and flexible enough for wearing with utmost comfort.

We tried a lot of different materials and sizes trying to find the optimal solution for our straps. Three different leather patterns with a vintage touch have been chosen to deliver the hand made quality without heavily affecting the final price and bearing the original and everlasting feeling of the high leatherwork craftsmanship. We're sure that your wrist will definitely be enjoying it!


 

Every Gnomon watch is the unique artisan object with a lot of distinctive features and small details in design. We put a lot of effort to develop the most appropriate shapes and construction according to our concept and offer the most comfortable format and high quality materials in our price range. 

The cases of all Gnomon watches are made of lightweight 316L stainless steel with polished or matt surface and colored PVD-coating. The back lid is also made of steel, has a transparent glass embedded in it, with different colors depending on the specific model, and offers a great view on the automatic movement. The movement is Japanese automatic with 21 jewels and the watch construction grants 5 ATM water resistance. Another remarkable thing is the unique dial with a scratched texture made by hand, which makes each mode a truly one of a kind!

Case Diameter: 43 mm 
Case Thickness: 11 mm 
Band Material: 100% genuine leather handmade in Italy
Strap buckle: 316L Stainless steel 
Band Max/Min Length: 215 mm / 165 mm 
Band Width: 20 mm tapered to 17 mm 
Total Weight: 65 gram
Case / Back case Material : 316L Stainless steel
Crystal: Sapphire Coated  
Water Resistant: 5 ATM 
Movement: Citizen Miyota 8215 Automatic (21 Jewels)


We've done everything we could to achieve the reasonable and adequate price which we're ready to offer to our backers on Indiegogo. Solar Lab watches are the high quality product with a decent part of handiwork, so we've come to the ultimate solution for the price, which is only 275 $ and is much more affordable than for similar watches in the market. Thanks to the Indiegogo's directly to customer policy you won't meet any markups and unnecessary costs.

It's our first experience in crowdfunding but we have faith in our abilities and in our manufacturer, so we don't expect any serious challenges in the production and aim to reach the shipping stage in the shortest terms possible. Please, note, that the watches are already in production, so it won't take too much time to get your Gnomon watch!

Please note that the price on Indiegogo is much lower than the future retail price. So you'll be able to save 50% ordering Gnomon now. Multiple items will result in even higher discounts! 


 

Join our social media communities to learn the freshest news faster and get cool pics of our watches directly to your feeds. And don't forget to share our posts with your friends if you like the Gnomon idea and concept! We'll be very grateful for your assistance and you still can support our campaign with a good word!

instagram.com/solarlab.co 

facebook.com/solarlab.co | share

twitter.com/solarlab_co | share

 

If you have any further questions regarding our project and campaign or want to get any additional info or HD images for press inquires, please, send us an email on info@solar-lab.co
story_txt: Welcome to our campaign's page! You're going to witness the birth of Gnomon - the historical timepiece. We call it historical since it's inspired with the history of the time itself. Gnomon's design is based on appearance of ancient sundials and strives to integrate a well-known idea into contemporary style.The great news are that the Gnomon watches are already produced and ready for shipping immediately after ordering! You can still get your Gnomon watches here on Indiegogo with the special price.The Gnomon timepiece features an authentic outlook recreating Roman classic sundials and a single handed time telling system, referring to an actual gnomon which is reflected in the name of the watch. These timepiece and campaign both are the test of our skill and ambitions through which we want to develop a strong brand with individuality in our signature watches. Below you can learn even more interesting things about Gnomon and view spectacular photos of the first prototypes. Hope you'll like it! The idea to create Gnomon was born from a passion of researching craftsmanship of watchmaking and the history of timepieces itself. Our very small but talented team was drown together by this goal and we started to work on the project in 2016.We wanted to recreate one of the most vital and interesting ways to tell the time in design of a modern sophisticated wristwatch. We had several crucial points in mind that we wanted to incarnate in the watch - authenticity, uniqueness, high quality, reliability and a reasonable price.Gnomon boasts several cool and unique design elements that make it a valuable addition to the wristwatch industry as well as some handicraft parts and an automatic Japanese made movement. It may seems difficult to tell the time by Gnomon, but it's pretty easy! There are two layers with markings. The inner layer offers several indexes to get a full picture of the current time: full hour indexes have corresponding hour numbers and placed in a conventional way and separated by volumetric half hour indexes and small 10-minute indexes. After some practice you'll be feeling yourself comfortable in telling the time with precision even in 10-minute intervals!The outer layer serves both as a supportive tool and as an aesthetic feature. It's divided on twelve areas with Roman numerals. Each area has starting point which indicates the beginning of an hour and numerals are equivalent to half hour markers. This way you can use the outer layer to help you in telling the time by the inner layer or try to read the time like Romans did! The key feature of the first Solar Lab collection is its fresh, stylish outlook inspired with an appearance of sundials from Ancient Rome. It has only one hand which serves to tell both hours and minutes and refers to a gnomon.Gnomon is a pointer of a sundial which casts a shadow on a dial during sunny parts of a day and telling the actual time. Our hand is the representation of a gnomon's shadow, slowly circling through the dial as it was meant in the ancient times.We wanted to express this kind of leisure time telling, when a timepiece serves not only as an usual timekeeping tool but also a meditative accessoire which brings you to those ancient days when time hadn't been gradated evenly yet and people used to plan their time subconsciously without any haste.While looking at Gnomon you won't be running after every second. You'll be enjoying your time and your new watch.Gnomon bears an authentic dial mapping similar to Roman sundials with hour indexes filling the according stretching area.Gnomon has been designed to look not only uniquely interesting and attractive, but also stylish, sophisticated and universal. It fits every wrist perfectly and suits tastes of both antique seekers and modern watch enthusiasts. We're very proud that we've managed to create the timepiece which looks like the best representatives of the artisan watch industry. We've put a lot of effort creating the distinctive details and small things which make Gnomon to stand out among other watches in the same price range.  We see Gnomon as the starting point of the journey to eradicate the barrier between expensive timepieces and independent designer project. It also has several hand made parts which makes Gnomon the truly unique companion to your wrist.Our first collection has three models which are defined by our signature design as well as corresponding leather and coating palettes and a colour of the back lid mineral lens. The single hand is inspired by a shape of an actual sundial's gnomon.The dial is made of an artificially worn out steel sheet and adds the unique touch to each timepiece. You can be sure that there's no similar pattern to any other Gnomon timepiece. The dial also has engraved minute and applied volumetric hour indexes and is protected by a domed sapphire coated crystal. The back side of the watch also has domed shape with a transparent crystal with our logo in the center. The steel part is engraved with zodiac signs matching hour areas of the dial as well month number in Julian calendar system. As we've mentioned before, one of our goals was to create a timepiece which lacks cold manufacturing origin.That's why we've decided to go for handcrafted leather straps for our Gnomon timepieces.Every strap for our watches is made by hand in Italy. It's hand cut from a thick and reliable high quality calf skin, which is soft and flexible enough for wearing with utmost comfort.We tried a lot of different materials and sizes trying to find the optimal solution for our straps. Three different leather patterns with a vintage touch have been chosen to deliver the hand made quality without heavily affecting the final price and bearing the original and everlasting feeling of the high leatherwork craftsmanship. We're sure that your wrist will definitely be enjoying it! Every Gnomon watch is the unique artisan object with a lot of distinctive features and small details in design. We put a lot of effort to develop the most appropriate shapes and construction according to our concept and offer the most comfortable format and high quality materials in our price range. The cases of all Gnomon watches are made of lightweight 316L stainless steel with polished or matt surface and colored PVD-coating. The back lid is also made of steel, has a transparent glass embedded in it, with different colors depending on the specific model, and offers a great view on the automatic movement. The movement is Japanese automatic with 21 jewels and the watch construction grants 5 ATM water resistance. Another remarkable thing is the unique dial with a scratched texture made by hand, which makes each mode a truly one of a kind!Case Diameter: 43 mm Case Thickness: 11 mm Band Material: 100% genuine leather handmade in ItalyStrap buckle: 316L Stainless steel Band Max/Min Length: 215 mm / 165 mm Band Width: 20 mm tapered to 17 mm Total Weight: 65 gramCase / Back case Material : 316L Stainless steelCrystal: Sapphire Coated  Water Resistant: 5 ATM Movement: Citizen Miyota 8215 Automatic (21 Jewels)We've done everything we could to achieve the reasonable and adequate price which we're ready to offer to our backers on Indiegogo. Solar Lab watches are the high quality product with a decent part of handiwork, so we've come to the ultimate solution for the price, which is only 275 $ and is much more affordable than for similar watches in the market. Thanks to the Indiegogo's directly to customer policy you won't meet any markups and unnecessary costs.It's our first experience in crowdfunding but we have faith in our abilities and in our manufacturer, so we don't expect any serious challenges in the production and aim to reach the shipping stage in the shortest terms possible. Please, note, that the watches are already in production, so it won't take too much time to get your Gnomon watch!Please note that the price on Indiegogo is much lower than the future retail price. So you'll be able to save 50% ordering Gnomon now. Multiple items will result in even higher discounts!  Join our social media communities to learn the freshest news faster and get cool pics of our watches directly to your feeds. story:
At Restrap, we love good design and innovation. It's what we do best. We take everyday items, things you thought you knew, and improve them - adding unique twists to create products that are functional, neat and cutting-edge.

Based in Yorkshire, England, Restrap is a family-run business operational since 2010. We're a solid team with well-developed and tested skills. This means we're able to hand make all our products in our Leeds workshop, using locally sourced materials wherever possible.

What we found.

Here at Restrap we’re always on the go. We run, cycle, walk and get out and enjoy life. Over the years, we’ve all struggled to find a belt that is both comfortable and stylish and that we can wear for the sports we love. Our belts were a source of regular discomfort, requiring constant adjustment or snapping. We wanted to change this.

Our solution

 

We have created Link, a one-of-a-kind belt, which offers comfort and flexibility for all kinds of uses.

Link contains a unique, patented magnetic buckle. With one single movement, Link can be fastened, removed, loosened and tightened on the go - with just one hand. With a break strength of 50kg and a ladderlock system for size adjustment, Link guarantees flexibility and comfort whilst being exceptionally secure.

The super strength 30mm elastic has been specially manufactured in Great Britain. Its unique design moves with the wearer for added comfort. No more twisting, turning and digging. Hurrah!

Testing

Link was dreamed up back in 2014. Since then, we have been tweaking, testing and improving its design and are confident that the final product is built to last. Just to be doubly sure, all Link belts come with a lifetime guarantee against manufacturing faults.

Materials

All our materials are locally sourced wherever possible and are lovingly handcrafted in-house.

Link includes:

 - A patented magnetic 30mm buckle

- 30mm super strength elastic

 - Finishing label and leather belt loop

- Nylon thread (hard wearing)

 

What happens next?

When you place an order you will receive an email with colour and size options(please allow up to 24 hours to receive this). As soon as we receive your reply your order will be shipped.

If you have any question feel free to drop us a line at info@restrap.co.uk

Rewards

Made from a carbon fibre headset spacer and a tough black spring-loaded clip, your keys will remain safe as you ride.

Sizing

 

Custom Sizing Options

Although we have standard sizes, as all the Links are made in house, we can create a belt for any size you'd like at no extra cost. Just drop us a line with your requirements.

Risks and challenges

We make every effort to minimise risk. We’re an established business with our own in-house manufacturing facility and triple contingencies on our component suppliers.

Upon successful funding we’ll be in touch to get your delivery details and aim to dispatch rewards within the time frames outlined above.

We promise to keep every pledge up-to-date with every step of the process.

We are really excited about this product and can’t wait for you to try Link for yourself.

Thank you for the support.

story:
Hi there, we're Zoe and Ashley, the design duo behind Birds N Bones Jewelry. Our jewelry is handmade in either Zoe's Portland studio or Ashley's Brooklyn studio; we use castings of animal bones and parts in sterling silver and brass to make adornments that are "where the dark and the beautiful collide." We recently had an unfortunate event where our casting vendor was careless and didn't store or use our jewelry molds properly. Over 75 of our original molds are completely destroyed and this puts our business at a near standstill. Having to redo our molds is a timely and expensive undertaking, one that we really couldn't see coming when doing our financial planning. That’s why we are reaching out to ask for help.

We really need your help via your donation to continue being able to create our past designs, as well as our future planned collections. We absolutely love creating adornments that speak to people and want to continue to do that for the future, but that just isn't possible without re-making our original molds.

The money we raise here will be immediately put back into our business to re-do our molds.

 

To make our jewelry designs, we do a process called Lost Wax Casting. We find our natural specimens, such as small animal skulls and bones, and then make molds of them so we can create consistent multiples. 

Our molds are injected with wax, and the specimens are "pulled" from these molds. These are then put in a casting flask, and filled with plaster which hardens around them. The wax is then heated and melted out of the plaster, thus “lost wax”. Negative impressions of our pieces are left behind, and filled with molten metal to create these multiples in sterling silver or brass.

As you can see, our entire business hinges on having reliable, usable molds. We value our work and only want to produce the best quality designs possible. In order to do so, we need to re-make our molds which takes time and money. We need to purchase new mold material, see which pieces can be remolded from wax or metal castings we still have on hand, but if the options aren't good enough we might have to source new specimens to match our original ones as closely as possible. 

Any value raised beyond our goal will benefit our next collection, which is ocean inspired and nearly ready to be finalized.

If we receive above and beyond what we need for the near future expenses, we will use that money to purchase our own casting equipment so we never have to fear this situation happening again. We would love to do the castings ourselves if we had the space and equipment.

 

We've got some really rad perks for donating. Besides our love and deep gratitude, we are also giving storewide discounts, midi rings, ceramic jewelry bowls, custom stickers, geodes, postcards and polaroids from us.

 

We, Zoe Cope and Ashley Lagasse, met while in a small metals casting class at the Academy of Art University. After realizing each of us had a box of dead things in our lockers, we figured we should probably be friends. As the semester progressed, many of our molds had a similar aesthetic, as that they were almost always of different animal bones and parts. Both of us were usually at the school studio until it closed and the idea of creating a collection together happened organically. Forged in burns, hammered fingers, accidentally melted silver, and late night pizza runs, our budding jewelry skills and friendship grew over four years.

We officially launched Birds N Bones Jewelry on Halloween 2013 and since then our brand has grown to include four collections and over 100 designs. We handmake each piece, use recycled silver, ethically sourced gemstones, and donate a portion of our monthly earning to different environmental and animal conversation programs. Nature is our biggest inspiration and we care for her and her creatures just as much as we do about creating beautiful, everlasting, unique jewelry.

 

Receiving donations is super stellar, but we also understand if that's not something you can do at this time. Please help spread the word about this campaign to remake our original molds via the sharable links provided to the right of the video up at the top. 

We so appreciate you and your support as we take on redoing our original molds and continuing our handmade business!

xoxo

Zoe + Ashley

P.S. We get our animal bones and parts from sources like Paxton's Gate, natural history museum stores, and sometimes Amazon and Ebay. We always make sure they were ethically sourced and are from naturally deceased animals. We only use one of the bones/skulls/series-of-claws to make a mold from it and do all of our castings from the mold. The mold is injected with wax and then we use those in the "lost wax" casting process. There isn't actually a bone in our finished product, it's all sterling silver (or brass).

story:
We’re back! It took 1 year, but we finally cracked how to engineer pique polo shirts and t-shirts that make it easier than ever to dress stylish without compromising on comfort.

The outside repels stains, while the inside is anti-bacterial and odour repellent.  


Pique is an amazing fabric. The pique polo was invented in the thirties by French tennis champion René Lacoste, and it is one of the most breathable and luxurious fabric constructions.

Through extensive research and prototyping we have created a unique treatment mix called FreshCore™. By manipulating cotton fibers we shield them from both bacteria and liquids. Our treatments do not affect the hand feel of the fabric and we are able to reach the same level of breathability than any untreated cotton polo in the market. 


Repels all water-based stains, including red wine, beetroot juice, and coffee.
 


Odour and sweat repellent, keeping you fresh all day and beyond.
 


Choose from grey, light blue, white and navy.

Don't take our word for it. We use the unfiltered platform Trustpilot for all reviews - both the good and the bad. We have no way to interfere with the reviews. This is a part of our commitment to full transparency in both production, sustainability and customer experience.

More than 120 media have told our story and tested our products. We have also been the runner-up finalists at the Dutch Innovation Awards and Get in The Ring, where we competed with startups from over 100 countries. 

For any media inquiries, feel free to reach out to us on hello@labfresh.eu.


Not all heroes wear capes. Some wear lab coats. And we work with the best of them in Switzerland and Portugal. LABFRESH is helping these creators get their smart inventions out of the lab and into closets across the globe.

When we develop a new product we put our back into it. We obsess. That’s why we only launched 2 products in 2 years.  

By reducing the need for washing we extend the life-time of our products. By investing in longevity, durability and wearability we contribute to lowering consumerism. Wash less. Wear more. Buy less. 

We keep a close eye on our environmental footprint and as a company we take full responsibility. This includes ensuring the best work environment at our manufacturer in Portugal. 

At LABFRESH we work from a technology-based vision and non-seasonal approach towards building a collection that embraces longevity and essentials.


Our story began 2 years ago on this platform, when we launched the odour and stain repellent shirt.  

We got 1000% funded and immediately quit our jobs, so we could turn LABFRESH into a real business.  

Without crowdfunding we wouldn’t be here today. 

Launching new products is scary. It requires a lot of resources to get new technologies out of the lab and into a real supply chain. 

That is why we would like to see if the Indiegogo community is interested in our new invention, before we go into full-scale production.  

Our mission hasn’t changed. We want to fight fast fashion and over-consumption by creating products engineered to last a lifetime. Wear more. Wash less. Buy less.

Feel free to reach out to us by leaving a comment or writing us on hello@labfresh.eu.

 

Unlimited cancellation. You are able to cancel your order at any point in time and get a full refund (until the day the product is shipped). 

90 days size guarantee. If your size is wrong we send you a new product in the right size, free of charge (we do not provide free return labels).

If your size is wrong we send you a new product in the right size, free of charge. You are responsible for the cost of returning the wrong size, but we will ship the new, correct size for free to the Netherlands, Denmark, Germany, Austria, Belgium and France.

Free and easy shipping across the EU, US & Canada. Shipping costs to other parts of the world is only €15. 

Stain repellency
We guarantee that our polos and t-shirts will repel stains that are caused by water-based fluids and semi-fluids. If stains are caused by oil-based fluids, such as skin oils or greasy food, the product will need to be washed or cleaned with stain remover.

We test the stain repellency for 30 washes at 30 degrees with ironing after each wash and no tumble-drying or bleaching. A lot depends on the type of machine, washing program, and detergent used, which is why we are not comfortable extending the guarantee above 30 washes for the stain repellency. Since the products need significantly less washing than a traditional cotton product 30 washes will give you a lot of wears.

Odour repellency
We guarantee that our polos and t-shirts will repel odour caused by bacteria, such as odour from sweat. Our shirts will not repel odour from cigarettes or cooking. Due to the many different variations and levels of perspiration we unfortunately cannot guarantee a specific amount of days the products will last before odour starts being absorbed into the fabric. We know that our current customers wear it 3,5 days. But we guarantee that the anti-bacterial treatment will be active for at least 100 washes.

Shrinkage
We pre-wash all garments and guarantee that shrinkage will be maximum 1%. 

Sweat stains
Our products block moderate amounts of sweat, but if we made it 100% hydrophobic the sweat would stay on the body and hence not be comfortable in a warm or humid environment. What we can promise is that LABFRESH products block perspiration better than a traditional shirt, and it dry up faster.  

Lifespan technology
We guarantee that the stain repellency will last for 30 washes and the odour repellency for 100 washes.

Keep in mind that you have to wash LABFRESH shirts less, so it’s still a lot of wears.

Feel free to reach out to us by leaving a comment or writing us on hello@labfresh.eu.
story_txt:
Our stain and odour repellent polos will available for direct order on our website in August!
