We use the unfiltered platform Trustpilot for all reviews - both the good and the bad. We have no way to interfere with the reviews. This is a part of our commitment to full transparency in both production, sustainability and customer experience.More than 120 media have told our story and tested our products. We have also been the runner-up finalists at the Dutch Innovation Awards and Get in The Ring, where we competed with startups from over 100 countries. For any media inquiries, feel free to reach out to us on hello@labfresh.eu.Not all heroes wear capes. Some wear lab coats. And we work with the best of them in Switzerland and Portugal. LABFRESH is helping these creators get their smart inventions out of the lab and into closets across the globe.When we develop a new product we put our back into it. We obsess. That’s why we only launched 2 products in 2 years.  By reducing the need for washing we extend the life-time of our products. By investing in longevity, durability and wearability we contribute to lowering consumerism. Wash less. Wear more. Buy less. We keep a close eye on our environmental footprint and as a company we take full responsibility. This includes ensuring the best work environment at our manufacturer in Portugal. At LABFRESH we work from a technology-based vision and non-seasonal approach towards building a collection that embraces longevity and essentials.Our story began 2 years ago on this platform, when we launched the odour and stain repellent shirt.  We got 1000% funded and immediately quit our jobs, so we could turn LABFRESH into a real business.  Without crowdfunding we wouldn’t be here today. Launching new products is scary. It requires a lot of resources to get new technologies out of the lab and into a real supply chain. That is why we would like to see if the Indiegogo community is interested in our new invention, before we go into full-scale production.  Our mission hasn’t changed. We want to fight fast fashion and over-consumption by creating products engineered to last a lifetime. Wear more. Wash less. Buy less.Feel free to reach out to us by leaving a comment or writing us on hello@labfresh.eu.  Unlimited cancellation. You are able to cancel your order at any point in time and get a full refund (until the day the product is shipped). 90 days size guarantee. If your size is wrong we send you a new product in the right size, free of charge (we do not provide free return labels).If your size is wrong we send you a new product in the right size, free of charge. You are responsible for the cost of returning the wrong size, but we will ship the new, correct size for free to the Netherlands, Denmark, Germany, Austria, Belgium and France.Free and easy shipping across the EU, US & Canada. Shipping costs to other parts of the world is only €15. Stain repellencyWe guarantee that our polos and t-shirts will repel stains that are caused by water-based fluids and semi-fluids. If stains are caused by oil-based fluids, such as skin oils or greasy food, the product will need to be washed or cleaned with stain remover.We test the stain repellency for 30 washes at 30 degrees with ironing after each wash and no tumble-drying or bleaching. A lot depends on the type of machine, washing program, and detergent used, which is why we are not comfortable extending the guarantee above 30 washes for the stain repellency. Since the products need significantly less washing than a traditional cotton product 30 washes will give you a lot of wears.Odour repellencyWe guarantee that our polos and t-shirts will repel odour caused by bacteria, such as odour from sweat. Our shirts will not repel odour from cigarettes or cooking. Due to the many different variations and levels of perspiration we unfortunately cannot guarantee a specific amount of days the products will last before odour starts being absorbed into the fabric. We know that our current customers wear it 3,5 days. But we guarantee that the anti-bacterial treatment will be active for at least 100 washes.ShrinkageWe pre-wash all garments and guarantee that shrinkage will be maximum 1%. Sweat stainsOur products block moderate amounts of sweat, but if we made it 100% hydrophobic the sweat would stay on the body and hence not be comfortable in a warm or humid environment. What we can promise is that LABFRESH products block perspiration better than a traditional shirt, and it dry up faster.  Lifespan technologyWe guarantee that the stain repellency will last for 30 washes and the odour repellency for 100 washes.Keep in mind that you have to wash LABFRESH shirts less, so it’s still a lot of wears.Feel free to reach out to us by leaving a comment or writing us on hello@labfresh.eu.

story:
Version française/french version:

 

Pourquoi ai-je crée cette ligne pour les grandes?

J’ai envie d’encourager les grandes femmes à se sentir assez grande pour grandir encore plus! Et les vêtements là-dedans, me direz-vous? C’est difficile de se sentir puissante quand nos vêtements ne nous vont pas. Les manches trop courtes, les robes et les jupes qui ont toujours l’air de mini-jupe. Ils ne sont jamais assez longs pour nos bras et nos jambes! Sans oublier le classique des pantalons trop court! Avoir la cheville à l’air l’hiver, ce n’est pas agréable!

Je veux offrir la possibilité aux grandes de s’habiller comme elles le désirent. Leurs donner le choix d’avoir des vêtements différents et stylisés. Qu’elles se tiennent droites et grandes pour se dépasser.

Mon histoire: À la grandeur de mes ambitions!

Je suis une grande femme. Laisse-moi te dire à quel point c’est difficile de se vêtir lorsque ton gabarit n’est pas dans les « normes ». Je le connais ce sentiment lorsque tu portes les créations faites par ta mère et que tu détonnes des autres ! À cette époque, je n’aimais pas ça. J’en n’avais pas du « vrai linge » pis dans le fond, je voulais juste être comme les autres. C’est légitime pour une adolescente, non ?

Je m’appelle Sabrina Beaulieu et je viens d’une famille qui adore et excelle en couture. La complexité de trouver des vêtements post premier enfant m’a amené à prendre des cours pour me fabriquer mes propres morceaux. Je suis littéralement tombé en amour car j’aime choisir les patrons, les tissus ainsi que les couper et les coudre.

J’ai toujours aimé dessiner. Partout, tout le temps. Des esquisses, j’en ai fait ! Mais à force de croire qu’il « fallait être mince » pour créer des vêtements, je me suis rabattu sur l’architecture. Je suis technologue en architecture et j’ai mon entreprise avec mon conjoint depuis 2008. Est-ce que j’étais complètement heureuse ? Non. Je devais me rendre à l’évidence, ma mission de vie n’était pas celle que je croyais. En dedans, ce qui me fait vibrer, c’est d’aider les filles comme moi à se sentir bien et en pouvoir de leur corps grâce à des vêtements qui leur donnent un look du tonnerre. Je souhaite qu’elles soient fières de leur 5’10" et plus ! Par ma persévérance, mon naturel joyeux et positif, je désire inspirer ces femmes à s’aimer comme elles sont, belles chacune à leur façon.

Donc après plusieurs montagnes russes d’appréhensions et d’incertitudes, je décide enfin de me lancer dans cette aventure d’affaire et ainsi est née: La Grande — Maison de couture!

Avec moi comme partenaire de votre garde-robe, vous vous sentirez comme chez une amie. Sans jugement. Je serais là pour vous supporter dans le choix d’être qui vous voulez vraiment. La Grande – Maison de couture, c’est plus que des vêtements, c’est l’intention de changer les standards.

Par qui et où est créé la collection?

La collection est créée au Québec. Le design est dessiné par moi, Sabrina Beaulieu; la grande princesse guerrière orc!

J’ai une patronniste qui a créé le premier modèle que je vous présente ici. La collection sera crée par plusieurs patronnistes de mon choix.

Les mannequins que vous voyez sont des amies qui me soutiennent et qui ont embarquées à 100% dans ce magnifique projet.

Le but de choisir des gens près de chez moi est de redonner à la communauté. Un jour, j’aimerais avoir mon propre atelier avec une grande équipe à deux pas de chez moi.

Qui peut acheter les produits La Grande?

Si vous êtes trop grandes pour les boutiques régulières, vous êtes la cliente parfaite pour nos produits!

Dans un souci de diversité et d’inclusivité, les tailles offertes vont de 6 à 28 (S à 3X). Si ces tailles ne vous conviennent pas, contacter moi car mon but est d'habiller TOUTES les grandes!

Idem pour les longueurs de pantalon qui vont de 34" à 41" d'entrejambes!

Parce que nous sommes #GRANDEMENTPARFAITE

À quoi va servir l’argent du socio-financement?

Cet argent va servir à créer et développer d’autres morceaux de vêtements pour la première collection. 15 pièces au total. Le lancement prévu le 1er octobre 2020!

Qu’est-ce ça inclus :

  • Conception des vêtements : Recherche, dessins des modèles, création et développement du patron, ainsi que la gradation des tailles.
  • Choix des matériaux : Tissus, mercerie (boutons, fils, fermeture éclair), doublure
  • Test : Création des échantillons pour s’assurer de l’ajustement sur des vraies personnes. Plusieurs échantillons seront nécessaires pour chaque morceau.
  • Photoshoot : Parce que j’ai hâte de vous montrer ça!
  • Site internet complet : Voir la description ici-bas

Elle servir également à la création du site web www.lagrande.ca. Ce ne sera pas juste un site de vente! Je veux créer une plateforme où vous pourrez échanger sur vos problématiques de grandes sous la forme d’un forum.

J'ai également l'intention de créer une section blog! Le Grand Blog! Écrit par des grandes pour des grandes!

J’ai envie que La Grandes – Maison de couture devienne une communauté pour nous les grandes. Un endroit où l'on peut se rassembler.

Mon engagement envers vous.

Je m’engage de tout faire en mon pouvoir pour vous offrir un produit de qualité que vous allez adorer porter.

Créer des vêtements qui vous feront sentir encore plus grandes!

Les tailles

Tel que mentionné précédemment, j’offre toutes les tailles entre 6 et 28. La particularité est qu’elles ne sont pas écrites dans les vêtements. Exemple, la taille 14=ardente/fiery. Donc vos mesures sont la seule vérité! Si vous portez habituellement du 6 et que dans ce modèle, cela vous donne du 8 et bien ce n’est pas grave, ce n’est qu’un chiffre!

Voici la charte des tailles et leurs noms.                              

2             resplendissante / resplendent

4             formidable / wonderful

6             fantastique / Fantastic

8             superbe / superb

10           rayonnante / aglow

12           fabuleuse / fabulous

14           ardente / fiery

16           merveilleuse / marvelous

18           majestueuse/ majestic

20           radieuse / radiant

22           chatoyante / shimmering

24          extraordinaire / extraordinary

26           magnifique/ magnificent

28           sublime / gorgeous

30           splendide / splendid

Tailles pour tissus extensible :

Petite/small     brillante / brilliant

Médium             éclatante / glowing

Large                  glorieuse / glorious

Xlarge                 lumineuse / luminous

X                           scintillante / glittering

1x                          étincelante / sparkling

2x                         flamboyante / flamboyant

3x                         éblouissante / dazzling

Pour les entrejambes, nous offrons de 34" à 41".

Comment pouvez-vous nous aider?

Votre aide est très précieuse car elle va me permettre de développer les morceaux avec une plus grande qualité. De prendre le temps de bien faire les ajustements avant de vous offrir les produits.

Chaque achat que vous ferez permet la viabilité du projet.

Chaque partage aussi. Plus de visibilité, plus de chance de succès. 

Les défis et les risques

Nous avons pris beaucoup de temps et d’attention pour bien créer les patrons et les ajustements du pantalon. Par contre, ce morceau n’a jamais été produit encore donc vous avez un certain risque que la taille demandée ne soit pas la bonne pour vous.

Ne vous inquiétez pas, nous allons l'échanger sans problème.

Notre défi est la production. Selon l’engouement du socio-financement, les délais peuvent augmenter. Nous allons tout faire en notre pouvoir pour que le tout se fasse rapidement et facilement.

#GRANDEMENTPARFAITE

Je voulais te parler du #GRANDEMENTPARFAITE. 

J'ai inventé le #GRANDEMENTPARFAITE pour que tu te rappelles, et moi aussi, que dans n'importe quelle situation, tu es parfaite! Non GRANDEMENT PARFAITE!

Que tu sois habillé chic ou en pyjama, tu es grandement parfaite!

Que tu sois en talon haut ou en running shoes, tu es grandement parfaite!

Que tu sois une taille petite ou 3x, tu es grandement parfaite!

Que tu sois au naturelle ou maquillée, tu es grandement parfaite!

Que tu aies eu une belle ou mauvaise journée, tu es grandement parfaite!

Oui il y a des journées où tu vas te sentir découragé, où que tu vas avoir l’impression que la vie t’en veut, mais tu dois te rappeler que tu es grandement parfaite!

Je veux que ce #GRANDEMENTPARFAITE te le rappelle. C'est pour ça que je l'ai inscrit sur des chandails. Pour que tu le portes fièrement et que tu propages ton bonheur de te sentir grandement parfaite.

Charte des tailles:

****La charte officielle des jeans sera disponible lorsque les choix définitifs de tissus seront fait****

Version anglaise/englishversion:

Why did I create this line for tall women?

I wish to encourage tall women to feel great enough to grow even more! You might be thinking, “what do clothes have to do with all of this?” It’s hard to feel powerful when our clothes don’t fit us. Sleeves too short, dresses and skirts that always look like miniskirts… These clothes are never long enough for our arms and legs! And don’t forget the classic problem with our pants being too short! Having bare ankles during the wintertime isn’t exactly pleasant!

I want to offer the tall ladies the possibilities to get dressed as they desire. To give them the choice to own different clothes in different styles. To see them stand tall and proud to better themselves.

My story: The greatness of my ambitions!

I am a tall woman. Let me tell you how hard it can be difficult to dress up when your frame is not within the usual “standards.” I know it too well this feeling when you wear creations sewn by your mother and you do not fit in the crowd! Back then, I did not like it. I did not have any “real clothes” and after all, I simply want to be like everyone else. Which is quite legitimate for a teen, no?

My name is Sabrina Beaulieu and I come from a family that loves and excels in sewing. The complexity to find clothes following a first child brought me to take classes to fashion my own pieces of clothing. I literally fell in love and I adore choosing the patterns, the materials as well as cutting and sewing.

I always did love to draw. Everywhere, all the time. I did many so many sketcher! But I believe so hard once had to be thin to create clothes, I finally turned to architecture. I am an architectural technologist and I own my business alongside my spouse since 2008. Was I completely happy? No. I had to accept, my life mission was not the one I had thought. Within me, what really was vibrating, was to help girls like me to feel good and in control of their body with stunning-looking clothes. I wish for them to stand proudly from their 5 feet 10 inches, or even more! With perseverance, my joyful and positive nature, I want to inspire these women to love themselves as they are, beautiful all in their own ways.

So after a roller coaster of uncertainty and misgivings, I decided finally to jump in the adventure and get into business from which was born: La grande — Maison de couture !

With myself as a partner of your wardrobe, you will feel just like at a friend’s home. No judgment. I will be there to support you in your choice to simply be whom you truly want to be. La Grande—Maison de couture, it is more than just clothing, it is the intent to change the standards.

 

By whom and where is created the collection?

The collection is created in Quebec. The design comes from sketches I do, me, Sabrina Beaulieu; the orcish warrior princess!

I do have a pattern maker that created the first model that I present to you here. The whole collection will be created with multiple pattern makers that I will select personally.

The whole manufacturing will be done in Quebec by seamstress by trade.

The models you see are all friends that support me and are 100% on board with me in this grand project.  

The objective in choosing people in proximity is so that I can give back to my community. One day, I dream to own my own shop with a full team within only a few steps from my home.

Who can purchase products from La Grande?

If you are too tall for the regular boutiques, you are the perfect customer for our products!

In the interest of making sure we offer diversity and inclusion, the sizes go from 6 to 28 (small to 3X-Large). If these sizes do not suit you, please do contact me as my goal is to dress ALL of the tall women!

Same goes for the inseam length that go from 34 inches to 41 inches.

Because we are #HIGHLYPERFECT.

To which means will the money from the social-funding be applied?

The funding will help created and developpe other pieces of clothings for the first collection. We are aiming for a total of 15 pieces. The launch is schedule for Octobre 1st, 2020!

What does this include :

  • Conception of the clothes : research, drawings of models, creation and development of patterns, as well as the sizes grading.
  • Material choice: fabrics, haberdashery (buttons, zippers and threads) and garment lining.
  • Testing: Production of samples to see to the required adjustments on real persons. Multiple samples are required for each piece.
  • A photoshoot: because I cannot wait to show you all this!
  • A complete web site: See description here below.

 

It will serve as well for the élaboration of the web site www.lagrande.ca. Which will not only be a sale shop! I am hoping to create a forum plateform where women can come to exchange in regards to their personal and various issues related to their size.

I also have the intent to create a blog! The Grand Blog! Written by Tall women for the tall ones.

I am really hoping to see La Grande – Maison de couture become a community for all of us tall women. A place to gather and to simply be.  

My commitment to you.

I hereby commit myself tout to everything in my power to offer you high-quality products that you will desire to wear.

To create clothes that will make you feel even taller!

The Sizes

As previously mentioned, I offer all the sizes between 6 and 28. The particularity here is that the sizes do not show inside the clothes. For example, a size 14 will read ardente/fiery. Your measurements will show reality! If you would usually wear a size 6 but in a specific model you require a size 8, it does not matter, it is only a number!

Here is the sizing chart and their names.

2             resplendissante / resplendent

4             formidable / wonderful

6             fantastique / Fantastic

8             superbe / superb

10           rayonnante / aglow

12           fabuleuse / fabulous

14           ardente / fiery

16           merveilleuse / marvelous

18           majestueuse/ majestic

20           radieuse / radiant

22           chatoyante / shimmering

24          extraordinaire / extraordinary

26           magnifique/ magnificent

28           sublime / gorgeous

30           splendide / splendid

Sizes for stretch fabrics

Petite/small     brillante / brilliant

Médium             éclatante / glowing

Large                  glorieuse / glorious

Xlarge                 lumineuse / luminous

X                           scintillante / glittering

1x                          étincelante / sparkling

2x                         flamboyante / flamboyant

3x                         éblouissante / dazzling

For inseams we offer from 34 inches to 41 inches.

 

How can you help us?

Your help is truly precious as it will allow the development of pieces with a higher quality standards. To take the time to make the required adjustments before offering you the finished products.

Each purchase that you male allows the project viability.

 

The Challenges and Risks

We took the time and care to properly create the patterns and proceed with the adjustments of the pants. However, this piece has never been in production and so there is a certain risk that the size ordered may not be the good one for you.

Do not worry, we will proceed with the exchange with no hassle.

Our challenge is the production. Depending of our social-funding, the delays might be longer.

 

#HIGHLYPERFECT

I wished to talk to you about the #HIGHLYPERFECT. 

I created the #HIGHLYPERFECT so you can remind yourself, and me, that in any situation, you are perfect! No HIGHLY PERFECT!

Whether you are dressed chic or in a PJs, you are highly perfect.

Whether you are in heels or running shoes, you are highly perfect.

Whether you are a small size or a 3X, you are highly perfect!

Whether you have makeup or a natural look, you are highly perfect!

Whether you are having a good or a bad day, you are highly perfect!

Yes, there are days where you will feel discourage, where you will feel like your life is going no where, but you need to remember, you are highly perfect!

I want that this #HIGHLYPERFECT reminds it to you. Which is why it can be found on shirts, so you can wear them proudly and spread the happiness to feel highly perfect.

Si vous portez habituellement du 6 et que dans ce modèle, cela vous donne du 8 et bien ce n’est pas grave, ce n’est qu’un chiffre!Voici la charte des tailles et leurs noms.                              2             resplendissante / resplendent4             formidable / wonderful6             fantastique / Fantastic8             superbe / superb10           rayonnante / aglow12           fabuleuse / fabulous14           ardente / fiery16           merveilleuse / marvelous18           majestueuse/ majestic20           radieuse / radiant22           chatoyante / shimmering24          extraordinaire / extraordinary26           magnifique/ magnificent28           sublime / gorgeous30           splendide / splendidTailles pour tissus extensible :Petite/small     brillante / brilliantMédium             éclatante / glowingLarge                  glorieuse / gloriousXlarge                 lumineuse / luminousX                           scintillante / glittering1x                          étincelante / sparkling2x                         flamboyante / flamboyant3x                         éblouissante / dazzlingPour les entrejambes, nous offrons de 34" à 41".Comment pouvez-vous nous aider?Votre aide est très précieuse car elle va me permettre de développer les morceaux avec une plus grande qualité. De prendre le temps de bien faire les ajustements avant de vous offrir les produits.Chaque achat que vous ferez permet la viabilité du projet.Chaque partage aussi. Plus de visibilité, plus de chance de succès. Les défis et les risquesNous avons pris beaucoup de temps et d’attention pour bien créer les patrons et les ajustements du pantalon. Par contre, ce morceau n’a jamais été produit encore donc vous avez un certain risque que la taille demandée ne soit pas la bonne pour vous.Ne vous inquiétez pas, nous allons l'échanger sans problème.Notre défi est la production. Selon l’engouement du socio-financement, les délais peuvent augmenter. Nous allons tout faire en notre pouvoir pour que le tout se fasse rapidement et facilement.#GRANDEMENTPARFAITEJe voulais te parler du #GRANDEMENTPARFAITE. J'ai inventé le #GRANDEMENTPARFAITE pour que tu te rappelles, et moi aussi, que dans n'importe quelle situation, tu es parfaite! Non GRANDEMENT PARFAITE!Que tu sois habillé chic ou en pyjama, tu es grandement parfaite!Que tu sois en talon haut ou en running shoes, tu es grandement parfaite!Que tu sois une taille petite ou 3x, tu es grandement parfaite!Que tu sois au naturelle ou maquillée, tu es grandement parfaite!Que tu aies eu une belle ou mauvaise journée, tu es grandement parfaite!Oui il y a des journées où tu vas te sentir découragé, où que tu vas avoir l’impression que la vie t’en veut, mais tu dois te rappeler que tu es grandement parfaite!Je veux que ce #GRANDEMENTPARFAITE te le rappelle. C'est pour ça que je l'ai inscrit sur des chandails. Pour que tu le portes fièrement et que tu propages ton bonheur de te sentir grandement parfaite.Charte des tailles:****La charte officielle des jeans sera disponible lorsque les choix définitifs de tissus seront fait****

Version anglaise/englishversion:
Why did I create this line for tall women?
I wish to encourage tall women to feel great enough to grow even more! You might be thinking, “what do clothes have to do with all of this?” It’s hard to feel powerful when our clothes don’t fit us. Sleeves too short, dresses and skirts that always look like miniskirts… These clothes are never long enough for our arms and legs! And don’t forget the classic problem with our pants being too short! Having bare ankles during the wintertime isn’t exactly pleasant!
I want to offer the tall ladies the possibilities to get dressed as they desire. To give them the choice to own different clothes in different styles. To see them stand tall and proud to better themselves.
My story: The greatness of my ambitions!
I am a tall woman. Let me tell you how hard it can be difficult to dress up when your frame is not within the usual “standards.” I know it too well this feeling when you wear creations sewn by your mother and you do not fit in the crowd! Back then, I did not like it. I did not have any “real clothes” and after all, I simply want to be like everyone else. Which is quite legitimate for a teen, no?
My name is Sabrina Beaulieu and I come from a family that loves and excels in sewing. The complexity to find clothes following a first child brought me to take classes to fashion my own pieces of clothing. I literally fell in love and I adore choosing the patterns, the materials as well as cutting and sewing.
I always did love to draw. Everywhere, all the time. I did many so many sketcher! But I believe so hard once had to be thin to create clothes, I finally turned to architecture. I am an architectural technologist and I own my business alongside my spouse since 2008. Was I completely happy? No. I had to accept, my life mission was not the one I had thought. Within me, what really was vibrating, was to help girls like me to feel good and in control of their body with stunning-looking clothes. I wish for them to stand proudly from their 5 feet 10 inches, or even more! With perseverance, my joyful and positive nature, I want to inspire these women to love themselves as they are, beautiful all in their own ways.
So after a roller coaster of uncertainty and misgivings, I decided finally to jump in the adventure and get into business from which was born: La grande — Maison de couture !
With myself as a partner of your wardrobe, you will feel just like at a friend’s home. No judgment. I will be there to support you in your choice to simply be whom you truly want to be. La Grande—Maison de couture, it is more than just clothing, it is the intent to change the standards.
 
By whom and where is created the collection?
The collection is created in Quebec. The design comes from sketches I do, me, Sabrina Beaulieu; the orcish warrior princess!
I do have a pattern maker that created the first model that I present to you here. The whole collection will be created with multiple pattern makers that I will select personally.
The whole manufacturing will be done in Quebec by seamstress by trade.
The models you see are all friends that support me and are 100% on board with me in this grand project.  
The objective in choosing people in proximity is so that I can give back to my community. One day, I dream to own my own shop with a full team within only a few steps from my home.
Who can purchase products from La Grande?
If you are too tall for the regular boutiques, you are the perfect customer for our products!
In the interest of making sure we offer diversity and inclusion, the sizes go from 6 to 28 (small to 3X-Large). If these sizes do not suit you, please do contact me as my goal is to dress ALL of the tall women!
Same goes for the inseam length that go from 34 inches to 41 inches.
Because we are #HIGHLYPERFECT.
To which means will the money from the social-funding be applied?
The funding will help created and developpe other pieces of clothings for the first collection. We are aiming for a total of 15 pieces. The launch is schedule for Octobre 1st, 2020!
What does this include :

Conception of the clothes : research, drawings of models, creation and development of patterns, as well as the sizes grading.
Material choice: fabrics, haberdashery (buttons, zippers and threads) and garment lining.
Testing: Production of samples to see to the required adjustments on real persons. Multiple samples are required for each piece.
A photoshoot: because I cannot wait to show you all this!
A complete web site: See description here below.

 
It will serve as well for the élaboration of the web site www.lagrande.ca. Which will not only be a sale shop! I am hoping to create a forum plateform where women can come to exchange in regards to their personal and various issues related to their size.
I also have the intent to create a blog! The Grand Blog! Written by Tall women for the tall ones.
I am really hoping to see La Grande – Maison de couture become a community for all of us tall women. A place to gather and to simply be.  
My commitment to you.
I hereby commit myself tout to everything in my power to offer you high-quality products that you will desire to wear.
To create clothes that will make you feel even taller!
The Sizes
As previously mentioned, I offer all the sizes between 6 and 28. The particularity here is that the sizes do not show inside the clothes. For example, a size 14 will read ardente/fiery. Your measurements will show reality! If you would usually wear a size 6 but in a specific model you require a size 8, it does not matter, it is only a number!
Here is the sizing chart and their names.
2             resplendissante / resplendent
4             formidable / wonderful
6             fantastique / Fantastic
8             superbe / superb
10           rayonnante / aglow
12           fabuleuse / fabulous
14           ardente / fiery
16           merveilleuse / marvelous
18           majestueuse/ majestic
20           radieuse / radiant
22           chatoyante / shimmering
24          extraordinaire / extraordinary
26           magnifique/ magnificent
28           sublime / gorgeous
30           splendide / splendid
Sizes for stretch fabrics 
Petite/small     brillante / brilliant
Médium             éclatante / glowing
Large                  glorieuse / glorious
Xlarge                 lumineuse / luminous
X                           scintillante / glittering
1x                          étincelante / sparkling
2x                         flamboyante / flamboyant
3x                         éblouissante / dazzling
For inseams we offer from 34 inches to 41 inches.
 
How can you help us?
Your help is truly precious as it will allow the development of pieces with a higher quality standards. To take the time to make the required adjustments before offering you the finished products.
Each purchase that you male allows the project viability.
 
The Challenges and Risks
We took the time and care to properly create the patterns and proceed with the adjustments of the pants. However, this piece has never been in production and so there is a certain risk that the size ordered may not be the good one for you.
Do not worry, we will proceed with the exchange with no hassle.
Our challenge is the production. Depending of our social-funding, the delays might be longer.
 
#HIGHLYPERFECT
I wished to talk to you about the #HIGHLYPERFECT. 
I created the #HIGHLYPERFECT so you can remind yourself, and me, that in any situation, you are perfect! No HIGHLY PERFECT!
Whether you are dressed chic or in a PJs, you are highly perfect.
Whether you are in heels or running shoes, you are highly perfect.
Whether you are a small size or a 3X, you are highly perfect!
Whether you have makeup or a natural look, you are highly perfect!
Whether you are having a good or a bad day, you are highly perfect!
Yes, there are days where you will feel discourage, where you will feel like your life is going no where, but you need to remember, you are highly perfect!
I want that this #HIGHLYPERFECT reminds it to you. Which is why it can be found on shirts, so you can wear them proudly and spread the happiness to feel highly perfect.

story:
Dogs are our best friends. They do everything with us. And when winter rolls around, there is no stopping them. Winter dog jackets need to be easy to get on, keep your dog warm and active, and last a lifetime. The jacket you wear in the winter is all of these things, why shouldn't your dog's be?

Getting your dog into a winter jacket when he is excited to get outside can be a challenge. Most jackets require your dog to lift his legs and awkwardly fit them through holes that may not properly fit. Chest sizes vary dramatically from breed to breed and make picking the right size difficult. And then, when you finally find a jacket that sort of works, it only lasts a season or two and then you have to do it all over again.

It doesn't have to be this way.

That's why we designed the 5-Second Dog Parka. The world's easiest and fastest fitting winter dog jacket.


Dog jackets on the market today are not designed with your pup in mind. They are modified human coats and require your dog to lift his legs into arm holes and button or zip up the chest - movements that can be an issue for senior dogs, easily distracted puppies, or any high energy dog raring to get outside and explore.

Our design was the result of many prototypes and a year of testing. We wanted to design a jacket that had very few moving parts but still have the ability to be adaptable.

With a self adjusting neck, one clip, and Velcro sides, the 5-Second Dog Parka is the easiest fitting jacket you'll ever put on your dog. Simply follow these steps:

  • Slide the parka over your pup's head
  • Adjust the midsection clip
  • Smooth out the Velcro sides - you're done!


 

Sizing? No problem.

How many times have you torn your hair out trying to figure out what size to order your pup in any sweater, jacket or coat? Chest sizes are a challenge when fitting a dog. That's why the widely used front closure is problematic. If you measure the chest incorrectly, the jacket just won't fit. Trying to use the typical manufacturer's size chart is risky – too many measurements and too easy to make a mistake. 

With the 5-Second Dog Parka, you only have to give us one measurement - from your pup's neck to the base of their tail - and we guarantee our parka will fit, regardless of what shape, size, or breed they are. And with our functional design, every dog from a Yorkie to a Great Dane will be able to run, jump, explore, and move freely, no matter the weather.

We've spared no expense creating this parka and our quality design, materials, and craftsmanship reflect that.

The shell is incredible. We used a premium Canadian-made fabric that has been tried and tested for decades in our frigid Canadian winters. Water and snow resistant, this fabric is the benchmark of quality in the outerwear world, normally only found on men's and ladies' outerwear that typically costs close to $1000. This incredibly durable fabric and the workmanship we put into it gives us the confidence to offer our industry-leading 5 Year Guarantee. It can take anything your dog may throw at it. 

The top part of the shell is filled with perfectly balanced, 100% Canadian goose down. Our manufacturing partner has proprietary down filling technology that ensures perfectly weighed down in every jacket, every time. 

It was important for us to keep the 5-Second Dog Parka light, so your active dog could keep moving. So, we decided to line the contoured chest panel with premium Thinsulate, which keeps your pup warm while also allowing for freer movement. The chest panel is made from the same snow and water resistant durable shell as the top, giving it the ability to stand up to the wear and tear of an active outdoor session. 

And finally, the lining is made out of soft and cozy microfleece, which wicks away moisture, keeping your pup dry and toasty, no matter how much running around they're doing.

**UPDATE: We've gotten a few backers inquiring about harness holes for their pup's parka. We wanted to let you know that, yes, we will have a small opening on the back to accommodate dogs who prefer harnesses when out for their walk :) 

We're from Canada - and we know cold. So we knew our parka had to be made in the same country it was inspired from.

We have an exclusive relationship with a Toronto-based state of the art factory, who have decades of experience putting out some of the best outerwear in the world. 

Our proprietary fabrics are hand selected, with extreme attention to detail, to ensure exceptional performance, no matter what conditions your dog may face.

Our founder, Jeremy Potvin, and our lead designer, Nikki Kime, both have a combined 40+ years of experience in Canadian manufacturing. They have worked together for years and have both run production and design for some of the biggest brands in the world including Roots Canada and Paul Frank. They will be a part of the manufacturing process from start to finish. The World of Angus office is a quick 20-minute drive from our factory and we will be in our factory often to ensure everything is perfect. 

We believe so strongly that this will be the best winter dog jacket you ever buy, we are going to put our money where our mouth is:

The 5-Second Dog Parka comes with our 5-Year Guarantee. No questions asked. 

If anything should go wrong with your parka, we will either fix it or replace it for you. 

This jacket was born from the frustration of having to buy a new jacket for our pets every season. We know how many of you have experienced the same thing, and we are here to put an end to it. No more buying your best friend a new coat every winter - this is it.

We stand behind everything we make and if a problem arises we never stop trying until we have made it right. It's part of our culture – it's who we are. From day one we made the firm decision to make the best products possible that truly improve the life of dogs. But we had to be more than that. We had to be an equally great company. You will find that not only do we stand behind everything we say and everything we make, we always will.

Please, take a moment to visit our website and read our reviews. 

We understand that, like you, your dog has his own preferences, and of course, his own style. That's why we've created stretch goals with the fashionable pup (and owner) in mind!

And with less than two weeks left to go on our Kickstarter campaign, we have some really big news to share with you: 

When we hit $20K, ALL colours will be unlocked! 

After finalizing a few things with our manufacturer, combined with the retailer partner support we are getting, we are now able to offer all colours as soon as we hit $20,000. So, if you've been wishing your pup could rock that Red or have been frustrated waiting for Graphite or Army, wait no more!



Risks and challenges

World of Angus has been designing, creating, and delivering premium pet products for two years. We already have the technology, skills, and staff required to manufacture and fulfill projects at scale.

As mentioned previously, our founder has an extensive background in the space. Decades in the apparel business, retail, and technology give us the drive and leadership required to execute this project. Our lead designer is a Parsons graduate with decades of experience in premium and high-end markets. Her attention to detail and natural ability to combine design and function are immediately reflective in the design of the 5-Second Dog Parka. Jeremy and Nikki will lead this project to completion, ensuring all goals are met.

Upon reaching our funding goal we will begin the manufacturing process immediately. We will do everything we can to complete production in record time. When ready to ship, our in-house logistics team is ready, with a two year impeccable track record, to ship every backer quickly and accurately.

 

The Snuggle Is Real | The Love Is Real #wishingyouallalovelikethis

story:
About us

For OSTEN one thing is ﬁxed: Individual style for individual people. Our unique bags are printed once and are strictly limited – every bag is one of a kind - promised.

Inspired by the conﬁdent and creative impulses of the cities of South East Asia, OSTEN will be an accessories brand for individuals, made by individuals. Working with international designers, OSTEN is planning launch a range of Messenger Bags, Camera Bags and Travel Bag.

What we do

At OSTEN we consciously rely on our Chinese-German roots, combining living history and cultural identity with quality design.

Combining Asian traditions with modern lifestyle accessory design, London-based accessories designer and trendsetter Jacqui Ma has created an exclusive range of bags that blend traditional with the modern.


How we do it

At OSTEN, we aim create bags for eternity: each OSTEN bag is 100% unique and durable. With our factory in Panyu, China we have access to best workmanship, quality and pricing. Crafted from weatherproof, recycled 1680D nylon, each bag is combined with rip-stop lining and double-reinforced seams on all corners and edges. This high quality workmanship combine with intricate design details crafted from Chinese posters ensure each bag is unique. Practical features ensure these high quality bags are functional for day to day use. There is plenty of room for larger items (laptop, iPads) and easily accessible pockets for all of your essentials.

Experience

As the OSTEN team has substantial experience in China manufacturing and is located in Asia we see very little risk from a supply chain perspective. The products are well designed and sampled, the production will be smooth and all the environmental requirements for international markets will be met. The proposed factory is ISO9001 certified and all the workers meet the requirements of the Chinese labour law.

We see potential challenges in the sales & marketing approach. As every product will be absolutely unique the SKU management is somewhat difficult for normal retailers and distributors. We therefore plan to focus on direct sales through web stores - this will keep the street price clean, the products in demand and increase the margin.

We therefore plan to focus on direct sales through web stores - this will keep the street price clean, the products in demand and increase the margin.

story:
周宇是一名文艺屌丝，窝在多伦多，每天在微信朋友圈发图发文，各种原创装逼法，获点赞无数以致忘乎所以。某天此人一觉醒来，觉得自己装得这么高大上不能浪费，遂沐浴焚香，拜托因地狗狗大神的威风，预备制作不完全装文艺指南一册，凡十二页外带封面封底，可作驱蚊避邪之用，当作月历使用也未尝不可。该册由本人亲自操刀设计，从全年的微信创作中选择照片，分别题词。鉴于各家成品制作服务起价都要十几二十刀外加税费，周宇决定自己动手制作并包邮，以成本价眷顾海内外同甘共苦的微友们，加拿大六刀、美国七刀，壕国也可以参与！
以下是微信照片示例，将会从大量类似水准的照片中选取。


Joeyl is an active WeChat user who posts beautifully composed pictures of everyday scenes with his iPhone. Appreciating and capturing extraordinary from the ordinary, is how he loves the city he lives and works in. This project is a little gift for his WeChat friends, and whoever is interested in a sampling the city of Toronto throughout the years.

story:
Hello and Guten Tag!

 My name is Wayne Artmann, an American fashion and hat designer living in Germany. In 2012, I turned my life long dream into reality I launched  Das Haberdasher, a brand of stylish and handcrafted line of hats that can be worn by anyone. Our product line of hats are hand crafted with personal care, using good quality materials in a social and ethical work environment.).


Last year I was hand selected from several hundred International Hat Designers, by the legendry Milliner Stephen Jones to participate in the "Hat Designer of the year" competition sponsored by The Hat Magazine. 

Out of over 300 internationally recognized Hat Designers, I can proudly say that my designs placed within the top ten. Since then I have sold my hats in Austria, England, and America (with the help of Patrons) to International Celebrities, performers and European nobility here in Germany.


After extensive research and test models, this year I am very excited to be releasing my 3rd hat collection. This special collection portrays my idea of European craftsmanship and mixing it with my American style. This will be a unisex collection that highlights the beauty of nature by incorporating new and unusual materials in dramatic ways that are not found in today’s hat designs.

With this new collection I am setting dreams even higher and pushing myself even further. With your help I would like to launch my upcoming hat collection

Berlin's International Fashion Week SS15

This July 8 thru 10 the progressive Berlin fashion trade show “SEEK” will open their doors once again to designers. Displaying my collection at this fashion trade show will allow me the opportunity to grow my business by meeting, discussing and selling my collections to retail professionals. This in turn will be the start of customers being able to buy my hats in retail boutiques and store.

(Click on the video above to see what happens inside this trade event)

“SEEK is a progressive contemporary fashion trade show in Berlin. Since setting up shop in 2009, we have presented our ever-growing audience with new labels, and re-introduced old brands to new customers. Our biannual shows are focused on modern clothes for independent minds.”

                 


In order to participate in the SEEK tradeshow I will need to build and prepare a website for review that exudes the quality and high end styling that my hats are known for. Plus I will need to raise the money for a booth package where I can display and sell my hats directly to boutique and retail buyers. Spaces are extremely limited in this show and I have to get approved early.

Your patronage of 5 euros or more will help me in reaching my goal for the 3 day fashion event in Berlin. The collected funds will help me to cover the following.

  • A booth package for 2-5 sqm ,
  • Table and 2 chairs for seating
  • Display tables
  • Hat display stands
  • Hat boxes
  • Funding for the new Das Haberdasher website.
  • Photography and editing

As a Patron of my campaign I want to give you something in return for your contribution...to the right is a list of fun “perks” which you will receive in return for your wonderful contribution.


Any and all of your contributions are most welcomed. And each one puts me one step closer to reaching my goal. If however, I do not meet my goal, naturally it will prolong my launch for at least another 6 months to a year. But the monies that are contributed will still be used for launching Das Haberdasher as a web based hat Design Company. And in hopes, the financial contributions will allow me the chance to bring a new collection to Berlin Fashion week in January 2015.

I understand that some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help my campaign:

  • Please forward my campaign to friends, a family member or crazy hat person!!

Thank you for stopping by

Wayne

story:
Bureh Belts = Beautiful Cloth + Recycled Metal + Social Mission                 www.bureh.com

 

Want to join our mission? Get a Belt:

  1. Check out our belt catalogue and choose a belt.
  2. Select a perk on IndieGogo and donate to Bureh. The perks are listed to the the right of these instructions.
  3. NOTE: IndieGogo will NOT ask you to specify your belt at the time of payment. As the funding campaign reaches it's goal (fingers crossed!), we'll send you an email asking you to select which belts, buckles and sizes you want.

Done! Our metal workers and tailors in Sierra Leone will begin working on your belt, and we will ship it to the address you specified.

If you have a question, email us on info@bureh.com and we'll get back to you within 48 hours.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hey Indiegogo, 

Thanks for checking out our project. It’s been a lot of work and a lot of fun getting to this point, and we’re really excited to share Bureh with you. We’ve been making belts in Sierra Leone for over a year now and are proud to share our work. We're hoping to use Indiegogo to produce the next batch of Bureh Belts. 

If our campaign is successful, we’ll be able to have the funds to employ Sierra Leonean blacksmiths and tailors fulltime working on our first shipment of belts. This will allow us to produce enough belts to set up an e-commerce site and approach retail outlets to carry our belts. 100% of money raised will go towards Bureh and Sierra Leone.

We’re looking forward to working with you, giving loads of rewards, and taking Bureh to the next step!

Gratefully,

Fatoma, Grant and Dan

 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Check out the info below, including:

  • What is Bureh?
  • How are the belts made?
  • Why Sierra Leone?
  • What does Bureh mean? Where does the name come from?
  • What belts can you get?
  • What are the other rewards?
  • Meet the People
  • Additional Notes (aka Fun Facts)

 

What is Bureh?

Bureh is an ethical fashion company. We make beautiful belts, each one handcrafted in Sierra Leone to the highest quality. We are about sharing Sierra Leonean fashion: its bright colors and playful patterns. We are also about re-investing HALF of profits back into Sierra Leone's enterprises. Our mission is to strengthen Sierra Leone's manufacturing sector hands-on, by working directly with, training and investing in it. 

We train and employ Sierra Leonean craftsmen, skilled tailors and blacksmiths, to make Bureh belts using designs handpicked by us. Our cloth comes from the vibrant and living streets of Freetown, and our buckles are custom made for us using recycled metals.

 

How are the Belts made?

Step 1: Source the fabric.

We work with two types of fabric: batik and country cloth. We buy our batik from local trader women at local markets.

 

The country cloth we buy from weavers in the provinces. They literally unravel unwanted clothing from the second-hand markets and recycle the threads to produce country cloth. Talk about re-purposing unwanted items! Country cloth is traditionally worn by Chiefs and other respected members in Sierra Leone. Pretty cool stuff.

 

Step 2: Make the buckle

We work with a workshop of metal workers in the east of Freetown to hand make each of our buckles. Sheku’s workshop is impressive not just for the quality of its work but the value of its social mission. The workshop works exclusively with people with disabilities--a typically marginalized population in Sierra Leone--and trains them to be blacksmiths. Typically polio survivors and/or amputees, these blacksmiths are known to be some of the best in Freetown.

They use recycled metals—often used car parts—to create our hand crafted buckles. These come in two styles: D-ring buckles (1.5” wide; steel) and traditional buckles (1” wide; brass).

Step 3: Tailoring

With buckle and fabric, our tailors get to work. They prepare the fabric and the webbing rope that fills our belts. The webbing rope gives our belts flexibility and strength. Our tailors use foot-peddled sewing machines to help with the work and hand stitch parts of the belts. Each belt is made one at a time, from start to finish by one tailor, paying attention to every detail. The result is one, hand-crafted, vibrant Bureh Belt.

Osman, our head tailor

 

Why Sierra Leone? 

Daniel: I moved to Sierra Leone in 2009 to work for the Jameel Poverty Action Lab, an MIT based research group. The lab sent me to Sierra Leone. It was an accident and the luckiest thing that could have happened. I immediately fell in love with the country. 

Sierra Leone doesn't have a good reputation, driven by civil war, Blood Diamond (the Leo movie), and poverty. What I found was very different. 

Sierra Leone is a country of stunning natural beauty and a great fashion sense. Yes, Sierra Leone is also extremely poor, but that’s not the reputation it deserves. It should be known for its beauty, its fashion and its people. We want to try and make that happen. 

 

What does Bureh mean? Where does the name come from? 

Bai Bureh was a legendary Sierra Leonean chief from the 1890s. He lead a revolt against the British over a “Hut Tax” the British tried to institute. His legacy is undeniably complicated but he represents Sierra Leonean pride and national identity. Bureh Beach, our favorite beach, is named after Bai Bureh. The beach represents the raw beauty of Sierra Leone. 

Together, Bureh represents the pride and beauty of Sierra Leone (plus, it doesn’t hurt to think of all the good times we’ve spent at Bureh Beach!) 

 

 

What belts can you get?

Any of the patterns you've seen in the video or below are available. VIEW OUR FULL CATALOGUE HERE to see the full line of belts that are available. Note: All styles are limited editions.

You can combine them with either style of buckle. The first image below has our two buckle types: D-rings (1.5 inches wide) and traditional buckles (1 inch wide).

Our two buckle types are featured below:

Blue Hex with a D-Ring buckle, Blue Diamonds on Yellow with a traditional brass buckle

Black and White Up Line

Primary Colours

Blue Hex

Black and Gold Squared

Want to see more? Check out our full selection on our CATALOGUE!

 

 

What are the other rewards?

We are offering custom made belts. We can have our weavers specifically make different country cloth styles for you (typically vertical and horizontal stipes), or we can hunt the markets for the pattern and colors that you like. 

For an extra $15 on any belt, we offer personalized initialing. Awesome for gifts. 

Our favorite award is for $270. Have a line of belts named after you. Moving forward, as we follow Freetown's fashion, we'll be adding new styles to our production cycle. We'll work together to choose one that we both like and it will be your line, forever. 

And of course, the most exciting award: a personalized tour of Sierra Leone for you and a friend. We'll work together to customize a tour to meet your needs. If you have any questions on this, please shoot us a message on info@bureh.com. Always happy to talk over everything.

 

Meet the team

Fatoma Momoh was born in Kenema, in the east of Sierra Leone. He works as a research assistant for Innovations for Poverty Action in Freetown, Sierra Leone and is Head of Production for Bureh. 

Grant Bridgman lived in Freetown from 2011 - 2012 working for Innovations for Poverty Action. He now works for their sister organization, the MIT Jameel Poverty Action Lab, out of their Africa regional office in Cape Town, South Africa.

Daniel Heyman lived in Freetown from 2009 - 2011, also working for Innovations for Poverty Action and MITs Jameel Poverty Action Lab. He is now a fellow at MITs Legatum Center, which focuses on entrepreneurship in developing countries. He is a first year at MITs Sloan School of Management. 

 

Additional Notes (aka Fun Facts)

  • Bureh makes exclusively Vegan products. 
  • Bureh belts are airport security friendly!
  • Bureh Beach is the only beach in Sierra Leone where you can surf!
  • In case you're curious, Sierra Leone's civil war ended a decade ago. The country has been at peace since, with presidential elections every 5 years. The next one is this coming November/December.

story:
Our Story 

Bevin Vignola and Christine Syquia have been lifelong friends. They met working at Nordstrom fresh out of art school almost twenty years ago.  While Bevin continued on in management with Nordstrom and eventually left the company with the birth of her first child, Christine moved on to a variety of companies eventually starting a handbag company in 2003.  Christine's company grew into a multi-million dollar,  international company however, the global economic downturn forced Christine's handbag company to close two years.  A year ago, Bevin and Christine started to join forces. While Bevin was home raising her family she was always creating-photographs, jewelry and fun accessories for her daughter's hair. When Christine saw her designs she knew Bevin had a future. 

The Bohemien Joyeux accessories are statement pieces.  


What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is $15,000.  Your pledge through INDIEGOGO will cover the cost of doing the show in New York (approximately $8,500 for the trade show alone) as well as all of the marketing materials associated with promoting a launch in fashion.  A portion of these funds will be used for our sampling costs for our small leather collection-buying raw materials and paying our local contractors to make a full collection of samples. 


The Impact

The reason we are trying to raise the funding is to have a strong presence at the trade show.  The funds will be used to generate marketing materials and to have a full collection of our samples to be on example at our booth. Currently, we are a small start-up and having a strong presence at this trade show will provide more exposure for our brand and allow our brand to continue to grow in the coming year.




     




   


   



While we are in a showroom in Dallas and are starting to gain a presence, it is critical that we find a New York showroom and by having a strong trade show and a full collection of samples, we will be able to demonstrate to showrooms that our company is viable.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Help spread the word about Bohemien Joyeux, join our Facebook page and tell your friends and leave a comment. We are also on Twitter and of course, our website where you can sign up for our mailing list. 


We really appreciate your support, donations and help in spreading the word about Bohemien Joyeux. 




Thank you!

xoxo,

Bevin & Christine

story:
Welcome!

Hello and thank you for taking the time to visit our campaign here on IndieGoGo. We are very glad to have found about IndieGoGo and all the cool people here. Join Yadu as we unfold bags you've never seen before!

What is Yadu?

Yadu is a lifestyle brand that embodies the spirit of diversity and freedom. We make bags that are eco-friendly and unique, meaning nothing repeats itself! Having a Yadu bag means you are the only person that has that bag in the entire universe!

Yadu stems from a family of artists, musicians, and trendsetters in The Philippines. Its founder who is also my father, Yadu Saulo, started making bags as a hobby 36 years ago to fulfill his travel needs. This hobby then turned into a bag company he was not expecting. The company then was named Khumbmela. For more than 25 years, he continually established the Khumbmela brand that left an indelible mark in people's hearts. Khumbmela was well known for making outdoor bags and staging majestic events.

Four years ago, he came to discover an idea that touched the very core of his heart. The family collaborated on the idea and finally established Yadu around the principle of sustainability. From this idea, materialized a will to help Mother Earth and reestablish our love for her with the way our products are made and the message we deliver.

Yadu embraces the same philosophy that Khumbmela has lived on throughout the years. While Khumbmela personified the spirit of artistic gathering in its era, it’s offspring, Yadu, ushers a new lifestyle brand with the same distinct attitude founded upon the Khumbmela praxis. In Yadu, life is happening!

Why Help Yadu?

This campaign is born with the will to increase awareness of using eco-friendly and recycled products. By helping Yadu, you are connecting with your grassroots. This is a simple means to help Mother Nature and benefit your everyday needs at the same time. There are lots of activities around sustainability and helping Mother Nature, but we believe that giving help can never be measured and has no end. We, at Yadu, also want to be a part of that by doing what we do best. You can also help Yadu by sharing our message across your friends and families! Any type of help is highly appreciated. And from the depths of our hearts, we would like to give you our warmest thanks! :)

Product Details

  • A Yadu bag is unique and personalized. No bag repeats itself. If you buy a Yadu bag, you are the only person in the entire world that has that particular bag.

  • Yadu bags are composed of 75%- 95% recycled materials, mainly of old fabrics, such as jeans, jackets, and dresses.

  • Most Yadu bags like shopping bags are reversible which gives the advantage of buying two bags in one price.

  • The quality of Yadu bags is the result of the 36 years of research and study since its originator started. Many of Khumbmela's bags in the 80s still exist today! Use 'em, beat 'em, wash 'em, Yadu bags will endure! :)

  • Compare with other bags, Yadu bags are gentler to the skin.

Shipping Details

Depending on your location, it may take up to 2-3 weeks for you to receive your wonderful bags. However, this will be dependent upon the campaign's success. It should be worth the wait! And, there's NO additional shipping cost! :)

Facts about Yadu

  • We have our own store located in Manila, Philippines. Our store too was constructed from recycled materials, from doors to floors. We are much inspired by a sustainable living that benefits Mother Nature and caters to peoples needs.
  • The name Yadu comes from the historical Indo-Aryan language, Sanskrit. It is a dynasty of ancient warriors and saints in India.
  • Yadu is more than a bag company. It is a lifestyle brand. We also create events that support independent artists, musicians, and groups that aim towards a healthy lifestyle and sustainable living. Overall our goal is to establish a fun atmosphere.
  • The Saulo Family, founders of Yadu, are all vegetarians! Yadu himself has been a vegetarian for more than 30 years and all his sons and daughters, since birth! (no meat, fish, or eggs)

What People Say About Yadu

People fall in love with our bags the first time they see them. Many bloggers wrote about us and I included links to their heart-warming feedbacks for your eyes only. :)

  • Kate Alvarez of www.KateWasHere.com
  • Robx of www.TheCreativeDork.com
  • Dani of DaniAustria Blog
  • Kara of Kaiaohsnaps
  • Blogger of www.biloggirl.com
  • Blogger of www.loveisamutt.com
  • Blogger of www.ArtistAko.com
  • You can also click HERE to find more.
 
We would like to give special thanks and recognition to Marc Louguee for some very nice photos provided and bloggers at TheCreativeDork, WhileMortalsSleep, LoveIsAMutt, Ibosquejo, and Eunicena for taking wonderful photographs of Yadu.

FAQs

Do you make leather bags or incorporate leather in your bags?

We don't support usage of leather in anyway being a family of vegetarians. However, occasionally we come across old clothes made of leather which we integrate with the bags. 

Do you make fur bags or incorporate fur with your bags?

We only use and incorporate synthetic fur with our bags. However, occasionally, we come across old clothes made of real fur which we integrate with the bags.

Aren't your bags frail since they're all made with recycled clothes?

Our bags are not completely 100% recycled. We fuse in stronghold materials such as nylon and canvass to achieve a 999% sturdiness then we bind them all together with our magical sewing techniques! We also use extra-durable YKK accessories, such as zippers, sliders, and locks to work with our bags.

Are Yadu bags washable?

Dry cleaning or hand washing is best to take good care of Yadu bags. It is not advisable to machine wash the bags.

Will Yadu be available in my country?

Yes, with your help of course! If you're interested in bringing Yadu bags to your country, you can email us at life@yadu621.com.

Do you have an online store?

We don't have an online store yet, but with your help in making this campaign successful, our path is directed towards making the world's best online shopping center for customized bags! :)

What does 621 mean in Yadu 621?

Our company name is Yadu 621, Inc. and 621 is my father's birth date, June 21. It is also the time of the year where we celebrate Yadu's biggest annual event.

Do Yadu bags have any warranty?

We actually offer a LIFETIME warranty with each bag local customers in the Philippines. As much as want to provide lifetime warranties on our bags overseas, it is currently not possible, but definitely this is in our list once we expand to other countries.

How Else can I contribute?

You can contribute by simply spreading the word about Yadu bags to your friends and family.

Is any of the Bags on the Catalogs Available?

If you spotted one in the catalog you fell in love with, chances are, it is no longer available. Our bags move fast! But we can definitely make something close to what you saw on our catalog. Our campaign on IndieGoGo caters specifically for custom orders, which we rarely offer to local customers in the Philippines.

Catalog

 

Sample Summary of Perks
