story:
Hello, I am Jelena, fashion designer, I started my Vilorija brand in 2012 in Paris, and presented my collections on Los Angeles Fashion Week and Berlin Fashion Week, and at the Cannes Film Festivals.


My fashion and art education was in Paris, where I have been living for many years, and where my Vilorija company is based.

The collection is now selling in Boutique and Art Gallery Friendly Society in Berlin. 

My first 2 Vilorija collections were very haute couture, with many handmade and luxury details, very expensive to make - so they had to be expensive.

But now I want to enrich my brand with wearable, pret-à-porter pieces, and to make it more accessible.

I’m preparing a very beautiful and attractive new collection – which will be also very wearable and practical.

The new collection will be consisted of 2 parts:

1. Pret-à-porter pieces - that anyone can wear to look simple but very chic, casually-elegant and beautiful in any occasion

2. A few luxury unique pieces – very special and artistic gowns and cocktail dresses - for red carpets, glamorous events, and also for artistic projects, music videos etc.

With the new collection I have very serious plans to make the great success and business- and to establish my brand Vilorija as new important Parisian fashion brand.

I have some strong ideas how to really make it.

But now I need the support and help to finance the production of my new collection.

All I managed to do with my Vilorija brand by now is made of huge hard work, of lots of passion, love, dreams, courage and enthusiasm, working with friends and wonderful talented open-minded people all over the world.

My work with all artists, models, actors, photographers, painters, musicians, etc, who participated in various creative projects and presentations of my collections, was always based on mutual inspiration, exchange of ideas and creativity, and strong belief to make something great together.

With my Vilorija brand I’m trying to bring something beautiful, new and fresh to the World Fashion - and I was investing all I had to make it.

I achieved quite a lot with only very small budget that I had as investment with which I had to make everything, to start and establish my brand.

On the market I have to compete with many rich fashion companies. Many of them invest huge (often unreasonable) money in marketing and promotion - so it is very hard to make it without money, trying to do it all just with talent, passion and huge work.

I am producing my dresses in the ateliers of tailors in Paris and in Belgrade, wonderful women with more than 30 years of professional experience, who love their work and do it always top quality, making each dress and each piece with a lot of love.

Our goal is to execute each detail on each piece with absolute perfection, inside and out.

If you want to help me to continue to exist as a fashion designer, to establish my brand and to make success with my new Vilorija collection - I will appreciate a lot all your support.

New, fresh and great fashion brand from Paris can be established - thank you for helping and for being part of it!

Love

Jelena

WHAT VILORIJA NEEDS MONEY FOR?

1. To pay the pattern maker – for making professional industrial patterns of all the pieces of the new collection

2. To pay tailors – for sewing and producing the prototypes of the new collection

3. To pay all materials for making of the new collection, all fabrics, linens, embroidered bands, decorative details etc.

4. To produce materials with unique Vilorija prints designed by Jelena – which will make the collection very chic, special and beautiful.

 (for producing personal print designs on materials the minimum order is 20 meters per print design)

5. To produce beautiful embroidered bands – with unique and special embroideries designed by Jelena.

(for producing personal designed embroideries, the minimum order is 50 meters of bands per embroidery design)

6. To pay all the shipping costs, customs, etc.

7. If we collect more – it would help to make even more creative collection! – to also invest a little bit more in making some luxury, very special pieces of the new Vilorija collection. Like very special and artistic and wonderful Vilorija gowns, for styling film stars for red carpets on Cannes Film Festival (where Vilorija already showcased twice, and where she is always very well received), and on film events in Hollywood. And also to make very artistic and creative costumes for musicians, for concerts and music videos (Jelena is working with many fantastic musicians, who are her wonderful inspiring friends in Berlin, Belgrade, Paris etc)

It would also help to make more prototypes of the pret-à-porter collection in all sizes – to have it immediately ready for all Vilorija’s clients.

8. To also produce Vilorija men’s collection!

In Vilorija “I’ll Be Your Mirror” collection there were a few men’s coats, which were made to complete mostly women’s collection, as beautiful “mirrors” of the women.

As the collection was inspired by Velvet Underground song “I’ll Be Your Mirror”, the most beautiful Love song, which describes Love as being the mirror of the partner.

These few men’s pieces were not very pret-à-porter – they were more artistic and conceptual, to complete the beautiful mirror story of the collection.

But for the new collection Jelena is planning to also design a great pret-à-porter men’s collection – a complete, wearable, at the same time very elegant but also casual, very strong and beautiful collection for men.

PLANS FOR PRESENTING THE NEW COLLECTION

When the new collection is made – the plan is to present it with very attractive fashion show - either on L.A. Fashion Week (where Vilorija started to show her first 2 collections) - or on New York Fashion Week, or on Paris Fashion Week, or on Berlin Fashion Week - depending on the timing when the collection will be ready.

ABOUT THE BRAND VILORIJA

Vilorija is a fresh and new, upcoming luxury brand started in Paris, by designer Jelena Vujanovic.

Vilorija presented her collections on Los Angeles Fashion Week and on Berlin Fashion Week, and is now based in Paris, L.A. and Berlin.

Vilorija “Blume” collection was presented with runway show on L.A. Fashion Week 2013.

It was very well received by media and members of the press. 

Described as chic, Parisian, feminine, classy, aristocratic and elegant. 

"The Vilorija line crosses femininity with a chic Parisian edge" - Lucky Contributor Magazine.

In 2012, Vilorija debuted her collection "I’ll Be Your Mirror” on L.A. Fashion Week at the famed Gower Studios in Hollywood.


Vilorija’s collections were presented at the Cannes Film Festival in 2012 and 2013. 

During the Cannes Film Festival 2012 collection was presented in Hotel Carlton, exclusively to A-list celebrities.

Among many actresses and celebrities who liked a lot Vilorija line, also Paris Hilton, a fan of the line, left Cannes with the entire Vilorija collection.

Cannes Film Festival 2012 –French actress Julie Ferrier - actor Lambert Wilson – Hollywood and French actress Delphine Chaneac

At the 2013 Cannes Film Festival Vilorija had runway presentation at the famous luxury Villa Oxygène, an event was organized by the Jackson Family Foundation.

It was a project with a French artist (painter) Frank Katz, who made his special paintings on the dresses and men coats of Vilorija collection – transforming each piece in the piece of art, with his unique paintings on it.

For Jelena fashion is art – and she is always inspired to work and exchange ideas with many wonderful artists – to make fashion more multi-media and to connect it with different art forms.

ABOUT VILORIJA DESIGNER, JELENA VUJANOVIC

Vilorija designer Jelena Vujanovic graduated fashion design in Paris, in prestigious fashion academy Studio Berçot.

She also studied at Academy of Fine Arts in Belgrade, and attended intensive fashion design courses at Saint Martin's College of Art and Design in London.

Besides fashion, she also studied Fine Arts in Paris at famous Sorbonne University, and also graduated Chinese language and literature at Belgrade University.

Before starting brand Vilorija, Jelena worked in Paris for some prestigious Parisian fashion designers, and gained lots of very refined and precious experience.

Among the others, she worked as assistant in creation studio of Parisian designer Jean Charles de Castelbajac (http://jc-de-castelbajac.com), who has always been one of Jelena’s favorite designers, with his Pop Art style and multi-media artistic work.

She was very lucky to work for one of her forever-favorite designers, famous Parisian luxury lingerie designer Fifi Chachnil (http://fifichachnil.com/fr)  - as her main assistant for the collection that she designed for Crazy Horse Paris (http://www.lecrazyhorseparis.com/fr)

Jelena is also specialized for designing the luxury lingerie.

Her final book with which she graduated Fashion Design at Studio Berçot in Paris was lingerie collection, inspired by Betty Boop and Betty Page – a very feminine, sexy but very refined, playful and cute luxury lingerie collection.

Jelena is planning to realize these designs and to make Vilorija lingerie collection – just after making the new collection that she is preparing now.

After the graduation she was very lucky to meet her favorite lingerie designer Fifi, with whom Jelena had so much in common, so they immediately developed very friendly and very inspiring relation, and she became her main assistant for the collection for Crazy Horse Paris.

Working for Fifi and Crazy Horse was a huge pleasure and very precious experience for Jelena’s development as designer.

They kept great friendly relation, and Fifi was very supportive and encouraging when Jelena started her Vilorija brand, which meant really a lot to Jelena.

Described in one of the articles in press as “Citizen of The World”, Jelena is a big traveler, inspired by beauty and charm of various cities.

"I'll Be Your Mirror" - Velvet Underground 

Jelena usually finds initial inspiration in music, and likes to dedicate her collections to songs that inspired her – 2013 collection was “I’ll Be Your Mirror”, named by Lou Reed’s Velvet Underground song, and 2014 collection was “Blume” (Flower) - named by a beautiful song by Berlin band Einsturzende Neubauten.

"Blume" - Einsturzende Neubauten


Jelena is born in Belgrade, the capital of Serbia and of ex-Yugoslavia.

Belgrade is the city full of wonderful creative energy, where Jelena grew up in very happy, beautiful and inspiring artistic and intellectual environment, hanging with many wonderful artists, musicians, writers, etc.

Which formed Jelena’s character and style, and which Jelena always loves and carries in her heart.

But Belgrade has also been through very tough times, due to very unfortunate, in-understandable and sad events in recent history, which caused the falling apart of Yugoslavia, wonderful country in which Jelena grew up.

Jelena didn’t want to leave Belgrade during the most difficult times, she was there even during 3 months of bombing, and she actually decided to move and continue her life in Paris only when the situation in her hometown became more safe and stable.

After all the bad things that happened with her country, just being born in Serbia and having Serbian passport means to be actually condemned to the prison for the whole life - as without European papers you are not allowed to freely live, work and be anywhere in the world, out of the borders of the country in which you just happened to be born.

So, while trying to do her work and to bring something beautiful and happy to the world – at the same time Jelena has to struggle very hard all her life to just somehow have the basic human freedom to be in Europe and anywhere in the world.

And that freedom is the most important to Jelena, as an artist and passionate traveler, Citizen of The World, who lives and works very internationally, connecting different cultures, working with many wonderful creative people all over the world, and bringing her ideas and designs from Paris to many cities world-wide, in which she is successfully establishing her brand.

... "What costume shall the poor girl wear, to All Tomorrow’s Parties…"

– Velvet Underground song "All Tomorrow’s Parties" was inspiration for Jelena’s first collection – which she created when she studied fashion in Paris – and during the studies she went to Belgrade Fashion Week to show her first collection in her birth-town.

Financially it was always very difficult in the country where Jelena comes from.

She learned to live even almost totally without money, and to still be very positive and full of creativity and life.

As during the most difficult times no one in her country had money, but people were still strong and positive, and managed to be very stylish and to have quality life and lots of fun and happiness even with almost no money at all.

And now, when she is producing the collections for her Parisian fashion brand Vilorija – Jelena is very happy and proud to produce in Belgrade, her birth-city. 

Jelena is completely dedicated to designing, doing lots of artistic researches and very elaborate creating – and she is proud that her collections are being produced by experienced, highest quality professionals.

She is producing in the atelier of the tailors who are one of the highest quality in Europe, making each detail with absolute perfection.

When she is producing the prototypes of her collections she is working in atelier with her tailors, participating and carefully directing the making of each piece.

She is buying the materials for her collections in Paris, in beautiful fabric shops in Montmartre area and in Sentier, and also many beautiful decorative details in wonderful old traditional Parisian shops in Marais.

First she is developing her collections in Paris, working with talented Parisian students from the best schools of couture production, to make some of the first shapes of prototypes and patterns.

And also with great local Parisian tailors in old tailoring ateliers in Montmartre – where she develops the first initial pieces of her collections.

And than she brings it to the atelier in Belgrade, where she makes industrial patterns and the whole professional production of official, highest quality prototypes of her collections.

So the production is in Paris and in Belgrade.

And for bigger orders she is working with a factory in Serbia, in Arilje area, famous for the highest quality clothing factories in whole Europe.

Thanks to great clothing production industry, this entire area managed to develop very well their local economy, which is rare and difficult in Serbia.

All people that Jelena works with - from tailors and pattern makers, to all artists, photographers, models, etc - it is always with warm hearted, friendly and loving relationships, always with some fun and lightness, and always in very caring way, full of mutual understanding.

Jelena invested all she could in materials and making of her first 2 collections – and now she needs help to finance the production of her new collection - to make something beautiful, fresh and big with her brand Vilorija.

Jelena is thinking big, dreaming big, and is ready to passionately follow her dreams, to work a lot, and to do everything and to go anywhere for her dreams and for the success of her work.

Jelena is full of inspiration and creative energy, has great ideas and many beautiful designs - and is ready to produce the fantastic new Vilorija collection!

If you like and support Jelena’s work as artist - and if you want to be the part of making success of her Vilorija brand – support this project as much as you can!

Jelena now needs support and help to finance the production of her new Vilorija collection - to make the great work and success, and to establish a big new name in the World Fashion.

Be the part of establishing of wonderful, fresh and new Parisian fashion brand!

Be stylish, be open-minded, be generous - be the part of art and creation – be the part of making the history and establishing something new and great in the World Fashion.

Support art and creativity – and help with bringing donations to this project as much as you can!

As Kersten Haines (the organizer of Berlin Fashion Week event, and now, after enjoying the great work together, also one of Jelena’s wonderful, very inspiring friends) says: - it’s all about the STYLE IT TAKES! 

(*the name of her Berlin Fashion Week event)

* STYLE IT TAKES is Lou Reed’s and John Cale’s song from their album about Andy Warhol (“Songs for Drella”) – which perfectly describes all about making the greatest things in art by exchanging creativities and possibilities - exchanging contacts, collaborations, inspirations – investing money in art and ideas and talents - and making happen big things in fashion and art history.

work.



I am
producing my dresses in the ateliers of tailors in Paris and in Belgrade, wonderful women with more than 30 years of
professional experience, who love their work and do it always top quality, making
each dress and each piece with a lot of love. 
Our goal is
to execute each detail on each piece with absolute perfection, inside and out.


If
you want to help me to continue to exist as a fashion designer, to establish my
brand and to make success with my new Vilorija collection - I will appreciate a
lot all your support.

New,
fresh and great fashion brand from Paris can be established - thank you for
helping and for being part of it!

Love
Jelena



WHAT
VILORIJA NEEDS MONEY FOR?
1. To pay the pattern maker – for
making professional industrial patterns of all the pieces of the new
collection
2. To pay tailors – for sewing and producing the prototypes of the new collection
3. To pay all materials for making of the new collection, all fabrics,
linens, embroidered bands, decorative details etc.
4. To produce materials with unique Vilorija prints designed by Jelena –
which will make the collection very chic, special and beautiful.
 (for producing personal print designs on materials the minimum order is 20 meters per print
design)
5. To produce beautiful embroidered bands – with unique and special
embroideries designed by Jelena.
(for producing personal designed embroideries, the minimum order is 50 meters of bands per
embroidery design)
6. To pay all the shipping costs, customs, etc.
7. If we collect more – it would help to make even more creative
collection! – to also invest a little bit more in making some luxury, very
special pieces of the new Vilorija collection. Like very special and artistic and wonderful Vilorija gowns, for
styling film stars for red carpets on Cannes Film Festival (where Vilorija
already showcased twice, and where she is always very well received), and on
film events in Hollywood. And also to make
very artistic and creative costumes for musicians, for concerts and music
videos (Jelena is working with many fantastic musicians, who are her wonderful
inspiring friends in Berlin, Belgrade, Paris etc)
It would also help
to make more prototypes of the pret-à-porter collection in all sizes – to have
it immediately ready for all Vilorija’s clients.
8. To also produce
Vilorija men’s collection! 

In Vilorija “I’ll
Be Your Mirror” collection there were a few men’s coats, which were made to
complete mostly women’s collection, as beautiful “mirrors” of the women. 
As the collection
was inspired by Velvet Underground song “I’ll Be Your Mirror”, the most
beautiful Love song, which describes Love as being the mirror of the partner.


These few men’s
pieces were not very pret-à-porter – they were more artistic and conceptual, to complete the beautiful mirror story of the collection.


But for the new
collection Jelena is planning to also design a great pret-à-porter men’s
collection – a complete, wearable, at the same time very elegant but also
casual, very strong and beautiful collection for men.


PLANS FOR PRESENTING THE NEW COLLECTION
When the new
collection is made – the plan is to present it with very attractive fashion
show - either on L.A. Fashion Week (where Vilorija
started to show her first 2 collections) - or on New York Fashion Week, or
on Paris Fashion Week, or on Berlin Fashion Week - depending on the
timing when the collection will be ready.


ABOUT THE BRAND VILORIJA
Vilorija is a fresh and new, upcoming luxury brand started in Paris, by designer Jelena Vujanovic.
Vilorija presented her
collections on Los Angeles Fashion Week and on Berlin Fashion
Week, and is now based in Paris, L.A. and Berlin.



Vilorija “Blume” collection was presented with runway
show on L.A. Fashion Week 2013.
It was very well received by media and members of the
press. 
Described as chic, Parisian, feminine, classy,
aristocratic and elegant. 
"The Vilorija line crosses femininity with a chic
Parisian edge" - Lucky Contributor Magazine.





In 2012, Vilorija debuted her collection "I’ll Be
Your Mirror” on L.A. Fashion Week at the famed Gower Studios in Hollywood.





Vilorija’s collections were presented at the Cannes
Film Festival in 2012 and 2013. 
During the Cannes Film Festival 2012 collection was
presented in Hotel Carlton, exclusively to A-list celebrities.





Among many actresses and celebrities who liked a lot
Vilorija line, also Paris Hilton, a fan of the line, left Cannes with the
entire Vilorija collection.





Cannes Film Festival 2012 –French actress Julie Ferrier - actor
Lambert Wilson – Hollywood and French actress Delphine Chaneac



At the 2013 Cannes Film Festival Vilorija had runway
presentation at the famous luxury Villa Oxygène, an event was organized by the
Jackson Family Foundation.







It was a project with a French artist (painter) Frank
Katz, who made his special paintings on the dresses and men coats of Vilorija
collection – transforming each piece in the piece of art, with his unique
paintings on it.

For Jelena fashion is art – and she is always inspired to work and exchange ideas with many wonderful artists – to make fashion more multi-media and to connect it with different art forms.

ABOUT VILORIJA DESIGNER, JELENA VUJANOVIC
Vilorija designer Jelena Vujanovic graduated fashion
design in Paris, in prestigious fashion academy Studio Berçot.
She also studied at Academy of Fine Arts in Belgrade,
and attended intensive fashion design courses at Saint Martin's College of Art
and Design in London.


Besides fashion, she also studied Fine Arts in Paris
at famous Sorbonne University, and also graduated Chinese language and literature
at Belgrade University.
Before starting brand Vilorija, Jelena worked in Paris
for some prestigious Parisian fashion designers, and gained lots of very
refined and precious experience.
Among the others, she
worked as assistant in creation studio of Parisian designer Jean Charles de
Castelbajac (http://jc-de-castelbajac.com), who has always been one of Jelena’s favorite
designers, with his Pop Art style and multi-media artistic work. 
She was very lucky to
work for one of her forever-favorite designers, famous Parisian luxury lingerie
designer Fifi Chachnil (http://fifichachnil.com/fr)  - as her main
assistant for the collection that she designed for Crazy Horse Paris (http://www.lecrazyhorseparis.com/fr)

Jelena is also
specialized for designing the luxury lingerie.
Her final book with
which she graduated Fashion Design at Studio Berçot in Paris was lingerie
collection, inspired by Betty Boop and Betty Page – a very feminine, sexy but
very refined, playful and cute luxury lingerie collection.
Jelena is planning to
realize these designs and to make Vilorija lingerie collection – just after
making the new collection that she is preparing now.

After the graduation
she was very lucky to meet her favorite lingerie designer Fifi, with whom
Jelena had so much in common, so they immediately developed very friendly and
very inspiring relation, and she became her main assistant for the collection
for Crazy Horse Paris.


Working for Fifi and
Crazy Horse was a huge pleasure and very precious experience for Jelena’s
development as designer.
They kept great
friendly relation, and Fifi was very supportive and encouraging when Jelena
started her Vilorija brand, which meant really a lot to Jelena.

Described in one of the articles in press as “Citizen
of The World”, Jelena is a big traveler, inspired by beauty and charm
of various cities.

"I'll Be Your Mirror" - Velvet Underground 
Jelena usually finds initial inspiration in music, and likes to dedicate her collections to songs that inspired her – 2013 collection was “I’ll Be Your Mirror”, named by Lou Reed’s Velvet Underground song, and 2014 collection was “Blume” (Flower) - named by a beautiful song by Berlin band Einsturzende Neubauten.

"Blume" - Einsturzende Neubauten



Jelena is
born in Belgrade, the capital of Serbia and of ex-Yugoslavia.
Belgrade is the
city full of wonderful creative energy, where Jelena grew up in very happy, beautiful and
inspiring artistic and intellectual environment, hanging with many wonderful artists,
musicians, writers, etc. 
Which formed Jelena’s character and style, and which Jelena always loves and
carries in her heart.

But
Belgrade has also been through very tough
times, due to very unfortunate, in-understandable and sad events in recent
history, which caused the falling apart of Yugoslavia, wonderful country in
which Jelena grew up.
Jelena
didn’t want to leave Belgrade during the most difficult times, she was there
even during 3 months of bombing, and she actually decided to move and continue
her life in Paris only when the situation in her hometown became more safe and
stable.

After all
the bad things that happened with her country, just being born in Serbia and
having Serbian passport means to be actually condemned to the prison for the
whole life - as without European papers you are not allowed to freely live,
work and be anywhere in the world, out of the borders of the country in which
you just happened to be born. 
So, while
trying to do her work and to bring something beautiful and happy to
the world – at the same time Jelena has to struggle very hard all her life to
just somehow have the basic human freedom to be in Europe and anywhere in the
world.

And that freedom is the most important to Jelena, as
an artist and passionate traveler, Citizen of The World, who lives and works
very internationally, connecting different cultures, working with many
wonderful creative people all over the world, and bringing her ideas and
designs from Paris to many cities world-wide, in which she is successfully
establishing her brand.

... "What costume
shall the poor girl wear, to All Tomorrow’s Parties…"
– Velvet Underground
song "All Tomorrow’s Parties" was inspiration for Jelena’s first collection –
which she created when she studied fashion in Paris – and during the studies
she went to Belgrade Fashion Week to show her first collection in her birth-town.

Financially
it was always very difficult in the country where Jelena comes from.
She
learned to live even almost totally without money, and to still be very
positive and full of creativity and life.
As
during the most difficult times no one in her country had money, but people
were still strong and positive, and managed to be very stylish and to have
quality life and lots of fun and happiness even with almost no money at all.
And
now, when she is producing the collections for her Parisian fashion brand
Vilorija – Jelena is very happy and proud to produce in Belgrade, her
birth-city. 

Jelena is
completely dedicated to designing, doing lots of artistic researches and very
elaborate creating – and she is proud that her collections are being produced
by experienced, highest quality professionals.
She is
producing in the atelier of the tailors who are one of the highest quality in
Europe, making each detail with absolute perfection.
When she is
producing the prototypes of her collections she is working in atelier with her
tailors, participating and carefully directing the making of each piece.
She is
buying the materials for her collections in Paris, in beautiful fabric shops in
Montmartre area and in Sentier, and also many beautiful decorative details in
wonderful old traditional Parisian shops in Marais.

First she is
developing her collections in Paris, working with talented Parisian
students from the best schools of couture production, to make some of the first
shapes of prototypes and patterns.
And also
with great local Parisian tailors in old tailoring ateliers in Montmartre –
where she develops the first initial pieces of her collections.

And than
she brings it to the atelier in Belgrade, where she makes industrial patterns
and the whole professional production of official, highest quality prototypes
of her collections. 
So the
production is in Paris and in Belgrade.
And for
bigger orders she is working with a factory in Serbia, in Arilje area, famous
for the highest quality clothing factories in whole Europe.
Thanks to
great clothing production industry, this entire area managed to develop very
well their local economy, which is rare and difficult in Serbia.


All people
that Jelena works with - from tailors and pattern makers, to all artists,
photographers, models, etc - it is always with warm hearted, friendly and
loving relationships, always with some fun and lightness, and always in very
caring way, full of mutual understanding.






Jelena
invested all she could in materials and making of her first 2 collections – and
now she needs help to finance the production of her new collection - to make
something beautiful, fresh and big with her brand Vilorija.

Jelena is
thinking big, dreaming big, and is ready to passionately follow her dreams, to
work a lot, and to do everything and to go anywhere for her dreams and for the success
of her work.

Jelena is
full of inspiration and creative energy, has great ideas and many beautiful
designs - and is ready to produce the fantastic new Vilorija collection!

If you like
and support Jelena’s work as artist - and if you want to be the part of making
success of her Vilorija brand – support this project as much as you can!

Jelena now
needs support and help to finance the production of her new Vilorija collection
- to make the great work and success, and to establish a big new name in the World
Fashion.

Be the part
of establishing of wonderful, fresh and new Parisian fashion brand!
Be stylish,
be open-minded, be generous - be the part of art and creation – be the part
of making the history and establishing something new and great in the World
Fashion.
Support art and creativity – and help
with bringing donations to this project as much as you can!

As Kersten
Haines (the organizer of Berlin Fashion
Week event, and now, after enjoying the great work together, also one of
Jelena’s wonderful, very inspiring friends) says: - it’s all about the
STYLE IT TAKES! 
(*the name of her Berlin Fashion Week event)
* STYLE IT TAKES is Lou Reed’s and John Cale’s song from their
album about Andy Warhol (“Songs for Drella”) – which perfectly describes all about making the greatest
things in art by exchanging creativities and possibilities - exchanging
contacts, collaborations, inspirations – investing money in art and ideas and
talents - and making happen big things in fashion and art history.

story:
Ahimsa

We are creating fashionable and functional ready-to-wear running apparel for women. We source as much of the work and materials from local/regional providers as possible. We are building the business as sustainably and responsibly as possible, doing business with like-minded people and companies.

We describe our aesthetic as contemporary, artistic and classic with an edge. We borrow from timeless design silhouettes to create functional running apparel that can transition to casual wear.  Our aim is to create running clothes that feel and look so good that women will not want to take them off after the run.

Ahimsa means “do no harm.” We aim to go beyond that spiritual directive and actually “do good” with a large portion of the proceeds of the business.  At least 2% of all net revenue will be donated to charities that serve health and human services, animal welfare and environmental causes. 

We are seeking funding to help with the start-up costs associated with manufacturing our first line, launching in Spring 2013. We need $25,000 to help with expenses related to development, production, and marketing. 

Ahimsa is about community and we want you to be part of it. Your donations will help make women's running apparel a fashion statement, not a fashion exception. We have special "Thank You's" lined up for Ahimsa donors.

Running changes people, it can have a positive impact on the world at large, too. Ahimsa running wear will not only add functional beauty to your running wardrobe, it will contribute to the betterment and health of the world at large. Clothes you can feel good in and feel good about wearing. 

Rachael Jamison and Teresa Loo, Ahimsa's founders, have over thirty years of combined experience in business, sustainability and running. Their combined skillsets are certain to yield success.  

Please help us spread the word about Ahimsa and about this unique opportunity to contribute to its early success.... 

"True ahimsa should mean a complete freedom from ill-will and anger and hate and an overflowing love for all." -Gandhi-

story:
Short Summary

  • Hello! I'm Heather. Texas born and raised graphic designer looking for some inspiration. I spend my days dreaming of traveling and I've recently found an opportunity to go to Ireland! Just need a little help in the funding department. 
  • As John Cheever said, “I’ve been homesick for countries I’ve never been, and longed to be where I couldn’t be.” Your contribution would mean more than you know. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Round trip tickets to Dublin are $1,000 (on a good day haha). We will be staying with my friend Patsy's family who live in Cork. The extra $1,000 is for passport/food/normal traveling expenses oh and possibly a souvenir for you!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • There are other ways you can help! Have flyer miles? Great advice? Wise words of traveling wisdom? I'll take that too :) 
    Bonus! You can help so much just by sharing this cause with the world and get the word out!

As John Cheever said, “I’ve been homesick for countries I’ve never been, and longed to be where I couldn’t be.” Your contribution would mean more than you know. 
What We Need & What You GetRound trip tickets to Dublin are $1,000 (on a good day haha). We will be staying with my friend Patsy's family who live in Cork. The extra $1,000 is for passport/food/normal traveling expenses oh and possibly a souvenir for you!Other Ways You Can HelpSome people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:There are other ways you can help! Have flyer miles? Great advice? Wise words of traveling wisdom? I'll take that too :) Bonus! You can help so much just by sharing this cause with the world and get the word out!

story:
Welcome!  We hope you will take some time and explore the website and the story behind Earring Renaissance.  If time is short and you want to contribute, please select a "perk" on the right-hand side by clicking on it and following the prompts to check out with Paypal or a credit card.  You can also select the large "Contribute Now" button.  We appreciate your support!

 

Give your unmatched "lonely" stud/post earrings new life as a beautiful necklace with the Earring Renaissance Pendant!                                                   

The Earring Renaissance pendant is an elegant solution to the lonely earring problem! This easy-change pendant system was made for someone who has lost a post-style earring and has one earring remaining. I created it because I wanted a solution to the lonely earring problem myself — it’s a problem I know all too well!  

Here's how it works: 

                              We offer two silver finishes and two gold finishes!




Many remaining earrings are heirlooms, sentimental and valuable, and they often sit forgotten in a jewelry box tucked away somewhere. With the Earring Renaissance pendant, you can showcase your forgotten heirloom treasures, as well as showcase your lonely earrings.

We've found that items such a father’s tie tack or a grandmother’s sorority pin often work perfectly on the pendant. Now they can be displayed beautifully with no modifications to the earring or pin needed!

So, you can get creative in your jewelry box to see what items will work on the pendant, and then showcase your treasured jewelry as a beautiful necklace! 

Here's what customers are saying:

Hold up your studs and post-style earrings to see the best finish for your lonely earrings -- these are actual size!



Each pendant has two sides (see above) and gives you two different design looks! The Earring Renaissance pendant is available in two silver finishes, Antique Silver and Classic Silver, and two gold finishes, Antique Gold and Classic Gold.  The silver pendants have a quality sterling silver plating, and the gold pendants have a quality 14K-gold plating.  

We're inviting you to help create a special run of limited-edition pendants, handmade by U.S. artisans that will help you reconnect to your heirloom treasures and lonely earrings.  

We're offering presales of the Earring Renaissance pendant along with an option to have the pendant gift wrapped and mailed to the person of your choice in time for the holidays.  This is truly a one-of-a-kind gift for someone special!

You will be helping to create this limited edition of Earring Renaissance pendants with your purchase.  Thank you for joining us on this journey to help showcase our collective lonely earrings!

COLOR, COLOR, COLOR! Rev up your wardrobe with color options!


We want to honor our supporters and provide you with awesome service and perks!

All donors starting at $10 and upwards will receive our newsletter the "Earring Ren News", which will not only give you weekly updates on the campaign while it is up and running (Aug. 5 - Sept. 5, 2015), but we will make some surprise announcements via the newsletter -- goodies that you will want to be in on!

"Thank You" Wall of Support:  All donors from $10 upwards will be listed on the Earring Renaissance Wall of Community Support and will be acknowledged for helping build the Earring Renaissance Community!  Thank you, thank you!  The wall will be created 3-4 weeks after the campaign ends, possibly sooner.  We'll keep you posted.

What's included in the box?

The Earring Renaissance pendant will be packaged in a gift box with corresponding silver or gold-plated necklace chain, special cushioning earring backs to secure the earring inside the pendant, and a the recently unveiled game-changing element of COLOR  that is our FREE gift to you -- to thank you for purchasing the pendant in our limited-edition run (August 5 - September 5, 2015).  If you are on the fence at all, the 12 color inserts will make you want to get this pendant innovation for yourself, so take advantage of our great deals as soon as you can. And you will receive our grateful appreciation for helping build this community and create these special pendants.

Each pendant will include a 10 percent a discount coupon good for one year of shopping through the EarringRenaissance.com website. So, If you get the two-pendant special, you will receive 2 x 10 percent discount coupons, which combined would be 20 percent off a future purchase of a single item! Also, each pendant order will have its own set of 12 color inserts (yes, the game-changer you can't live without), so if you want to purchase one for yourself and give another away, you will have the free gift to pass along as well as one 10 percent off coupon.  Please see our perks on the right side of this page  If you want three pendants, you will need to select a combination of one and two-pendant perks. See our perk for adding elegant gift wrapping and a small gift card acknowledging your gift... "For Bianca, Love Mick." Get your shopping done early this year! Each pendant includes instructions on how to use it and will reference the website for an instructional video.

Laura's Giclée Reproductions:  

The word Giclée describes the remarkable, high-quality reproduction process that makes these reproductions look identical to the original oil painting -- they are of the highest caliber. I guess this reflects how picky I am when it comes to art and things my name is attached to! I worked with the people in the lab to create these reproductions, advising on color and comparing them to the original until I was completely satisfied. There are less expensive services, but these reproductions are far superior. I know, I've tried others.

These limited-edition reproductions will be on canvas, hand stretched on wooden frames by the artist, and carefully packed along with your certificate of authenticity. Shipping will be premium with insurance, likely a two to three-day FedEx service or similar. We will ship in early December (in time for the holidays). The reproductions are standard sizes, which means it's easy and affordable to get a standard-sized open frame with no custom framing needed. They are the perfect size for any home--not too big, not too small.

Donors at this level also receive a coupon for 20 percent off a future purchase of a single item (good for one year) of shopping through the EarringRenaissance.com website, the weekly Earring Ren Newsletter and a prominent level of recognition on the "Thank You" wall on the website. Thank you so much for supporting us at this significant level!


 Sunflowers and Red Tulips, Limited Edition Giclée, 16 x 20 inches by Laura Powers

Callalilies and Garden Arch, Limited Edition Giclée, 18 x 22 inches by Laura Powers

The Movie Mogul Perk!  
This perk is to name your own movie and tell your story or your family's story! This will be as unique as you are and is easier and more fun than writing a book. It could be a great gift for a milestone birthday or to leave family history details for generations to come. A team member will come to you in the U.S. and interview you and up to two others. This will be a two-camera shoot, and the result will be a personal, 20-minute HD video with beginning-and-end credits and music (the interviews and photos professionally edited). Your photos are welcome, and we can include up to 20 photos in this personalized perk. Our team member will fly to your locale and treat you like the movie mogul you are! Because this is our biggest perk, we will also let you choose your four favorite pendants to keep as a special gift from us. Just to clarify, this is "your" video. It will not be used by us for promotional purposes. You will also get our "Earring Ren" weekly newsletter and your name at the highest level on our "Wall Of Thanks" on the Earring Renaissance website. Our "mega-mogul thank you" and eternal gratitude for selecting this high-level perk!



We would love to hear your stories! -- Please share them on our Facebook page, (www.Facebook.com/EarringRenaissance) and send us your photos once you start creating your own looks with the Earring Renaissance pendants! 



The Earring Renaissance team has minimized the risks to you. We have spent more than two years doing intensive prep work for this product launch and Indiegogo campaign.  We have already ordered and reviewed samples of the Earring Renaissance pendant to ensure the quality of the U.S. artisan team that will be creating the pendants. We've just placed a medium-sized order, and they are standing by to create as many pieces as needed for this campaign. Note: There is a limited number of pendants offered during this campaign (Aug. 5 - Sept. 5, 2015)  so that we would be able to take care of our early supporters. We have done our homework and are ready to fulfill our commitment!   

Mailing and shipping:  We will be using the U.S. Postal Service for mailing our carefully wrapped pendants, and our boxes will be sent with tracking just in case we need to see what the status is. We will alert you when the packages are shipped and keep you updated along the way.  The painting reproductions will be shipped using a premium service, such as Fed-Ex 2 or 3 day shipping, the packages will be trackable and they will be insured.

If our funding goal is met then your purchases will be activated and you cards will be charged for your purchase, and the wheels will turn for us to gladly fulfill the requested perks.  If the funding is not met in total, then you will be notified and your cards will not be charged.  We will keep you posted on future plans in either case.


This is Phase I of two phases of the Earring Renaissance product launch. We are currently designing a second pendant that will easily showcase your dangle-style earrings. All types of earrings will be able to have a collective "Renaissance."

We plan to earn your trust and deliver on Phase One before heading into the second pendant solution for dangle earrings. If we go well beyond our initial fundraising goal, we may be able to fund moving forward with the second piece.  We will keep you posted!

Our expenses include a website, promotional infrastructure, advertising, promotional videos, a product animation video, staff, inventory of pendants, gift boxes, peripheral necklace chains and supplies, shipping boxes, and packing materials and packing fulfillment. They all come into play, totaling $10,150 to $10,800. 

The Earring Renaissance pendant system is also in the process of being patented, and the typical patent attorney fees and filing fees are easily more than $10,000. Our costs are lower because Laura did the patent drawings and the provisional patent herself.  So the question may be, why are you only needing $6,000?  Well, this project is also about building community and getting valuable feedback from you. We believe we are working with an attainable amount and want to build our product line one step at a time, as we build your trust.  If this vision resonates with you and you embrace what the Earring Renaissance pendant can do for our collective lonely earrings, we are on our way.  We are grateful for your important role in this journey! 


Whether you want to give $10 to show your support or to purchase a pendant, you will be helping to bring this project to life.  If you are not able to contribute here are some way you can help us with the campaign:

* You can help get the word out!  We'd  be grateful if you shared the video on Twitter (www.Twitter.com/EarringRen),   #EarringRen    #EarringRenGiveaway

Facebook  (www.Facebook.com/EarringRenaissance) 

or Pinterest (www.Pinterest.com/EarringRen). 

* You can also share your story about a treasured heirloom or share a "lonely earring story" on Facebook.  We really appreciate your help in letting others know about the pendant -- Go team!

*  And, sharing is easy with Indiegogo share tools!

"As a gift, it would provide my mother the opportunity to reconnect with special events and treasured memories of the people she loves." -- Charles H.
"I just asked my wife about this the other day -- What do you do with all of those remaining earrings when you lose one? She said she keeps them in a little box, but it was clear they didn't get used. She would be delighted to be able to wear them again -- I think this pendant is a great idea! " -- Morris G.

Q:  Will all pendants be shipped in time for the holidays?  

A:  Yes, we anticipate the pedants shipping in late November. The pendants that had the gift wrap perk will be mailed by the 11th of December, so they will reach their destination in plenty of time for the holidays but not too early (November).  If you would like your gift pendant shipped later in November when the other pendants are shipped, please let us know and we'll take care of it.  

Q: When will the painting reproductions ship?  

A: The painting reproduction will also ship by Dec. 11, so they will also be there in time for gift giving, and will be insured and shipped via Fed-Ex two or three-day or similar.  Each reproduction will be insured for $300, and also comes with a Certificate of Authenticity, signed by the artist and a 20% discount coupon.

Q: Will there be instructions in the pendant box?

A: Yes, there will be instructions showing you how to use your pendant.  We will also refer you to our product video that shows how the pendant is used. Instructions will be included in all pendant orders, including the gift-wrapped orders.

Q: Will the 10 percent off coupon for the pendants be digital or a physical coupon?

A:  Good question! The 10 percent coupons for the pendants will be physical coupons mailed with your pendant. The coupons are good for 10 percent off a single item through the  www.earringrenaissance.com  website (good for one year).  Since we are already shipping the pendants, enclosing a coupon makes sense.

Q: Didn't I read about digital coupons?  

A: Yes, the first two perks at the $10 and $20 level do not include a pendant, and the donors receive a digital coupon (sent to the e-mail address provided). Donors who contribute $10 get a digital coupon for 10 percent off, and those who contribute $20 get a digital coupon for 20 percent off. The coupons are good for the purchase of a single item (pendant) through the www.earringrenaissance.com website (good for one year). 

Feel free to ask us a question, and thank you for your support!
story_txt:
Welcome!  We hope you will take some time and explore the website and the story behind Earring Renaissance.  If time is short and you want to contribute, please select a "perk" on the right-hand side by clicking on it and following the prompts to check out with Paypal or a credit card.  You can also select the large "Contribute Now" button.  We appreciate your support!
 
Give your unmatched "lonely" stud/post earrings new life as a beautiful necklace with the Earring Renaissance Pendant!                                                    


The Earring Renaissance pendant is an elegant solution to the lonely earring problem! This easy-change pendant system was made for someone who has lost a post-style earring and has one earring remaining. I created it because I wanted a solution to the lonely earring problem myself — it’s a problem I know all too well!  
Here's how it works: 


                              We offer two silver finishes and two gold finishes!








Many remaining earrings are heirlooms, sentimental and valuable, and they often sit forgotten in a jewelry box tucked away somewhere. With the Earring Renaissance pendant, you can showcase your forgotten heirloom treasures, as well as showcase your lonely earrings.


We've found that items such a father’s tie tack or a grandmother’s sorority pin often work perfectly on the pendant. Now they can be displayed beautifully with no modifications to the earring or pin needed!


So, you can get creative in your jewelry box to see what items will work on the pendant, and then showcase your treasured jewelry as a beautiful necklace! 
Here's what customers are saying:




Hold up your studs and post-style earrings to see the best finish for your lonely earrings -- these are actual size!





Each pendant has two sides (see above) and gives you two different design looks! The Earring Renaissance pendant is available in two silver finishes, Antique Silver and Classic
Silver, and two gold finishes, Antique Gold and Classic Gold.  The silver pendants have a quality
sterling silver plating, and the gold pendants have a quality 14K-gold plating.  
We're inviting you to help create a special run of limited-edition pendants, handmade by U.S. artisans that will help you reconnect to your heirloom treasures and lonely earrings.  
We're offering presales of the Earring Renaissance pendant along with an option to have the pendant gift wrapped and mailed to the person of your choice in time for the holidays.  This is truly a one-of-a-kind gift for someone special!
You will be helping to create this limited edition of Earring Renaissance pendants with your purchase.  Thank you for joining us on this journey to help showcase our collective lonely earrings!
COLOR, COLOR, COLOR! Rev up your wardrobe with color options!




We want to honor our supporters and provide you with awesome service and perks!
All donors starting at $10 and upwards will receive our newsletter the "Earring Ren News", which will not only give you weekly updates on the campaign while it is up and running (Aug. 5 - Sept. 5, 2015), but we will make some surprise announcements via the newsletter -- goodies that you will want to be in on!
"Thank You" Wall of Support:  All donors from $10 upwards will be listed on the Earring Renaissance Wall of Community Support and will be acknowledged for helping build the Earring Renaissance Community!  Thank you, thank you!  The wall will be created 3-4 weeks after the campaign ends, possibly sooner.  We'll keep you posted.
What's included in the box?



The Earring Renaissance pendant will be packaged in a gift box with corresponding silver or gold-plated necklace chain, special cushioning earring backs to secure the earring inside the pendant, and a the recently unveiled game-changing element of COLOR  that is our FREE gift to you -- to thank you for purchasing the pendant in our limited-edition run (August 5 - September 5, 2015).  If you are on the fence at all, the 12 color inserts will make you want to get this pendant innovation for yourself, so take advantage of our great deals as soon as you can. And you will receive our grateful appreciation for helping build this community and create these special pendants.
Each pendant will include a 10 percent a discount coupon good for one year of shopping through the EarringRenaissance.com website. So, If you get the two-pendant special, you will receive 2 x 10 percent discount coupons, which combined would be 20 percent off a future purchase of a single item! Also, each pendant order will have its own set of 12 color inserts (yes, the game-changer you can't live without), so if you want to purchase one for yourself and give another away, you will have the free gift to pass along as well as one 10 percent off coupon.  Please see our perks on the right side of this page  If you want three pendants, you will need to select a combination of one and two-pendant perks. See our perk for adding elegant gift wrapping and a small gift card acknowledging your gift... "For Bianca, Love Mick." Get your shopping done early this year! Each pendant includes instructions on how to use it and will reference the website for an instructional video.

Laura's Giclée Reproductions:  
The word Giclée describes the remarkable, high-quality reproduction process that makes these reproductions look identical to the original oil painting -- they are of the highest caliber. I guess this reflects how picky I am when it comes to art and things my name is attached to! I worked with the people in the lab to create these reproductions, advising on color and comparing them to the original until I was completely satisfied. There are less expensive services, but these reproductions are far superior. I know, I've tried others.
These limited-edition reproductions will be on canvas, hand stretched on wooden frames by the artist, and carefully packed along with your certificate of authenticity. Shipping will be premium with insurance, likely a two to three-day FedEx service or similar. We will ship in early December (in time for the holidays). The reproductions are standard sizes, which means it's easy and affordable to get a standard-sized open frame with no custom framing needed. They are the perfect size for any home--not too big, not too small.


Donors at this level also receive a
coupon for 20 percent off a future purchase of a single item (good for one year)
of shopping through the EarringRenaissance.com website, the weekly Earring Ren Newsletter and a prominent level of recognition on the "Thank You" wall on the website. Thank you so much for supporting us at this
significant level!


 Sunflowers and Red Tulips, Limited Edition Giclée, 16 x 20 inches by Laura Powers



Callalilies and Garden Arch, Limited Edition Giclée, 18 x 22 inches by Laura Powers



The Movie Mogul Perk!  

This perk is to name your own movie and tell your story or your family's story! This will be as unique as you are and is easier and more fun than writing a book. It could be a great gift for a milestone birthday or to leave family history details for generations to come. A team member will come to you in the U.S. and interview you and up to two others. This will be a two-camera shoot, and the result will be a personal, 20-minute HD video with beginning-and-end credits and music (the interviews and photos professionally edited). Your photos are welcome, and we can include up to 20 photos in this personalized perk. Our team member will fly to your locale and treat you like the movie mogul you are! Because this is our biggest perk, we will also let you choose your four favorite pendants to keep as a special gift from us. Just to clarify, this is "your" video. It will not be used by us for promotional purposes. You will also get our "Earring Ren" weekly newsletter and your name at the highest level on our "Wall Of Thanks" on the Earring Renaissance website. Our "mega-mogul thank you" and eternal gratitude for selecting this high-level perk!









We would love to hear your stories! -- Please share them on our Facebook page, (www.Facebook.com/EarringRenaissance) and send us your photos once you start creating your own looks with the Earring Renaissance pendants!  






The Earring Renaissance team has minimized the risks to you. We have spent more than two years doing intensive prep work for this product launch and Indiegogo campaign.  We have already ordered and reviewed samples of the Earring Renaissance pendant to ensure the quality of the U.S. artisan team that will be creating the pendants. We've just placed a medium-sized order, and they are standing by to create as many pieces as needed for this campaign. Note: There is a limited number of pendants offered during this campaign (Aug. 5 - Sept. 5, 2015)  so that we would be able to take care of our early supporters. We have done our homework and are ready to fulfill our commitment!   
Mailing and shipping:  We will be using the U.S. Postal Service for mailing our carefully wrapped pendants, and our boxes will be sent with tracking just in case we need to see what the status is. We will alert you when the packages are shipped and keep you updated along the way.  The painting reproductions will be shipped using a premium service, such as Fed-Ex 2 or 3 day shipping, the packages will be trackable and they will be insured.
If our funding goal is met then your purchases will be activated and you cards will be charged for your purchase, and the wheels will turn for us to gladly fulfill the requested perks.  If the funding is not met in total, then you will be notified and your cards will not be charged.  We will keep you posted on future plans in either case.

This is Phase I of two phases of the Earring Renaissance product launch. We are currently designing a second pendant that will easily showcase your dangle-style earrings. All types of earrings will be able to have a collective "Renaissance."
We plan to earn your trust and deliver on Phase One before heading into the second pendant solution for dangle earrings. If we go well beyond our initial fundraising goal, we may be able to fund moving forward with the second piece.  We will keep you posted!
Our expenses include a website, promotional infrastructure, advertising, promotional videos, a product animation video, staff, inventory of pendants, gift boxes, peripheral necklace chains and supplies, shipping boxes, and packing materials and packing fulfillment. They all come into play, totaling $10,150 to $10,800. 
The Earring Renaissance pendant system is also in the process of being patented, and the typical patent attorney fees and filing fees are easily more than $10,000. Our costs are lower because Laura did the patent drawings and the provisional patent herself.  So the question may be, why are you only needing $6,000?  Well, this project is also about building community and getting valuable feedback from you. We believe we are working with an attainable amount and want to build our product line one step at a time, as we build your trust.  If this vision resonates with you and you embrace what the Earring Renaissance pendant can do for our collective lonely earrings, we are on our way.  We are grateful for your important role in this journey!  


Whether you want to give $10 to show your support or to purchase a pendant, you will be helping to bring this project to life.  If you are not able to contribute here are some way you can help us with the campaign:
* You can help get the word out!  We'd  be grateful if you shared the video on Twitter (www.Twitter.com/EarringRen),   #EarringRen    #EarringRenGiveaway
Facebook  (www.Facebook.com/EarringRenaissance) 
or Pinterest (www.Pinterest.com/EarringRen).  
* You can also share your story about a treasured heirloom or share a "lonely earring story" on Facebook.  We really appreciate your help in letting others know about the pendant -- Go team!
*  And, sharing is easy with Indiegogo share tools!


"As a gift, it would provide my mother the opportunity to reconnect with special events and treasured memories of the people she loves." -- Charles H.
"I just asked my wife about this the other day -- What do you do with all of those remaining earrings when you lose one? She said she keeps them in a little box, but it was clear they didn't get used. She would be delighted to be able to wear them again -- I think this pendant is a great idea! " -- Morris G.
Q:  Will all pendants be shipped in time for the holidays?  
A:  Yes, we anticipate the pedants shipping in late November. The pendants that had the gift wrap perk will be mailed by the 11th of December, so they will reach their destination in plenty of time for the holidays but not too early (November).  If you would like your gift pendant shipped later in November when the other pendants are shipped, please let us know and we'll take care of it.  
Q: When will the painting reproductions ship?  
A: The painting reproduction will also ship by Dec. 11, so they will also be there in time for gift giving, and will be insured and shipped via Fed-Ex two or three-day or similar.  Each reproduction will be insured for $300, and also comes with a Certificate of Authenticity, signed by the artist and a 20% discount coupon.
Q: Will there be instructions in the pendant box?
A: Yes, there will be instructions showing you how to use your pendant.  We will also refer you to our product video that shows how the pendant is used. Instructions will be included in all pendant orders, including the gift-wrapped orders.
Q: Will the 10 percent off coupon for the pendants be digital or a physical coupon?
A:  Good question! The 10 percent coupons for the pendants will be physical coupons mailed with your pendant. The coupons are good for 10 percent off a single item through the  www.earringrenaissance.com  website (good for one year).  Since we are already shipping the pendants, enclosing a coupon makes sense.
Q: Didn't I read about digital coupons?  
A: Yes, the first two perks at the $10 and $20 level do not include a pendant, and the donors receive a digital coupon (sent to the e-mail address provided). Donors who contribute $10 get a digital coupon for 10 percent off, and those who contribute $20 get a digital coupon for 20 percent off. The coupons are good for the purchase of a single item (pendant) through the www.earringrenaissance.com website (good for one year). 
Feel free to ask us a question, and thank you for your support!

story:
Podcast: MERÏKH - The World's first shape sifting leather bags




MULTIFUNCTIONAL BAGS:
"KEY ITEMs" for MERÏKH's unique concept. Several bags in one:
# Handbag, Purse & (Shoulder bag, Cross body bag).
With a great option to attach the bag on:
# Belt: enjoy a walk without having anything in your hands.
# Bicycle / Motorcycle: have a ride, easily & securely bring your bag with you.
# Pet leash: never forget your pets poop bags & treats, always with you.
# Optional MERÏKH bag: gives several looks in one for all our bags from the collection. Handy if you don't want to carry your heavy bag, take of the Multibag for your personal belongings, and wear it separately.



- MULTIBAG MINI
Colors: Black, Cognac brown
Size: 13 L x 6 H x 6 W cm, (5.1 L x 2.35 H x 2.35 W inch)


- MULTIBAG MEDIUM, 85EUR 99EUR
Colors: Black, Cognac brown
Size: 15.5 L x 8 H x 8 W cm, (6.1 L x 3.15 H x 3.15 W inch)



- MULTI HANDBAG
Colors: Black, Red
Size: 17 x 11 x 5 cm, (6.7 x 4.33 x 1.96 inch)


OTHER ACCESSORIES THAT CAN BE ATTACHED ON OPTIONAL MERÏKH BAG OR WORN SEPARATELY:


- NAME TAG or KEYRING/CHAIN



- CARDHOLDER
Colors: Black, Cognac brown, White, Beige, Grey, Whiskey brown
Size:10 L x 7 H cm, (3.94 L x 2.76 H inch)


BAGS FOR MEN, WOMEN & PET OWNERS:
All bags can be worn Classic "simple", or you can attach a Multifunctional bag or accessory in several different ways, please see options above:


- SHOPPER MEDIUM
Ideal as everyday Handbag & Shoppingbag.
Colors: Black, Beige
Size: 45 x 36 x 13.5 cm, (17.7 x 14.2 x 5.3 inch)


- BUSINESS BAG (Laptop bag)
The perfect Workbag for both men & women, has a separate pocket for your laptop.
Colors: Black, Cognac brown
Size: 40 x 28 x 8 cm, (15.75 L x 11 H x 3.1 inch)

 

- PET CARRIER LARGE
Suitable as travel bag, accepted as cabin luggage, includes a pillow.
Colors: Black, Cognac brown
Size: 42x26x28cm, (16.5x10.2x11inch). Up to 6kg, (14pound).
- WEEKENDBAG
Mens favorite! The perfect Travel- & Sports bag, suitable as cabin luggage.
Colors: Black, Cognac brown
Size: 55 x 30 x 30cm, (21.65 x 11.8 x 11.8 inch)



- DUFFEL BAG + MULTIBAG MINI
Ideal as everyday Handbag / Manbag, or smaller Sports bag (for yoga etc.)
Colors: Black, Cognac brown
Size: 45 L x 22 H x 22 W cm, (17.7 L x 8.66 H x 8.66 W inch)

 
OUR STORY:

MERÏKH was officially launched 2014 by Hannele Merik. Hannele is born and raised in Stockholm Sweden. She has been traveling and living around the world, where she has collected inspiration & experience. She has always had a passion for business, creativity & traveling, and have worked many years as a Buyer and Production Manager in Sweden, Spain and China. Her main study is within: Purchasing at Stockholm’s International Business school, complemented with some design courses at FIT and ACA.

The idea of the concept got started from a NEED, and appeared while having a walk with her dog. Hannele had always plenty things in her hand which occasionally fell on the ground, and that is when she thought of an elegant little handbag which could be attached on: pet leash, bicycle, motorcycle, belt etc. To be able to have a walk or a ride without having anything in your hands and always have your essential items with you.

Today the original Multifunctional bag is the key item of the brand niche & concept, which also can be attached on the front or interior of all other MERÏKH bags. It is a fun option that offers several looks and multi-functionality to your bag. MERÏKH´s vision is that these bags will be loved and enjoyed whether your going to a nightclub, traveling, on your way to work, walking your pet, shopping etc. The team intend to continuously improve and create new styles to the collection. Hope you enjoy them!

For more information & our social media, please see: www.merikh.com

story:
PICTURED ABOVE: All four SERIES 1 Shirts 

Hello everyone! My Name is Jason Littlefield, I am the art director and owner of ANTI Clothing. I'm here to find support for the release of my LIMITED EDITION SERIES 1 T-shirt line. I have been at this for a very long time now and have put a lot of my past experiences in retail, fashion, and art school into this.

 

Coming from a small town in Lisbon Falls, ME I know how hard one must work to make their dreams come true. I am now currently located in Orlando, FL attending a design school called Full Sail University for Digital Art & Design. I have spent all my free time away from class working on this company as it has been a dream of mine for some time now. Art and design has always been apart of my life every since I found doodling in elementary school more fun then the actual assignments. As an artist I have established myself in the small state of Maine and even have had my work showcased in the Portland Museum of Art. As for what I would like to achieve I haven't even scratched the surface and thats why I need your help.

Now a days its next to impossible to start your own t shirt company. Even with the best designs, the perfect demographic, and great marketing its hard to stick out in a market that is already so over-saturated. The same can be said about the art world, artist of all sorts pop up everyday struggling to find a solid following. So ANTI Clothing is here to try and change both of those issues by combining both worlds. They will do this by producing LIMITED EDTION clothing in small series and each series will feature a new artist. The goal with that is to build a community of us like minded individuals and give all of us a shirt we can not only look cool in but support something as well. ANTI Clothing doesn't just end there though. As a company we would like to give back. So with each series released a new cause or foundation will be selected to donate part of our proceeds to. Be it an art program in the featured artist's home town or something bigger like an independent news group we will find something worthy that needs support.

ANTI Clothing is a company with three main goals.

  • To better the world we live in
  • To create a solid community of artists and likeminded individuals
  • To create cool merchandise for you guys to wear

 

 

EXTRA DETAIL ON THE HOW:

ANTI Clothing will start off with creating only LIMITED EDITION products. Secondly it will release everything in SERIES designed by a new artist each time, just to keep it fresh.

ANTI Clothing will also select a new cause or foundation that it will raise money for with each new series of merchandise released. So with every purchase you make you give back to something besides our wallets.

So simply put...

Each SERIES of merchandise supports a new artist, donates to a cause, and creates awesome stuff for you guys. Sweet right!?

So help make a difference and look cool while you do it!

 

Heres a list of some causes and foundations we will be looking to help in the future.

  • Independent news groups
  • Food banks and shelters
  • Art programs
  • Veterans programs 
  • Make-A-Wish Foundation

 

 

What is the money from Indiegogo for?

The money being raised is to print the very first set of shirts and merchandise. We need $3200 to get the shirts, get them printed, packing completed, and get them out to you guys.

We already have a lot done and most of it will actually be available to you guys as perks just for helping out. As for everything else, it all has been accounted for from the website design to the promo videos. This is the last step in the process. The pictures below will show you some stuff we already have done.

Our website-

Our promo videos-

 

www.vimeo.com/anticlothing

 

 

What's in it for you guys?

Well we are giving you first dibs on our SERIES 1 products designed by artist/designer Jason Littlefield. We have a whole line from shirts to accessories ready to go for the website launch but you get to see it and buy it before it hits our digital shelves.

So by supporting you also get the actual products we will be selling to the general public in the near future! 

---ATTENTION--- If ordering a T-Shirt Email the size you need to jl.anticlothing@gmail.com 

---ATTENTION--- For T-shirt size information CLICK HERE

 

PERK 2- $10 Donation

  • SERIES 1 Collector Pin Pack
  • A thank you letter from the owner
  • LIMITED EDITION hand number packaging
  • Only 40 available for preorder
  • Only 50 will ever be made.
  • CLICK HERE for more photos

  • A thank you letter from the owner

  • Only 20 available for preorder
  • Only 30 will ever be made
  • CLICK HERE for more photos

  • Only 20 available for preorder
  • Only 100 will ever be made
  • CLICK HERE for more photos
  • if ordering a shirt please email the size information to jl.anticlothing@gmail.com
  • for size information CLICK HERE

  • SERIES 1 "Find Your Way" Compass Necklass
  • A thank you letter from the owner
  • LIMITED EDITION hand number packaging
  • Only 5 Available
  • INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE! THIS IS ONLY AVAILABLE HERE!
  • CLICK HERE for more photos

 

PERK 9- $120 Donation

  • ALL 4 of the SERIES 1 T-shirts (BUY 3 GET 1 FREE)
  • A thank you letter from the owner
  • LIMITED EDITION hand number packaging
  • Only 10 Available
  • INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE NOT AVAILABLE ANYWHERE ELSE

 

PERK 10- $300 Donation

  • The SERIES 1 "Question Everything" T-shirt
  • The ORIGINAL painting.
  • The SERIES 1 Collectable Pin Pack
  • A thank you letter from the Artist
  • LIMITED EDITION hand number packaging

  • The ORIGINAL "3D Me Mickey" painting.
  • The SERIES 1 Collectable Pin Pack
  • A thank you letter from the Artist
  • LIMITED EDITION hand number packaging
  • Only 1 Available
  • CLICK HERE for more photos

 

 

The Impact

The impact of this would be huge! ANTI Clothing could move forward and move onto producing SERIES 2 which is already in the works. But even more so this would have a huge impact on making the world a better place one shirt at a time. Remember our goal as a company is to raise money for causes around the world and even help raise awareness as well.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share this on your social network pages
  • LIKE us on Facebook
  • FOLLOW us on Twitter
  • FOLLOW us on Instagram
  • Tell a stanger in the streets
  • Yell it from a roof top!

 

 

What is the Future of ANTI Clothing?

The future of ANTI Clothing already looks very promising with plans already in the works for the next 3 SERIES we already have a few Artists excited to be apart of ANTI Clothing! So take a look at what is to come in the future if this campaign is successful.

       -Justin "Skip" Skipper-                         -Boy Kong-                              -Chris Tobar-

      

CLICK HERE to see Skip     -     CLICK HERE to see Boy Kong     -     CLICK HERE to see Tobar
story_txt:
PICTURED ABOVE: All four SERIES 1 Shirts 
Hello everyone! My Name is Jason Littlefield, I am the art director and owner of ANTI Clothing. I'm here to find support for the release of my LIMITED EDITION SERIES 1 T-shirt line. I have been at this for a very long time now and have put a lot of my past experiences in retail, fashion, and art school into this.
 

Coming from a small town in Lisbon Falls, ME I know how hard one must work to make their dreams come true. I am now currently located in Orlando, FL attending a design school called Full Sail University for Digital Art & Design. I have spent all my free time away from class working on this company as it has been a dream of mine for some time now. Art and design has always been apart of my life every since I found doodling in elementary school more fun then the actual assignments. As an artist I have established myself in the small state of Maine and even have had my work showcased in the Portland Museum of Art. As for what I would like to achieve I haven't even scratched the surface and thats why I need your help.
Now a days its next to impossible to start your own t shirt company. Even with the best designs, the perfect demographic, and great marketing its hard to stick out in a market that is already so over-saturated. The same can be said about the art world, artist of all sorts pop up everyday struggling to find a solid following. So ANTI Clothing is here to try and change both of those issues by combining both worlds. They will do this by producing LIMITED EDTION clothing in small series and each series will feature a new artist. The goal with that is to build a community of us like minded individuals and give all of us a shirt we can not only look cool in but support something as well. ANTI Clothing doesn't just end there though. As a company we would like to give back. So with each series released a new cause or foundation will be selected to donate part of our proceeds to. Be it an art program in the featured artist's home town or something bigger like an independent news group we will find something worthy that needs support.
ANTI Clothing is a company with three main goals.

To better the world we live in
To create a solid community of artists and likeminded individuals
To create cool merchandise for you guys to wear

 
 
EXTRA DETAIL ON THE HOW:
ANTI Clothing will start off with creating only LIMITED EDITION products. Secondly it will release everything in SERIES designed by a new artist each time, just to keep it fresh.
ANTI Clothing will also select a new cause or foundation that it will raise money for with each new series of merchandise released. So with every purchase you make you give back to something besides our wallets.
So simply put...
Each SERIES of merchandise supports a new artist, donates to a cause, and creates awesome stuff for you guys. Sweet right!?
So help make a difference and look cool while you do it!
 
Heres a list of some causes and foundations we will be looking to help in the future.

Independent news groups
Food banks and shelters
Art programs
Veterans programs 
Make-A-Wish Foundation

 
 
What is the money from Indiegogo for?
The money being raised is to print the very first set of shirts and merchandise. We need $3200 to get the shirts, get them printed, packing completed, and get them out to you guys.
We already have a lot done and most of it will actually be available to you guys as perks just for helping out. As for everything else, it all has been accounted for from the website design to the promo videos. This is the last step in the process. The pictures below will show you some stuff we already have done.
Our website-

Our promo videos-
 
www.vimeo.com/anticlothing
 
 
What's in it for you guys?
Well we are giving you first dibs on our SERIES 1 products designed by artist/designer Jason Littlefield. We have a whole line from shirts to accessories ready to go for the website launch but you get to see it and buy it before it hits our digital shelves.
So by supporting you also get the actual products we will be selling to the general public in the near future! 
---ATTENTION--- If ordering a T-Shirt Email the size you need to jl.anticlothing@gmail.com
