story:
Pass the Hat - 2012 Banquet Fundraiser

"...a Soldier, still bleeding from a long war and an even longer journey home, gathers himself and walks into the gathering hall, puts down his sword and says, "I will tell the story," and  then... he passes the hat..."

Save the date, Friday, December 15th location is The Grill #1 (Fall Creek / Geist Location).

Here are the detailsl:

  • We are in the process of gathering the funds together to purchase awards for all of the award winners and members of the 2012 football team and dance team.
  • If everyone can support the cause by giving what they can we can reach our budget to get everything done.
  • We are planning on having the event at a very good location so we can have fun and fellowship in style.

The Impact

Every year we give out awards for outstanding performers on the season, also everyone that participated in 2012 will recieve a token of achievement:

  • Team MVP.
  • Offensive MVP.
  • Defensive MVP.
  • Most Improved.
  • Mental Attitude.
  • Rookie of the Year.
  • The Hammer Award.
  • Mr. Consistent.
  • Mr. Reliable.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • I need volunteers to help us plan the event, if you have time to help us get the resources together, please contact me direct.
  • Send this to all of your supporters, maybe they can contrubute to our cause!
  • Contact Evan, 317-697-4033, or eltriggs6@yahoo.com

Thanks again, and see you all in December!!!!

story:
edasi is the evolution of denim

Our super advanced technical jeans have over 16 unique features to make your life much easier - and much more comfortable.

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

 

edasi is here to make 2021 that bit easier with jeans that are mega versatile and adapt to whatever life throws
 at you next.

edasi has a unique fit that works with your body. Each gender has their own version of edasi that will make them look & feel great. What kind of fit are these? Not slim, not regular, we call them athleisure tailored. Casual but not too casual.


 

edasi uses Unifi's TruTemp365® fabric - the most amazing breathable thermoregulated fabric with enhanced cooling and drying that works in all weather conditions.

In hot weather - the moisture gets wicked away to keep you cool and dry. TruTemp365® fibers create the ideal microclimate between you and your clothes. Fabrics that use this technology work to cool you on warm days by moving moisture away from your body.  Alternatively, the insulative properties help keep you warm on cool days. 

edasi denims are the comfiest jeans you’ll ever wear - rivaling the comfort factor of your favorite yoga pants. We added X4J fiber which means you get a full 360° stretch to fit you perfectly, amazing sculpting properties and a soft, breathable pair of jeans that are super durable. Comfort for days, weeks, and months.

(Fun Fact #1: the stretch rebounds back into shape without ever stretching out.)

 


 

 

The patented odor control solution we use is super effective in killing odor-causing bacteria keeping you smelling fresh longer. We use an all-natural, chemical-free solution. EPA Approval Pending.

 

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

FUZE *EPA APPROVAL PENDING* 



edasi denims use reactive dye meaning the color doesn’t fade - even after 100+ washes. They'll look as fresh as the day you bought them! 



As well as the full 360°stretch, we also took extra steps to make sure edasi jeans move with you - not against you. We’ve added an elasticated waistband, articulated knees, and a reinforced gusset to improve maneuverability and durability

edasi evolution of denims are 100% anti jeggings so the stretch maintains the true denim feeling.

Wearing edasi denims feels just like wearing your favorite comfy sweatpants, soft to the touch, and easy to move around in. Our X4J fabric is lightweight, stretchy, durable, and has balanced compression for an enhanced fit that doesn't compromise on your comfort. 

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

Keep your money and cards safe with the RFID blocking pockets.

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

Make sure you’ve always got everything you need with our 9 functional pockets.

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

(fun fact #2: the passport/media pocket is 8" deep and RFID blocking)

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

 

edasi denim are comfortable, functional and stylish. This makes them perfect for work, home, cycle and travel. 



this is an animated image - please allow time to load​

At



launch, edasi denims will be available in 2 sophisticated colors. Classic Blue and Onyx Black.

pending EPA approval

For years NASA and Olympians have been using silver in fabric to provide powerful qualities. The problem with what they used is it both becomes ineffective after a few washes and pollutes the worlds scarce drinking water.  

We instead added a safe, sustainable, and non-ionic solution that kills bacteria on contact. This makes edasi denims the most effective and sustainable odor-controlled jeans on the market.

 

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

Best of all, FUZE is all-natural, eco friendly, and is long-lasting. FUZE uses 480 times less active resources than other anti-odor treatments.  Fuze is applied with a unique, patented misting process with a Zero-Waste Manufacturing philosophy. No water is wasted or dumped downstream after the process.

edasi works with one of the cleanest denim mills in the world, Prosperity Textile, reducing footprint throughout the whole denim manufacturing process. Prosperity is a Bluesign system partner. Bluesign traces each path along the manufacturing process and lives up to the strictest criteria to protect our globe’s water, air, soil, and carbon footprint. 

edasi uses fibers from recycled water bottles to help with our unique thermoregulation. This is much more sustainable and better for our environment than traditional synthetic polyester which uses huge amounts of water to produce it.



 

 edasi demins have an athleisure tailored cut, which means we're somewhere between slim and regular cut jeans. Our men's style has much more space in the crotch area and a longer leg, whereas our female style is more shaping and is cropped for that professional but comfortable look. 

 MENS: Choose between RELAXED FIT or TAILORED ATHLEISURE 



WOMEN: HI - RISE  (select between 7/8 cropped style or Full Length)

edasi denims were developed in Amsterdam with countless prototypes along the way, so we could make the most perfect pair of jeans you'll ever wear

Our team in Amsterdam hard at work!

edasi denims went through many different designs and prototypes along the way  - we obsessively tested the fit and quality until we had the perfect pair of jeans.

 

Product sketches

Prototypes

 


edasi was born to take everyday staples and super charge them for our modern times.

We fully believe that we can do some very interesting things in the textile industry as cotton, polyester, and constricting designs just do not cut it anymore.

Instead of the boring stuff, we search the world for technical fibers and then work with material scientists, designers, pattern makers and a host of other strategic partners to create a truly super charged fabric.                              

We then incorporate a hybrid of functional and minimalistic design elements to this finished fabric to give you something that’s 100% focused on comfort and innovation - the end result is like nothing you can pick up in a store or online.

WHY INDIEGOGO?

Reaching you directly on InDemand gives us the opportunity to develop products that wouldn't be possible if we raised funds via Venture Capital (VC). Going directly on InDemand means we will only release a product when we truly know it’s the best of it’s class. With the traditional route of VC, you can eventually expect lower attention to detail, relaxed quality control, and too many of the same products being shoved down your throats.

Not for us -  The only ones we want to answer to is you, and this platform gives us that opportunity. By answering only to you, we can take your feedback and go straight to prototype, rather than a hierarchy of bureaucracy found in bigger brands.

Our goal is to take your feedback and continuously design products that exceed your expectations. Edasi's  finished product will always be a direct result of you and the community's voice.

Thank you for being the main catalyst behind our vision!

 

HELP US SPREAD THE WORD

We need your backing and we also need to get through to a wider audience. Help us reach our goal by sharing on any of these social media platform.

story:
We spend the last month developing a premium mask :

  •  Washable:  Our mask material is polyester so can be repeatedly washed and sanitized
  •  Comfortable:  The flat side enable a close fit at the cheeks without uncomfortable tightness around the nose and jaw
  •  Functional:  The mask size is for Adults  7.9x5in (20x13cm) and Children 7x3.9in (18x10cm)  for a full protective nose to mouth
  •  Beautiful:  with unique designs that makes you want to wear it

 

 

Every Fractal Mask comes pre-packaged with 2 filters. (Add-on : 3€ (4$) for each pack of 6 extra filters)

 

Here we show you a couple of photos from samples that we received from supplier. 

 

 

Geometric fractals is "a fragmented geometric shape that can be split into parts, each of which is a reduced-size copy of the whole". We are so excited to share with you these amazing renders!

The golden ratio is said to be the secret of visual splendor.  Like Nature, Our designs try here to obey to this mathematical proportion, the same proportion you find in the structure of snowflake, shell, leaf  represented by these images

 

 

 

 

Inspired by the concept of cosmos, we tried to show in our designs the ideas of complexity and both order . These designs express the energy that emanate from life vitality

 

 

 Gemstones have a beauty unlike anything else because they allow light inside and refract it. This splendid visual propriety had to be represented in our colorful fractal designs

 

 

Our Fractal Designs were created using a Mandelbrot and Julia formulas Complex generating program. Mandelbrot quotes that ''Fractal is a way to see the infinity''

 

 

 Mandalas have one identifiable center point, from which an assortment of symbols, shapes, and patterns radiate. We are so joyful to share with you these colorful and symmetric patterns!

 

The beauty of flowers is a unique harmony of symmetry, color and proportion.  We designed these mandalas with the very same characteristics and tried to produce a sense of peace and calmness

''There is no Art without contemplation''. This mandala series is originally filled by water based paint. The colors irregularity coupled with the symmetry of the lines makes a great visual impact

The Dawn series is a representation of the passage between the dawn light and the full light of the day.  This path is symbolic, a path that anyone can freely interpret. We painted a color gradiant first and then we drew the mandala on. 

 

Like photography, the feeling we receive from a colorful image and a black and white one is not the same. One allow us to contemplate, the other one to concentrate.

We are fascinated by the "Art Forms in Nature" book. Inspiration for the nature-lover, artist, or those like us who like to simply gaze in wonder at the infinite diversity and beauty, of lifeforms. The natural designs are unbelievable and amazing. We wanted to share with you some of its stunning illustrations of nature and colorful images with a great visual impact

We choose these marvellous renderings plates for the peculiar emotional appeal that we have for them. They are colorful, detailed...Splendid!

 We choose these fauna plates to share with you a multitude of unusual life forms and other forms of microscopic life; jellyfishes, starfishes, calcareous sponges, star coralseach. Carefully drawn from nature, these are beautiful renderings of our little known world

These shell images fully convey the magic and power of the forms and shapes. Carefully drawn from nature, These are beautiful renderings of our surprising world

This selection images are amazing drawings of the animal world. Carefully drawn from nature, their proportion, details, the harmony of light and shadow makes these beautiful images absolutely stunning!

Mathematician Mandelbrot, published to describe geometric fractals as "a fragmented geometric shape that can be split into parts, each of which is a reduced-size copy of the whole"

Our Fractal Designs were created using a Mandelbrot and Julia formulas Complex generating program. Amazed by the results, we decided to share these abstract renders and try to let them leave the screen!

                               

 

Mandalas have one identifiable center point, from which an assortment of symbols, shapes, and patterns radiate. They are found in the macrocosm and microcosm of nature, from the rotational patterns of planets to the intricate, geometric pattern of a flower.

''Art Forms in Nature'' is a scientific book wrote by the famous biologist Haeckel. We are fascinated by the "Art Forms in Nature" book. Inspiration for the nature-lover, artist, or those like us who like to simply gaze in wonder at the infinite diversity and beauty, of lifeforms. The natural designs are unbelievable and amazing. we wanted to share with you some of its stunning illustrations of nature and colorful images with a great visual impact

 

Wholesale

If you are a distributor or a store and are looking for Wholesale options, please email us at starfieldmarket@gmail.com for more details
story_txt:
We spend the last month developing a premium mask :

 Washable:  Our mask material is polyester so can be repeatedly washed and sanitized
 Comfortable:  The flat side enable a close fit at the cheeks without uncomfortable tightness around the nose and jaw
 Functional:  The mask size is for Adults  7.9x5in (20x13cm) and Children 7x3.9in (18x10cm)  for a full protective nose to mouth
 Beautiful:  with unique designs that makes you want to wear it

 



 
Every Fractal Mask comes pre-packaged with 2 filters. (Add-on : 3€ (4$) for each pack of 6 extra filters)

 
Here we show you a couple of photos from samples that we received from supplier. 
 

 

Geometric fractals is "a fragmented geometric shape that can be split into parts, each of which is a reduced-size copy of the whole". We are so excited to share with you these amazing renders!

The golden ratio is said to be the secret of visual splendor.  Like Nature, Our designs try here to obey to this mathematical proportion, the same proportion you find in the structure of snowflake, shell, leaf  represented by these images
 
 

 
 

Inspired by the concept of cosmos, we tried to show in our designs the ideas of complexity and both order . These designs express the energy that emanate from life vitality
 

 

 Gemstones have a beauty unlike anything else because they allow light inside and refract it. This splendid visual propriety had to be represented in our colorful fractal designs

 
 

Our Fractal Designs were created using a Mandelbrot and Julia formulas Complex generating program. Mandelbrot quotes that ''Fractal is a way to see the infinity''

 
 

 Mandalas have one identifiable center point, from which an assortment of symbols, shapes, and patterns radiate. We are so joyful to share with you these colorful and symmetric patterns!
 

The beauty of flowers is a unique harmony of symmetry, color and proportion.  We designed these mandalas with the very same characteristics and tried to produce a sense of peace and calmness


''There is no Art without contemplation''. This mandala series is originally filled by water based paint. The colors irregularity coupled with the symmetry of the lines makes a great visual impact


The Dawn series is a representation of the passage between the dawn light and the full light of the day.  This path is symbolic, a path that anyone can freely interpret. We painted a color gradiant first and then we drew the mandala on. 

 
Like photography, the feeling we receive from a colorful image and a black and white one is not the same. One allow us to contemplate, the other one to concentrate.


We are fascinated by the "Art Forms in Nature" book. Inspiration for the nature-lover, artist, or those like us who like to simply gaze in wonder at the infinite diversity and beauty, of lifeforms. The natural designs are unbelievable and amazing. We wanted to share with you some of its stunning illustrations of nature and colorful images with a great visual impact

We choose these marvellous renderings plates for the peculiar emotional appeal that we have for them. They are colorful, detailed...Splendid!


 We choose these fauna plates to share with you a multitude of unusual life forms and other forms of microscopic life; jellyfishes, starfishes, calcareous sponges, star coralseach. Carefully drawn from nature, these are beautiful renderings of our little known world


These shell images fully convey the magic and power of the forms and shapes. Carefully drawn from nature, These are beautiful renderings of our surprising world


This selection images are amazing drawings of the animal world. Carefully drawn from nature, their proportion, details, the harmony of light and shadow makes these beautiful images absolutely stunning!

story:
RareForm Underwear Inc is a lifestyle design company launched in February 2014 by founder and Creative Director Ryan Fields. Soon Ryan’s collections will be recognized world wide for their originality, bravado and daring style. Eventually, his exclusive collections will be sold in retail locations across Canada, Australia and the United States. His collections will sport flossy Artwork inspired by Hip Hop culture. Being rare and unique these are premium underwear for those who love art , hip-hop , or any culture for that matter its street inspired art will will definitely stand out from the crowd . Being some of the rarest underwear on the market .

At RareForm Underwear Inc. we believe that men of a certain culture should wear Flossy Underwear. The men who wear our underwear tend to share the values of the global hip-hop culture. These values include diversity, creativity, self-expression and “making something from nothing”.

It is plain to see that standard issue white underwear is not flossy. In fact, we see white underwear as being clinical and not at all “showy”. Good underwear design is something you can show off! Good underwear design with Great Art is flossy!

What Ryan has to say about His flossy underwear?

“As the world runs around wearing the same old boring plain underwear, you have to find new ways to get excited about getting dressed. Look no further RareForm is here.”

In today’s rapidly growing hip hop culture; plain white underwear is a bitter pill to swallow. Even underwear in solid colors like blue, red or green is not considered showy enough by Ryan, not even with their branded waistbands. To be flossy Underwear needs more.

“I have had a passion for dance and art since I was a youth, my creativity Account has always been through the roof. My goal is to merge art with underwear whether its graffiti, airbrush, pastel, oil paint or graphic design. I want every design to be a RareForm of art , I call it flossy underwear , but I plan to put art from all cultures and connect with everyone on a visual level .

So what exactly is flossy underwear? We define it as being showy underwear for anyone who loves art. Underwear with embedded designs that reflect the color, themes, forms and images found in the hip hop culture, with designs as raw and authentic as the underground art that adorn the train yards and inner city urban streets world wide.

“We take immense pride in driving the industry standards forward, focusing on art, creativity and comfort.  ”

“A Master Piece to Mask Your Piece”

story:
Reach RTK kits can now be ordered in Emlid Shop.


What is Reach and what is it for?

Reach is for applications when your standard GPS with several meters accuracy just won’t cut it. It relies on RTK (real-time kinematics) technology to deliver centimeter level accuracy.

RTK was here for a long time, used mostly by surveyors and unaffordable to hobbyists and makers. If you needed centimeter precise positioning you had to spend thousands of dollars on an RTK system. With Reach we want to change that.

Reach runs open-source RTK processing software called RTKLIB written by Tomoji Takasu. Previously a computer was required to run RTKLIB, but now all RTKLIB features are available directly on Reach.

Antennas matter

High quality antennas are the key to great RTK performance. Tallysman Wireless, an industry leading company in high accuracy antennas provided their latest advanced antennas for the project. These antennas receive Glonass G1, Beidou B1, GPS L1 and Galileo E1 signals as well as signals from corrections services.

“The Emlid Reach program is an excellent example of the potential for huge reductions in cost available of precision RTK positioning systems. Tallysman’s Accutenna™ technology is a great match for the Reach product because it too provides high precision at new price levels.  Just as one wouldn’t expect a high quality image from an expensive TV receiver with a “rabbit ear” antenna, one should not expect the levels of precision the Reach product is capable of with a low precision antenna. Tallysman’s raison d’etre is production of high quality, high precision antennas at an affordable price for systems exactly such as the Emlid Reach product.”

Allen Crawford 

Director Marketing & Sales, Antennas and RF Products, Tallysman Wireless


Examples

Static mode


Kinematic mode


Possible applications


GPS replacement for your drone

We are experienced with APM autopilot and are working on integration with Pixhawk and other APM based autopilots. Reach can be powered from autopilot port and will send accurate coordinates using NMEA protocol.

Entry-level survey receiver

Participating in OpenStreetMap project? Planning your yard? Use Reach to survey points and mark them within the app.

Tracker for racing, cycling and other activities

Record your precise tracks and then export them in Google Earth format.

Your own RTK base station

Set your own base station on the roof of your home or club house and share corrections to others. One Reach unit set up as a base can provide corrections to a virtually unlimited number of rovers.


How does it work

To achieve centimeter level accuracy two GPS units are used with one of them being stationary (base) and another one moving (rover). Base unit streams correction to the rover over radio or 3G.

It’s simple - all you need is to setup Reach to receive corrections from a base station: 

1) Use a pair of Reach modules connected by radio modem, wi-fi or over the internet. One would act as a rover, while the other one would be your own base station.  

2) Or use WiFi to connect to your phone or plug 3G USB modem to receive corrections over the internet from an NTRIP base stations available in your area.  

Features

Multi-constellation

Reach is able to use not just GPS, but also Glonass, Beidou and QZSS which significantly increases amount of visible satellites resulting in a faster and better solution. Reach also uses signals from differential corrections systems SBAS, EGNOS, GAGAN. A future firmware upgrade will bring Galileo support as well.

IMU

Reach is equipped with a 9DOF inertial measurement unit that allows us to determine not only position, but orientation as well. By fusing IMU in RTK processing software phase tracking algorithms can be improved to work better.

App

We are developing an app called ReachView to make Reach user-friendly. Simply connect to device over Wi-Fi and you can tweak the setups, monitor solution status or view the satellite reception quality. Works on any desktop or mobile.

Connectivity

Reach is an internet of things device, it has a tiny yet very powerful Linux computer inside with Wi-Fi, BT and USB OTG port for cellular modems. You can even tether internet from your mobile device. That means that whatever setup you have it will be easy to stream corrections from the base to the rover.

Accurate time-mark

For high precision geo-tagging Reach is capable of capturing a time-mark with 21nS accuracy, you just need to connect it to a sync pulse source from your device. Time-marks are stored in memory and then can be used to determine position at a certain moment.  

External antenna

High quality antenna is the key to RTK performance. Depending on your application you might want to connect different antennas, lightweight one for airborne applications or a large, heavy one for the base station.

Specs


Raw data receiver: U-blox NEO-M8T - 72 channels, output rate up to 18Hz, supports GPS/QZSS L1 C/A, GLONASS L10F, BeiDou B1, 

SBAS L1 C/A: WAAS, EGNOS, MSAS ,

Galileo-ready E1B/C


Processing unit: Intel Edison - dual-core 500MHz
Connectivity: I2C, UART, GPIO, TimeStamp, OTG USB, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi GNSS Antenna connector: external with MCX connector
Very compact: 26x36mm
Lightweight: 13gr
Antenna: Tallysman TW4721 Dual Feed GPS/BeiDou/Galileo/GLONASS

Risks and Challenges

Our team has years of experience in electronics development and production. We know every step needed to be taken from an idea to shipping ready to use devices. Maximum risk is a production \ shipment delay due to an unexpected lack of components stock. 

This is also not our first Indiegogo campaign. We have successfully delivered all perks for Navio campaign, launched second generation called Navio+ and delivered full software support. 

FAQ

How accurate the coordinates of Reach are?

If you have a base station with known coordinates and a good antenna, you can expect accuracy down to 2cm.

Is it 100% reliable? Will I always get cm coordinates?

No RTK receiver will provide fixed solution all the time. RTK requires good GPS reception, high quality antenna and low EMI. Bad weather conditions might also degrade solution quality.

Why is it so cheap?

We rely on open-source software and off-the-shelf electronic components. This lets us push the price so low.

What is the max range?

Recommended maximum range from the base station is 10km. 

How ready is it?

All RTK features work and hardware prototypes are fully tested. We are now developing an app to make configuration easier. 

What is the output format?

Solution is output in NMEA format, logging is done in Rinex.

Why does it say NEO-M8T in specs and on video it is NEO-6T?

That’s an early prototype shown in the video. All final boards will have NEO-M8T.

 To comply with PayPal regulations we place this statement:

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

story:
For the past few years, we’ve been making city cycling footwear that works on and off the bike, helping thousands of riders transition from bike to bar - and even the boardroom - in style and comfort.

Now, we’re ready to announce our latest bike-friendly shoe - a new type of performance sneaker inspired by cycling’s colour and culture, which we call, Weekend. 

Ready for rain or shine, Weekend features a watertight outsole that helps keep your feet dry and comfortable, no matter how many puddles you pass through. Because you can never tell where the day might take you, Weekend employs antibacterial contact fabrics, helping your feet to stay comfortably dry and odour-free throughout even repeated wear or changing environments. And thanks to its dirt and water repellent upper, your Weekend will need only light care to bounce back to box-fresh.

For casual riders, we crafted it with a strengthened mid-board that makes every ride more enjoyable, whether you’re taking the long way home, or spinning to the beat. For serious commuters, Weekend supports clip-in pedal connectivity (SPD/MTB compatibility), so you can add your favourite cleats for even greater power efficiency and control.

 

At Quoc, we pride ourselves on being an environmentally focused company. Which is why we partnered with US brand BLOOM and integrated their plant-based, performance-driven foam directly into Weekend. BLOOM takes excessive, eco-destroying algae from the environment, transforming sunlight, water and pollution into renewable plant biomass. Which means for every Weekend we make, 395 half-litre bottles of water will be returned to the environment, and 37 12” balloons of CO2 will be prevented from entering the atmosphere.

Step into Weekend, and pledge to support our Indiegogo campaign today.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Sizing Comparison | Weekend sizing is similar to the fit of many popular running shoes (within a few mm longer than most).

Half Sizes | If you typically wear ½ sizes, we recommend sizing up for a more relaxed fit or sizing down for a snug fit.

Full Sizes | If you typically wear a full size, we recommend the same size for the best possible fit and comfort.

Size Exchanges | Getting the perfect fit can be difficult especially online. It’s our mission that you get the best possible fit with your Weekend. Send us a message and we’ll be happy to help you out with your exchange!

Still not sure about your size? Here's how you can measure for the right fit.

Place a piece of paper against the wall. Place one foot on the piece of paper with your heel against the wall. Trace around your feet making sure not to move your heel. Measure your marking from the highest point of your toes to the middle of the heel in cm. Take the resulting figure and compare this to our size chart above.

If you're still unsure, no worries! Simply message us here on indiegogo and our friendly staff will assist you. 

 

 

 

 

1. Click 'SELECT A PERK' Below: Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge. Each backer may only make one pledge.

2. Payment: Enter your payment information. 

3. Size, Colour & Delivery Information: Select your Size and Colour choices.

 

Quoc has three global distribution centres: one in the UK, one in the USA and one in Taiwan. For the majority, we will ship directly from our nearest warehouses so that the shoes can be delivered to you as smoothly as possible. If import duties were to be charged, we will cover that for you entirely (applicable to only 41 countries. See the list in the FAQ). For circumstances that dictate otherwise, we will decide what's the best way to ship based on your location. 

 

 

 

We have a dedicated logistics team handling your return and exchange requests to make sure you receive the right shoes smoothly with as little hassle as possible. 

*Please note: customers will be responsible for exchange shipping cost: £10 for the UK and continental USA / £15 for all other countries.

 

 

Why Indiegogo?

Some people have asked us, "Quoc is a fully functioning footwear brand with retailers and its own online store - why are we releasing products on Indiegogo?" For us, the answer is clear, and it comes down to a few key factors:

COMMUNITY

The Indiegogo community is vibrant and full of people who are excited about backing new and exciting opportunities first, and they understand the associated value. You're tuned in to what's going on, and you communicate with creators as well as other backers to help the entire community learn and grow. As a brand, this kind of interaction with our customers is invaluable.

VALUE

The crowdfunding model allows us to pass our savings on to you in a very real way. We offer wholesale pricing to you in exchange for helping us pay for the initial development and production costs. All subsequent production runs of this product will be priced at an MSRP which is roughly double what you'll pay here.

RISK

Developing and producing new products the traditional way is risky because you don't truly know if it will resonate with your customers. If it doesn't, you've wasted a lot of time and money. Indiegogo is the ultimate free market. If you like it, you back it. If enough people back it, we make it.

Return, Exchange & Guarantee:

Please refer to our website guidelines for Returns & Exchanges. 
The Quoc guarantee

Risks and challenges

Quoc is a fully-operational footwear brand. Although this is a special project, it’s not outside the realm of what we do everyday.

As we’re not factory owners, there’s always the risk of a factory closure or an inability to produce at our primary facility, due to capacity issues. In the unlikely event of such an occurrence, Quoc will move production to another facility that we’ve already vetted. We could also face issues with our current material suppliers or production delay from our primary partner factory, but again, we have experience dealing with these situations and have alway found ways to resolve any issues.

Trace around your feet making sure not to move your heel. Measure your marking from the highest point of your toes to the middle of the heel in cm. Take the resulting figure and compare this to our size chart above.If you're still unsure, no worries! Simply message us here on indiegogo and our friendly staff will assist you.     1. Click 'SELECT A PERK' Below: Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge. Each backer may only make one pledge.2. Payment: Enter your payment information. 3. Size, Colour & Delivery Information: Select your Size and Colour choices. Quoc has three global distribution centres: one in the UK, one in the USA and one in Taiwan. For the majority, we will ship directly from our nearest warehouses so that the shoes can be delivered to you as smoothly as possible. If import duties were to be charged, we will cover that for you entirely (applicable to only 41 countries. See the list in the FAQ). For circumstances that dictate otherwise, we will decide what's the best way to ship based on your location.    We have a dedicated logistics team handling your return and exchange requests to make sure you receive the right shoes smoothly with as little hassle as possible. *Please note: customers will be responsible for exchange shipping cost: £10 for the UK and continental USA / £15 for all other countries.  Why Indiegogo?Some people have asked us, "Quoc is a fully functioning footwear brand with retailers and its own online store - why are we releasing products on Indiegogo?" For us, the answer is clear, and it comes down to a few key factors:COMMUNITYThe Indiegogo community is vibrant and full of people who are excited about backing new and exciting opportunities first, and they understand the associated value. You're tuned in to what's going on, and you communicate with creators as well as other backers to help the entire community learn and grow. As a brand, this kind of interaction with our customers is invaluable.VALUEThe crowdfunding model allows us to pass our savings on to you in a very real way. We offer wholesale pricing to you in exchange for helping us pay for the initial development and production costs. All subsequent production runs of this product will be priced at an MSRP which is roughly double what you'll pay here.RISKDeveloping and producing new products the traditional way is risky because you don't truly know if it will resonate with your customers. If it doesn't, you've wasted a lot of time and money. Indiegogo is the ultimate free market. If you like it, you back it. If enough people back it, we make it.Return, Exchange & Guarantee:Please refer to our website guidelines for Returns & Exchanges. The Quoc guaranteeRisks and challengesQuoc is a fully-operational footwear brand. Although this is a special project, it’s not outside the realm of what we do everyday.As we’re not factory owners, there’s always the risk of a factory closure or an inability to produce at our primary facility, due to capacity issues. In the unlikely event of such an occurrence, Quoc will move production to another facility that we’ve already vetted. We could also face issues with our current material suppliers or production delay from our primary partner factory, but again, we have experience dealing with these situations and have alway found ways to resolve any issues.

story:
Versione italiana sotto

 

About Timeless Collection

This Autumn/Winter Collection get inspiration from the past, that according with Woody Allen,  “it is never dead, it's not even past “. The manly fashion merges with the girly one through  getting inspired by old fashion details to create new awesomeness. Stoles, suspenders and holsters become the “Timeless” details of the outifit. The strength of this collection is the possbility to personalize your dress with many removable details that you can also buy separately to enrich your own coat!

Timeless is a capsule collection designed by Ctrforma, a studio which is empowered by fashion and communication designer experts.

 

What We Need 

We would like to produce this collection because we still believe in the high value of handmade clothes and in the importance of keeping and sharing the know-how. With your donation we are going to buy all the fabrics that we need to tailor the Timeless collection. We’ve been making clothes for a few years now and we have sold it in the market. People loved our clothes and we always sold everything we made in the past. You can check our previous collection here  https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=339664762808813&set=a.255460351229255.52186.255284791246811&type=1&theater

Right now we have a desire to improve the quality value of our collection by selling it into the shops. To do so,  we require to raise capital, in order to buy high quality materials and to create labels and communication. We would like to create a kind of dress’ biography on our labels, which include: the designer, the funder, the maker, the seller and the buyer. The buyer will just require a user name on fb to complete the dress’ biography!

The collection will be sold on internet as well, so if someone get in love with one of our coat or sweater we will send u the link to buy the dress on line.If you fancy our ideas please help us to get our goal!

 

About Ctrforma design studio

Ctrforma is a design studio which is empowered by fashion and communication designer experts. We believe in the power of change which can only be generated through collaboration between clients and our people. Our goal is to create a knowledge of networking which can grow and get stronger through interaction between different cultures, people, and . We believe idea sharing is the only way to transform (them) into innovations. We use many creative languages that lead up to one purpose: developping ideas and projects able to be in tune with the context, they’ve been made for, and able to communicate with the industrial system. We can design clothes, objects or services, in all these cases we believe that the creativity motive power lies in the cultural blends between people and in the neverending desire to discover the world.

 

Versione italiana

 

Timeless Collection

Questa collezione Autunno/Inverno tra ispirazione dal passato che secondo Woody Allen, "non è mai morto, anzi non è nemmeno passato". L'immaginario maschile si fonde con il femminile riprendendo dettagli dal passato e mescolandoli per creare nuove suggestioni. Stole, bretelle, fondine diventano gli elementi Timeless caratterizzanti dell’abito. La forza di questa collezione sta nella possibilità di personalizzare gli abiti con alcuni dettagli rimovibili, acquistabili anche separatamente per arricchire i cappotti che si possiedono di già. Timeless capsule collection è una creazione di Ctrforma, un laboratorio creativo di moda, design e comunicazione.

 

A cosa ci serve il vostro aiuto

Ci piacerebbe confezionare questa collezione perchè crediamo ancora nel valore dei vestiti fatti a mano e nell'importanza di preservare e condividere il know-how. Con le vostre donazioni compreremo le stoffe necessarie al confezionamento della Timeless collection. E' un po' di tempo ormai che realizziamo abiti che abbiamo sempre venduto nei mercatini. Le persone hanno sempre apprezzato le nostre creazioni e abbiamo sempre venduto tutto. Puoi sfogliare le nostre precedenti collezioni qui   https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=339664762808813&set=a.255460351229255.52186.255284791246811&type=1&theater
Adesso abbiamo il desiderio di migliorare la qualità e il valore delle nostre collezioni con l'obiettivo di venderle ai negozi di abbigliamento. Per fare questo, abbiamo necessariamente bisogno di incrementare i nostri investimenti, per poter acquistare materie prime di ottima qualità, per creare le etichette e la comunicazione della collezione. Vorremmo creare una sorta di biografia dell'abito su ogni etichetta che riveli il designer, l'investitore, il produttore, il rivenditore e il compratore. Il compratore, potrà completare la biografia dell'abito inserendo il proprio user name su una speciale pagina su facebook! La collezione verrà anche venduta su internet, quindi se qualcuno si innamorerà di uno dei nostri cappotti o maximaglie, ti posteremo il link per acquistare on line.

Se ti piace il nostro stile, aiutaci a raggiungere il nostro goal!

 

Chi è Ctrforma

Siamo un collettivo multidisciplinare, di recente formazione, che opera nel campo del design della moda e della comunicazione. Crediamo nella forza del cambiamento e che il cambiamento nasca dalla collaborazione. Il nostro obiettivo è quello di dare vita ad una rete integrata di saperi e ideali, che fa della diversità un punto di forza e della condivisione un punto di partenza. È il confronto che permette all’individuo di crescere e alle idee di diventare innovazioni. Molti linguaggi, un unico presupposto: sviluppare idee e progetti che interagiscano con il contesto e che comunichino con il sistema manifatturiero e industriale. Siano abiti, oggetti o servizi, crediamo che l’unica vera forza motrice della creatività stia nella contaminazione culturale tra gli individui e nell’inesauribile voglia di scoprire il mondo.

story:
Hi, we are Chris and Adrianne and we are the President and CEO, respectively, of Twisted Outdoor Clothing.  This company has been a dream of ours for a little over 5 years and has just now come to a point where we could launch it and get it started.  

We are using this campaign to get our parent company out to the market and raising awareness that we are here.  This is your chance to get limited first run editions of our shirts.  We will only be doing the two color options during this campaign and they will not be available again after this.  

Here is what you get for your contribution to our campaigns shipping is included unless it is to overseas(add $20) or Canada(add $5):

$1 USD

Funding Fathers

Your name listed on our "Funding Fathers" page of our website, a personal Thank You Email and digital image for use on computer/laptop, phone or tablet. Reward not included on other rewards.


$7 USD

Bronze Reward

Your name listed on our "Funding Fathers" page of our website, para-cord bracelet. This is also available for every perk except the previous "Early Bird".


$15 USD

Heads Up

A Limited Edition embroidered cap done in camo with orange embroidery . These hats will only be done in these colors for this project and will not be available again.


$25 USD

Silver Reward

A limited run our first line of shirts in your choice of dark gray or bright pink print color on white shirt, as well as a para-cord bracelet. These will be a limited print on these colors just for this project and will not be available again. NOTE: this reward also included in Gold Reward


$35 USD

Share the Love

This is a deep discounted perk; you will get two shirts printed in either gray or pink on white shirt. And you can chose to keep them both or send one to a friend at no additional charge. Just give us their address and we will send it to them for you on your behalf with your name and address in the shipping info. Must be US shipping address.


$60 USD

Twice as Nice

Just as the name implies here is what it includes: 2 T-shirts of your choice 2 Hat 2 Para-cord Bracelet


$60 USD

Platinum Reward

Includes Bronze and Silver Rewards as well as Limited Edition Red Mag-Lite & Multi-Tool Gift Set. Bronze and Silver Reward also included.


$150 USD

A Second Round

This perk is truly a great deal for for what we offer. You get the following 2 shirts of your choice 2 hats 2 para-cord bracelets and 2 mag-lite/multi-tool kits This is for those that like to have back ups or need Christmas Presents.

story:
– OUR STORY SO FAR –

 

Billy Tannery is the first British goat leather company. Since our launch on Kickstarter in 2017, we have been turning thousands of goatskins previously wasted by the UK food industry into exceptional British-made goat leather goods. But we now face our biggest challenge yet, to move our micro-tannery. 

 

 

We have spent the year designing and developing a new range of products and have begun production, but then we heard some unexpected news. The farm that our micro-tannery is located on has been sold and we have been given notice to leave.

 

 

The good news is we have found an amazing new site and started the groundworks, but we urgently need to raise the funds to complete the move. In return for your support we are offering exclusive Indiegogo prices on our new range of products, plus some fantastic perks in collaboration with our friends and collaborators.

________________________________________________________________________

– WASTE INTO WORTH –

 

Billy Tannery started with a question. In a world of increasing demand for sustainable materials, how could we be wasting such a fantastic natural by-product?

Most ‘luxury' leather goods brands rely on sprawling global supply chains, with materials and products made in questionable environmental and ethical conditions. We believe in another way.

At Billy Tannery our supply chain is as small as possible, so we can keep a close eye on all of the details. From farm to tannery to workshop to you.

Choose a better leather. Promote the goat.

1,2.

Our goat leather can be traced back to just two farms, one in Lancashire, the other in Somerset. Both rear dairy billies for award-winning goat meat supplier, Cabrito.

3.

The goatskins are then tanned using our own low- impact mimosa bark process in our micro-tannery, the first of its kind in the UK.

4.

Once tanned, the skins are dyed and finished at a local family-run leather finishing company just down the road in Northamptonshire.

5,6

Our products are made in two small workshops in Somerset and Leicestershire. Both carefully chosenfor their passion, craftsmanship and consistency.


________________________________________________________________________

– NEW PRODUCTS –

•

THE CARDHOLDER 2.0

 

Now featuring an extra card pocket and a more practical shape, our new cardholder is perfect for those who want to keep things minimal.

Early Bird: £40, Indiegogo: £45, RRP: £50

 

Features:

3 card pockets, thin construction, semi-circular notches for easier access to cards.

Dimensions:

105mm x 70mm

Available colours:

(black, chestnut, navy, forest, natural)

•

THE BIFOLD

 

By popular demand our new bifold wallet has been designed for those who have that little bit extra to carry each day. Plenty of space for your notes, cards and more.

Early Bird: £70, Indiegogo: £75, RRP: £85

 

 

Features:

6 card pockets, 1 note pocket, semi-circular notches for easier access to cards.

Dimensions:

111mm x 75mm (111mm x 150mm open)

Available colours:

(black, chestnut, navy, forest, natural)

•

THE JOURNAL

 

A new refillable notebook bound in our British goat leather. Features an internal pen loop and paper made from recycled leather fibres.

Early Bird: £78, Indiegogo: £85, RRP: £95

 

 

Features:

Takes A5 paper refills (available on our website), recyclable leather paper, internal pen loop, gun-metal stud closure.

Dimensions:

230mm x 165mm (230mm x 430mm open)

Available colours:

(black, chestnut, navy, forest, natural)

•

THE POUCH

 

Functional, flexible and full of character our new zip pouches are available in three sizes:

 

SMALL

Ideal for travel, toiletries, make-up, stationary etc. 

Early Bird: £60, Indiegogo: £65, RRP: £70

 

 

MEDIUM

Fits tablets up to 251x185mm (UPDATED SIZE)

Early Bird: £80, Indiegogo: £85, RRP: £90

 

 

LARGE

Fits laptops up to 15” MacBook.

Early Bird: £105, Indiegogo: £115, RRP: £125

 

External Dimensions:

S: 150mm x 200mm (Zip opening: 175mm)

M: 200mm x 265mm (Zip opening: 255mm)

L: 290mm x 400mm (Zip opening: 355mm)

Available colours:

(black, chestnut, navy, forest, natural)

•

THE ZIPTOP BACKPACK

 

Designed as a smaller, lighter-weight version of our signature backpack, the Zip Backpack delivers on many levels. Pictured in Chestnut, also available in Black and Forest green.

Early Bird: £450, Indiegogo: £495, RRP: £550

 

 

Features:

1 exterior slip pocket, 2 interior pockets, padded laptop compartment, bridle leather shoulder straps & handles, zip closure

Dimensions:

460mm x 330mm (handles 170mm high)

Available colours:

(black, chestnut, forest)

•

NEW PERK:
THE APRON

 

Our best-selling leather aprons were designed with the kitchen in mind, both for home cooks and professional chefs, but they are also perfect for craftspeople of all kinds.

Great British Menu winner, goat aficionado and insanely talented chef James Cochran was the first to wear our aprons. As an exclusive Indiegogo extra each Apron will come with a complimentary jar of his infamous 1251 Scotch Bonnet Jam.

ONLY 5 AVAILABLE.

Indiegogo: £195, RRP: £230

 

 

 

Features:

Adjustable cross-back straps, chest pocket, solid metal fittings and a hip loop for a towel

Available colours:

chestnut, black

 

_______________________________________________________________________

 

#PROMOTETHEGOAT

– REWARDS –

•

BILLY x CABRITO:

GOAT COOKERY SCHOOL WITH JAMES WHETLOR

 

 

Enjoy an evening with Cabrito founder and infamous Goat Man, James Whetlor. Not only learn how to cook two recipes from James’ award-winning book, Goat: Cooking & Eating, but enjoy the dishes with James and the Billy Tannery team before taking home a signed copy of the book.

Taking place at Native Resturant, London Bridge from 6.30pm on Monday 11th November.

ONLY 8 PLACES LEFT. £65

•

BILLY x STUDIO ASHBY:

GOAT LEATHER STOOL

 

 

 

Designed in collaboration with Interior Designer of the Year Studio Ashby, this stunning stool will be handmade in London and features an oak frame upholstered in our Forest and Natural goat leather. This is an exclusive opportunity to own the very first one to be made with 30% off the future retail price. Please note that the images are a 3D render.

ONLY 1 AVAILABLE. £1,400.

•

BILLY x LEE MARSH:

GOAT SUEDE BOMBER

Savile Row trained tailor Lee Marsh has made suits for some of the finest brands and customers, including royalty. Establishing his own brand in 2013, Lee Marsh Blue Label was launched in 2019 and offers ready-to-wear bomber jackets. This is an exclusive opportunity to have one made-to-order in our British goat suede.

 

Features:

Chestnut goat suede, double RiRi zip, double pleated back, roped sleeve head, patch pockets with flap & button, structured shoulder line with floating chest canvas, part hand sewn linings, round inside pockets. 

Each bomber is made-to-order and after purchase you will be contacted to discuss sizing. The jacket can also be made from your own measurements to ensure an optimal fit.

 

ONLY 2 AVAILABLE. £2,250.

•

MICRO-TANNERY MASTERCLASS

 

 

A full-day hands-on tannery experience. Join Jack on Saturday 30th November for a tour of the new tannery and take part in tanning a batch of goat leather. Includes lunch and a Key Wrap to take home. Excludes travel, but a pick-up from Market Harborough train station will be provided.

12 SPOTS AVAILABLE. £50.

________________________________________________________________________

 

– BUNDLES –

•

THE KID SET

1x Cardholder, 1x Journal, 1x Pouch (S)

£185. SAVE £30.

•

THE NANNY SET

Bifold, Pouch (M), Zip Back

£650. SAVE £75.

•

THE G.O.A.T. SET

1x Cardholder, 1x Bifold, 1x Journal, 1x Pouch (S), 1x Pouch (M), 1x Pouch (L), 1x Ziptop Backpack

£900. SAVE £165.

•

CUSTOM BUNDLES

 

Please note that many of the items can be bought together using add-ons after you select a perk. However, any combination of products or tickets can be requested.

If you ask really nicely we may even be able to offer a special price on items from our existing range of products...

Click here to contact us and we will give you instructions.

 

________________________________________________________________________

 

– AS FEATURED IN –

________________________________________________________________________

 

– THE GOAL & BUDGET –

 

The below chart gives a rough breakdown of where the funds will go. £6k is the minimum amount needed to complete the move, however this is only a fraction of the total project cost.

________________________________________________________________________

 

– TIMELINE –

 

________________________________________________________________________

 

– THE GOOD NEWS –

________________________________________________________________________

 

– MORE ABOUT US –

 

 

Billy Tannery founders Jack and Rory have known each other since childhood. Growing up in the Midlands we have always been aware of the rich history of the local leather industry. We moved to London to work in marketing and design, but after discovering the terrible waste of goatskins going on in Britain, despite knowing nothing about leather production, we decided that we had to act.

The wider team now includes local leather industry veterans, a leading accessories designer, two incredbile British workshops and Jack's father Charles, who helps manages the tannery. Together Billy Tannery is here to prove that there is life in the British leather industry yet.

________________________________________________________________________

 

– RISKS & CHALLENGES –

 

We have spent the last 2-3 years finding the best partners. From leather consultants to our workshops and fulfilment partner, they all have decades of experience. It's important to note that fulfilment of our rewards is not tied to us moving the tannery immediately and there is a back-up plan should this relocation be delayed.

Our production schedule includes some buffer and we have been clear to label reward tiers with their respective delivery timings. In our experience manufacturing in the UK can sometimes take longer than anticipated and there is always a risk of unexpected delays. The fact that (apart from Swiss zips) our entire supply chain is based in the UK means that we will be personally on hand to keep delivery on track and we are committed to being very open with our communication throughout.

Please note that some international backers may incur duty/taxes on top of shipping costs. Unfortunately we cannot control local customs processes but you probably already know if this will affect you!

________________________________________________________________________

 

– CONTACT US –

 

Any questions? Please contact us by email, social media or phone:
 

Email: info@billytannery.co.uk

Call: +44 (0)330 0438293

Social: Instagram, Twitter, Facebook
story_txt: – OUR STORY SO FAR – Billy Tannery is the first British goat leather company. Since our launch on Kickstarter in 2017, we have been turning thousands of goatskins previously wasted by the UK food industry into exceptional British-made goat leather goods. But we now face our biggest challenge yet, to move our micro-tannery.   We have spent the year designing and developing a new range of products and have begun production, but then we heard some unexpected news. The farm that our micro-tannery is located on has been sold and we have been given notice to leave.  The good news is we have found an amazing new site and started the groundworks, but we urgently need to raise the funds to complete the move. In return for your support we are offering exclusive Indiegogo prices on our new range of products, plus some fantastic perks in collaboration with our friends and collaborators.________________________________________________________________________– WASTE INTO WORTH – Billy Tannery started with a question. In a world of increasing demand for sustainable materials, how could we be wasting such a fantastic natural by-product?Most ‘luxury' leather goods brands rely on sprawling global supply chains, with materials and products made in questionable environmental and ethical conditions. We believe in another way.At Billy Tannery our supply chain is as small as possible, so we can keep a close eye on all of the details. From farm to tannery to workshop to you.Choose a better leather. Promote the goat.1,2.Our goat leather can be traced back to just two farms, one in Lancashire, the other in Somerset. Both rear dairy billies for award-winning goat meat supplier, Cabrito.3.The goatskins are then tanned using our own low- impact mimosa bark process in our micro-tannery, the first of its kind in the UK.4.Once tanned, the skins are dyed and finished at a local family-run leather finishing company just down the road in Northamptonshire.5,6Our products are made in two small workshops in Somerset and Leicestershire. Both carefully chosenfor their passion, craftsmanship and consistency.________________________________________________________________________– NEW PRODUCTS –•THE CARDHOLDER 2.0 Now featuring an extra card pocket and a more practical shape, our new cardholder is perfect for those who want to keep things minimal.Early Bird: £40, Indiegogo: £45, RRP: £50 Features:3 card pockets, thin construction, semi-circular notches for easier access to cards.Dimensions:105mm x 70mmAvailable colours:(black, chestnut, navy, forest, natural)•THE BIFOLD By popular demand our new bifold wallet has been designed for those who have that little bit extra to carry each day. Plenty of space for your notes, cards and more.Early Bird: £70, Indiegogo: £75, RRP: £85  Features:6 card pockets, 1 note pocket, semi-circular notches for easier access to cards.Dimensions:111mm x 75mm (111mm x 150mm open)Available colours:(black, chestnut, navy, forest, natural)•THE JOURNAL A new refillable notebook bound in our British goat leather. Features an internal pen loop and paper made from recycled leather fibres.Early Bird: £78, Indiegogo: £85, RRP: £95  Features:Takes A5 paper refills (available on our website), recyclable leather paper, internal pen loop, gun-metal stud closure.Dimensions:230mm x 165mm (230mm x 430mm open)Available colours:(black, chestnut, navy, forest, natural)•THE POUCH Functional, flexible and full of character our new zip pouches are available in three sizes: SMALLIdeal for travel, toiletries, make-up, stationary etc. Early Bird: £60, Indiegogo: £65, RRP: £70  MEDIUMFits tablets up to 251x185mm (UPDATED SIZE)Early Bird: £80, Indiegogo: £85, RRP: £90  LARGEFits laptops up to 15” MacBook.Early Bird: £105, Indiegogo: £115, RRP: £125 External Dimensions:S: 150mm x 200mm (Zip opening: 175mm)M: 200mm x 265mm (Zip opening: 255mm)L: 290mm x 400mm (Zip opening: 355mm)Available colours:(black, chestnut, navy, forest, natural)•THE ZIPTOP BACKPACK Designed as a smaller, lighter-weight version of our signature backpack, the Zip Backpack delivers on many levels. Pictured in Chestnut, also available in Black and Forest green.Early Bird: £450, Indiegogo: £495, RRP: £550  Features:1 exterior slip pocket, 2 interior pockets, padded laptop compartment, bridle leather shoulder straps & handles, zip closureDimensions:460mm x 330mm (handles 170mm high)Available colours:(black, chestnut, forest)•NEW PERK:THE APRON Our best-selling leather aprons were designed with the kitchen in mind, both for home cooks and professional chefs, but they are also perfect for craftspeople of all kinds. Great British Menu winner, goat aficionado and insanely talented chef James Cochran was the first to wear our aprons. As an exclusive Indiegogo extra each Apron will come with a complimentary jar of his infamous 1251 Scotch Bonnet Jam.ONLY 5 AVAILABLE.Indiegogo: £195, RRP: £230   Features:Adjustable cross-back straps, chest pocket, solid metal fittings and a hip loop for a towelAvailable colours:chestnut, black _______________________________________________________________________ #PROMOTETHEGOAT– REWARDS –•BILLY x CABRITO:GOAT COOKERY SCHOOL WITH JAMES WHETLOR  Enjoy an evening with Cabrito founder and infamous Goat Man, James Whetlor. Not only learn how to cook two recipes from James’ award-winning book, Goat: Cooking & Eating, but enjoy the dishes with James and the Billy Tannery team before taking home a signed copy of the book.Taking place at Native Resturant, London Bridge from 6.30pm on Monday 11th November. ONLY 8 PLACES LEFT. £65•BILLY x STUDIO ASHBY:GOAT LEATHER STOOL   Designed in collaboration with Interior Designer of the Year Studio Ashby, this stunning stool will be handmade in London and features an oak frame upholstered in our Forest and Natural goat leather. This is an exclusive opportunity to own the very first one to be made with 30% off the future retail price. Please note that the images are a 3D render.ONLY 1 AVAILABLE. £1,400.•BILLY x LEE MARSH:GOAT SUEDE BOMBERSavile Row trained tailor Lee Marsh has made suits for some of the finest brands and customers, including royalty. Establishing his own brand in 2013, Lee Marsh Blue Label was launched in 2019 and offers ready-to-wear bomber jackets. This is an exclusive opportunity to have one made-to-order in our British goat suede. Features:Chestnut goat suede, double RiRi zip, double pleated back, roped sleeve head, patch pockets with flap & button, structured shoulder line with floating chest canvas, part hand sewn linings, round inside pockets. Each bomber is made-to-order and after purchase you will be contacted to discuss sizing. The jacket can also be made from your own measurements to ensure an optimal fit. ONLY 2 AVAILABLE. £2,250.•MICRO-TANNERY MASTERCLASS  A full-day hands-on tannery experience. Join Jack on Saturday 30th November for a tour of the new tannery and take part in tanning a batch of goat leather. Includes lunch and a Key Wrap to take home. Excludes travel, but a pick-up from Market Harborough train station will be provided.12 SPOTS AVAILABLE. £50.________________________________________________________________________ – BUNDLES –•THE KID SET1x Cardholder, 1x Journal, 1x Pouch (S)£185. SAVE £30.•THE NANNY SETBifold, Pouch (M), Zip Back£650. SAVE £75.•THE G.O.A.T. SET1x Cardholder, 1x Bifold, 1x Journal, 1x Pouch (S), 1x Pouch (M), 1x Pouch (L), 1x Ziptop Backpack£900. SAVE £165.•CUSTOM BUNDLES Please note that many of the items can be bought together using add-ons after you select a perk. However, any combination of products or tickets can be requested. If you ask really nicely we may even be able to offer a special price on items from our existing range of products...Click here to contact us and we will give you instructions. ________________________________________________________________________ – AS FEATURED IN –________________________________________________________________________ – THE GOAL & BUDGET – The below chart gives a rough breakdown of where the funds will go. £6k is the minimum amount needed to complete the move, however this is only a fraction of the total project cost.________________________________________________________________________ – TIMELINE – ________________________________________________________________________ – THE GOOD NEWS –________________________________________________________________________ – MORE ABOUT US –  Billy Tannery founders Jack and Rory have known each other since childhood. Growing up in the Midlands we have always been aware of the rich history of the local leather industry. We moved to London to work in marketing and design, but after discovering the terrible waste of goatskins going on in Britain, despite knowing nothing about leather production, we decided that we had to act.The wider team now includes local leather industry veterans, a leading accessories designer, two incredbile British workshops and Jack's father Charles, who helps manages the tannery. Together Billy Tannery is here to prove that there is life in the British leather industry yet.________________________________________________________________________ – RISKS & CHALLENGES – We have spent the last 2-3 years finding the best partners. From leather consultants to our workshops and fulfilment partner, they all have decades of experience. It's important to note that fulfilment of our rewards is not tied to us moving the tannery immediately and there is a back-up plan should this relocation be delayed.Our production schedule includes some buffer and we have been clear to label reward tiers with their respective delivery timings. In our experience manufacturing in the UK can sometimes take longer than anticipated and there is always a risk of unexpected delays. The fact that (apart from Swiss zips) our entire supply chain is based in the UK means that we will be personally on hand to keep delivery on track and we are committed to being very open with our communication throughout.Please note that some international backers may incur duty/taxes on top of shipping costs. Unfortunately we cannot control local customs processes but you probably already know if this will affect you!________________________________________________________________________ – CONTACT US – Any questions? Please contact us by email, social media or phone: Email: info@billytannery.co.ukCall: +44 (0)330 0438293Social: Instagram, Twitter, Facebook

story:
Story

Performance jackets keep you performing at your best when the weather is at its worst. These jackets are durable enough to shield your body from a deluge, yet athletic enough to let you move without a problem. However, the potential (invisible) problems are:

Sweat contains bacteria that grows quickly and makes the jacket smell.

If you are exposed to a complex environment when running/jogging/cycling etc. , microbes will adhere to the surface of the jacket and can then be taken into your home or anywhere else.

It is very rare to find jackets that are designed with face protection to block out raindrops, wind, dust and even airborne particles & substances.

INTRODUCING PERX

FEATURE COMPARISON

PerX is one of the Most Affordable and Functional Performance Jacket.

No need to worry about wear PerX even in the summer. The PerX A is thin and designed ideally for hot temperatures [up to 35C/95F] with 20,000 g/m2/24hrs for breathability and UPF 50+ for sun protection while PerX B is the pro version to keep you performing at your best.

And YES! The price includes EVERYTHING. You DON"T NEED to pay extra Shipping Fee or TAX/VAT.

PerX is made from antimicrobial fabric that is strictly tested and certified by INTERTEK. It can reduce 99% of bacteria.

How antimicrobial works 

This is achieved by treating the fabric with the latest proprietary chemicals [Permanent Coating Technology into the fibers of the fabric]  that inhibit the growth of pathogens and using yarns that are especially designed to provide inbuilt microscopic antibacterial functionality. By combining these properties, the yarns help stop microbes from developing, while simultaneously promoting moisture flows, thereby maximizing comfort and extending the life of the fabric.

PerX is especially designed with extra parts [longer neck area to cover the nose] to block raindrops, wind, dust and airborne particles & substances.

The hood and hem feature a drawstring design, along with Velcro cuffs that tighten and keep users extra secure in any conditions.  

The back pocket of PerX is designed to pack the jacket into itself, making it very convenient for users to carry their PerX with them, in any bag. 

PerX is a 2-layer performance jacket featuring a TPU/PTFE membrane, which is 20k waterproof and 20k breathable according to JIS.

We also know how important pockets are for a functional jacket. There are 6 outer pockets featuring waterproof zips to store personal belongings.

The main zip is featuring YKK 2-way zip, which is also waterproof and seam taping to protect against harsh weather conditions.

Technically, PerX A is thinner than PerX B. They are both made from antimicrobial fabrics and are both 2-layer performance jackets. PerX B, featuring PTFE membrane [better than TPU], is the pro version to keep you performing the best while the PerX A is ideally designed for hot temperatures while still keeping you feel breathable.

Male Model - 186CM, 80KG - Size L - Slim fit [SIze XL is recommended for a regular fit]

Female Model - 170CM, 45KG - Size XL - Loose Fit [Size S/M is recommended for a regular fit]  

 

PerX A and PerX B Demo Video

 PLAY

For us, the PerX idea is indeed a brilliant one that originally came from George, who's the CMO as well as a bike commuter. He wears performance jackets all year round! The idea really is a breakthrough in the industry, because every player seems ONLY interested in performance figures i.e. wp/mp. However, thanks to PerX, we are now thinking in a totally different way to diversify the applications of TPU technology. 

At TPUX, we are a group of designers and sports enthusiasts with the same passion for performance jackets. The TPU (membrane) is actually the iconic part of any performance jacket, while the X will be any products created. Our goal is to create the best and most affordable performance jacket with our TPU / PTFE, coating and textile technology, while also trying to integrate membrane and lamination technology into many other types of clothes such as denim jackets and hoodies etc.

As a professional textile company, we constantly work toward technological innovation and continually strive to offer top quality products at better prices in order to be the best partner offering all kinds of laminated and functional fabrics. Founded in 2000, we have come a long way from doing simple lamination in our early days to now being almost vertical, even extruding our own waterproof breathable membranes allowing us to have control over the whole process and to be able to price down many of the products we offer.

We've launched various kinds of waterproof vapor permeable, and breathable products, such as TPU, Fallex, Hytrell, PU, PE, PP, and PTFE, which can then be bonded with knits, wovens and non-wovens.  Although we specialize in outdoor garments, our products are also commonly used in shoe materials, rain coats, military uniforms, pharmaceutical industry, gloves, hats, and even bags and other accessories.

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.

Risks and challenges

Coronavirus and its potential impact on manufacturing and delivery: Our supply chain passes through multiple countries to make its way to you, our backers. It’s difficult to know the extent and impact that the continued spread of Coronavirus will have at this point, but our factory and fulfillment processes are susceptible to interruption, just as the rest of the world is. As of May 2020, our manufacturing partner’s team in China is in good health and happily at work. Also, international shipping is another potential risk that backers and us have to take into consideration. We guarantee global free shipping according to a price agreement with our couriers. However, if, by any chance, the pandemic gets out of control and hugely impacts future shipping costs, we will have no choice but to wait until the price goes back down to within our budget range.

story:
At Pockey we wanted to create the perfect premium Smart clutch: a clutch that has it all and that’s specially handcrafted from Eco-Friendly Premium leather for the needs of every woman.

First, traditional brands feel outdated. Second, they are overpriced and out-of-reach for most of us. $400 for a clutch? C'mon. Third, they wear off after few months of usage. Fourth, the inexpensive clutch brands are either low quality or poorly designed. And fifth, none of the other brands take care of your credit cards information theft.

Current Problems

What does this mean? It means we are fed up with always having to sacrifice something when buying a clutch, whether it is design, comfort, quality, security or paying a fortune for a decent pair. That’s where Pockey comes in. We want to build the perfect premium Clutch for the contemporary women.

With the advancement of contactless card reader technology, credit card information is at a high risk of being stolen from cards in current clutches. 

Card information Theft

 

Here at Pockey, we have come up with an innovative solution by offering clutches handcrafted from eco-friendly “Vegetable tanned Full Grain leather”, sourced from Tuscany, Italy.

 

Our Clutch manufacturing starts here

To produce Our premium leather, it takes 40 days and skilled craftsmanship compared to just a day for machine-made chrome- tanned leather. 

Why it's premium material?

Pockey is made from the rarest and most expensive grade of vegetable tanned leather available sourced from Tuscany, Italy. Pockey comes in 4 vibrant colors

We think that you should never have to feel unsafe carrying your Credit/Debit cards. That’s why Pockey comes with a built-in Smart RFID Blocker to protect against the unauthorized scanning of cards.

Build with Security

Feel secured with Pockey clutches

 

When a clutch is really well made it can last for decades, it will look even better with time. As an accessories enthusiasts, we have worked with almost every material available to build the best quality product for you, but for the last one year, we’ve focused on Vegetable-Tanned leather, which we believe is the best material available in the market.  

You don’t have to worry about damaging Pockey either. According to our Durability Index, Pockey is 5 times more durable than a conventional clutch.

5x more durable

EXPERTLY CRAFTED: We want you to experience world-class craftsmanship. All of our clutches are handmade by experienced artisans who are passionate about leather.  

COMFORTABLE: We have carefully selected every material and reexamined every process in order to create a clutch that makes you look good and feel comfortable from day one.  

HARDWEARING: Good style is timeless and we want you to look great for decades. Our leather is full-grain vegetable tanned and completely natural. With proper care, it will last a lifetime and improve with wear.  

ETHICALLY MADE: You can walk peacefully knowing the material used to make your clutch are natural and chrome free. Plus, our leather is vegetable tanned and chrome-free.  

EASY TO REPAIR: Our stitched leather is an elegant statement and, unlike cheap clutches, they are easy to ?? when they wear out.

 

Pockey represents outstanding quality and visionary design. We brainstormed endlessly and tested hundreds of materials and production techniques to make a truly premium wallet that gives a unique user experience. 

Here are the details:  

8 cards, coin pouch, iPhone 7 plus compartment, slim power bank, 2 bills compartment  

Size - 190 x 92 x 24mm  

Lightweight ~ 150gms compared to iPhone 7 plus which is 188gms 

 

  

 

 

 

We are a multinational group of designers, creators, innovators and entrepreneurs who try see the world from a slightly different angle.
