story:
With your help we raised 577% of our original goal!

Indiegogo has invited The Wallet Drone into its Forever Funding program which means although you missed out on the campaign you can still contribute to

 Pre-Order a Wallet Drone at a Discount Below!








We have designed the smallest, most compact quadcopter and controller that will allow you to have fun and practice full flight mechanics everywhere you go!


  • We asked what you wanted to see in a drone and you told us you wanted a drone that you could take anywhere-one that didn’t require a bulky carrying case

  • You also  indicated a desire to be able to charge the drone on the go

The Wallet Drone combines both ideas into one design: a compact controller that docks the World's Smallest Quadcopter™ inside of its case and charges the drone without the need for wires or access to a USB port.

With the Wallet Drone, you can enjoy full quadcopter flight anywhere you go: both indoors and outdoors-at the office, in the park, in your dorm and beyond!


The Wallet Drone is designed to be so small and lightweight that you can simply place it in your pocket, purse, backpack (anywhere a wallet would fit), making it ideal for everyday fun and practice!

Being able to charge the Wallet Drone on the go without wires, outlets or a computer allows you to take it on any type of adventure.

The Wallet Drone™ is able to charge while docked INSIDE of the controller, using 4-AA Batteries (not included) OR you can charge the Wallet Drone™ with the included USB cable.

The Wallet Drone comes fully assembled and ready to fly after a short 15 minute charge with 4-AA batteries in the remote control docking station or via the included USB cable.

Each Wallet Drone comes with the Drone itself, a wallet sized 2.4gHz remote controller/docking station, a USB charging cable and one spare set of blades.


Choose from Green, Yellow, Orange and Blue!

At just 4cm, the Wallet Drone truly is the World's Smallest Quadcopter™

Even the controller has been designed to be small, slim and super portable!


This is the second model in a rapidly growing line of inexpensive, feature-packed and fun-to-fly quadcopters and drones that Axis Drones has lined up for 2015.

The Axis Nano Drone for Beginners was successfully funded on Indiegogo in April and is currently in production and has already finished shipping to all backers as scheduled. 

By backing the Wallet Drone you are supporting a small business that is family owned and operated in Upstate New York. With your help we will continue to create more local jobs and grow our small business, it is of course, the American Dream!


Risks & Challenges:

This will be Morrison Innovations' seventh crowdfunding campaign (Axis Drones' Second), we are very familiar with the process, obstacles and challenges that we will encounter.

As always, we try to minimize any impact to you. Our schedule may be fairly aggressive, but we have accounted for time to adequately test and double-check everything so that you get an awesome new Wallet Drone ™.

We don’t anticipate problems, but we recognize that product development sometimes hits snags with delays or iteration. We’ll keep you informed every step of the way so that you know what to expect.

Other Ways You Can Help:

We know that contributing to the campaign isn't always a possibility for everyone- so if you believe in our product and the brand we are building, please contribute in other ways! We love all of the support we can get.

    • Share this project on your Social Media Profiles, Walls, Forums, Pages etc

    • Email your friends and family members that may be interested

    • Write to online tech sites and ask them to feature our campaign

    • Send us a message of support and encouragement :)


Press Inquiries and Media Kit:

For all press inquiries, media kit requests and wholesale options please send an email to fly [at] AxisDrones [dot] com
story_txt:
With your help we raised 577% of our original goal!Indiegogo has invited The Wallet Drone into its Forever Funding program which means although you missed out on the campaign you can still contribute to Pre-Order a Wallet Drone at a Discount Below!
































We have designed the smallest, most compact quadcopter and controller that will allow you to have fun and practice full flight mechanics everywhere you go!


We asked what you wanted to see in a drone and you told us you wanted a drone that you could take anywhere-one that didn’t require a bulky carrying case
You also  indicated a desire to be able to charge the drone on the go
The Wallet Drone combines both ideas into one design: a compact controller that docks the World's Smallest Quadcopter™ inside of its case and charges the drone without the need for wires or access to a USB port.With the Wallet Drone, you can enjoy full quadcopter flight anywhere you go: both indoors and outdoors-at the office, in the park, in your dorm and beyond!The Wallet Drone is designed to be so small and lightweight that you can simply place it in your pocket, purse, backpack (anywhere a wallet would fit), making it ideal for everyday fun and practice!
Being able to charge the Wallet Drone on the go without wires, outlets or a computer allows you to take it on any type of adventure.



The Wallet Drone™ is able to charge while docked INSIDE of the controller, using 4-AA Batteries (not included) OR you can charge the Wallet Drone™ with the included USB cable.







The Wallet Drone comes fully assembled and ready to fly after a short 15 minute charge with 4-AA batteries in the remote control docking station or via the included USB cable.



Each Wallet Drone comes with the Drone itself, a wallet sized 2.4gHz remote controller/docking station, a USB charging cable and one spare set of blades.


Choose from Green, Yellow, Orange and Blue!




At just 4cm, the Wallet Drone truly is the World's Smallest Quadcopter™



Even the controller has been designed to be small, slim and super portable!









This is the second model in a rapidly growing line of inexpensive, feature-packed and fun-to-fly quadcopters and drones that Axis Drones has lined up for 2015.
The Axis Nano Drone for Beginners was successfully funded on Indiegogo in April and is currently in production and has already finished shipping to all backers as scheduled. 
By backing the Wallet Drone you are supporting a small business that is family owned and operated in Upstate New York. With your help we will continue to create more local jobs and grow our small business, it is of course, the American Dream!


Risks & Challenges:
This will be Morrison Innovations' seventh crowdfunding campaign (Axis Drones' Second), we are very familiar with the process, obstacles and challenges that we will encounter.
As always, we try to minimize any impact to you. Our schedule may be fairly aggressive, but we have accounted for time to adequately test and double-check everything so that you get an awesome new Wallet Drone ™.We don’t anticipate problems, but we recognize that product development sometimes hits snags with delays or iteration. We’ll keep you informed every step of the way so that you know what to expect.



Other Ways You Can Help:


We know that contributing to the campaign isn't always a possibility for everyone- so if you believe in our product and the brand we are building, please contribute in other ways! We love all of the support we can get.


Share this project on your Social Media Profiles, Walls, Forums, Pages etc
Email your friends and family members that may be interested
Write to online tech sites and ask them to feature our campaign
Send us a message of support and encouragement :)

story:
MEDIA

 
 

 

FACTS

Stress and fatigue generate a high number of free radicals in our body. Free radicals destroy the body's cells and have become the number one killer of health! Moreover, pressure and tension tend to speed up the body's sympathetic activities, causing vasoconstriction that increases blood pressure. Over time, these activities can turn into chronic diseases such as high blood pressure. It is important to learn about our pressure and fatigue at work, and how to deal with them.

General

Trio is a powerful yet economical smart health bracelet. With an innovative design, Trio measures the user’s heart rate and blood pressure by recording down all the values and save in report for further reference. Through its well designed Coherent breath training and exercises to reduce the stress and fatigue. Moreover, Trio’s unique "HRV Soul matching” function - matching the "fit" users who also have Trio nearby and connect them for further social activities - makes Trio the only smart bracelet in the world with social networking functions. 

 

Trio measures three major data - ECG, Heart rate with high accuracy and PWTT blood pressure for reference. And it’s so easy to use. Trio can automatically records the user’s heart rate data 24 hours a day. Having these data as a reference, the you can adjust your lifestyle from work to rest any time he needs it. It becomes easier and more effective to reach the physical and mental health balance.  

 

 

PWTT Blood Pressure Demo

 

 
 

Autonomic Nervous System

Many lifestyle diseases are caused by Autonomic dysfunction. Trio’s "WynHeart" APP not only records your heart rate variability data, but it further analyzes your current autonomic nervous state by indexing it into mental pressure index, fatigue index, physical fitness, physical and mental load index. All these functions allow you to fully understand your own health status, and help you adjust timely and effectively to stay away from *sub-health. 

Note: Sub-health, a state between health and disease when all necessary physical and chemical indexes are tested negative by medical equipment, things seem normal but the person experiences all kind of discomforts and even pain.

 

This WynHeart APP supports iOS 8.0 and Android 4.4 phones. 

 

 

 

ANS Demo

 

 

 

SoulMatch

The unique and innovative "Soul matching" function enables you to test your “fit” among the Trio's adopters. Its design principle is to analyze the  measured heart rate variability (HRV) spectrum transform to personal traits for mutual pairing.This function connects friends who are willing to monitor one another’s health, and work together as a team while enjoying social connections! Only true experts with the ability to analyze the heart rhythm variation could invent such technology. Our patent is on the way! 

 

Health Data are collected by heart rate variability (HRV) that analyze the state of the autonomic nerve. Having accurate health data helps you better understand your current body and mind conditions. What is even more interesting is that, research papers in the United States has found correlations between heart rate and personality. At the same time, we have found the algorithm of coincidence factor from the long-term experiment of HRV frequency, which can be applied in daily life. Trio launches the world's exclusive patented "HRV" feature to test the “psychic fit” between you and your friends, expand your social circles, and help you find your "Buddies”.

SoulMatch Demo

 

Coherent Breath

Coherent breathing training relaxes one’s body and smooth the blood pressure. To get started with the respiration training, turn on the APP , enter the Breath Training page, and place your finger on the bracelet's electrode pad (on the screen). 

 

 

Coherent Breath Demo

 

Through relaxation and resonance breathing, you stablize the parasympathetic nerves. Then, your mind and your body are so relaxed that you fall asleep quickly. Trio also records your sleep status; it helps you understand the quality of your sleep. In additon, with the silent vibration wake up function, you can go to bed on time and wake up gently in the morning. Developing good sleeping habits becomes so easy, you will feel great everyday!

Sleep well breath demo

 

Exercise Record

Trio smart bracelet indispensably track your every movement. For example, Trio records in real time your daily walking steps and distance traveled, and then calculate your Calorie Consumption.

Call and Message Reminder

 

When the phone receives a message or call, the bracelet vibrates and displays the caller info and message content. You no longer have to take out the phone to confirm the message frequently.

Technology Explanation

 

1. PWTT Blood Pressure Technology

Pulse wave transmission rate and blood pressure are positively correlated. High blood pressure induces fast pulse wave transmission, otherwise slow. The pulse wave transit time (PWTT) can be obtained through the ECG signal and the pulse signal PPG to further calculate the blood pressure value. With the advance in technology, the PWTT technology can now be embedded in the bracelet. This invention greatly increase the convenience of blood pressure measurement.

The blood pressure data is measured by placing the index finger on the screen's electrode pad, at this moment, the other electrode pad at the bottom of the bracelet touches the wrist, the green light sensor then activates, and the data calculation starts. 

PWTT blood pressure demo

Note: This bracelet is not a medical device. Use only as a reference, not for disease diagnosis or treatment purposes. Please seek medical advice immediately if you have concerns about your health.

 

 

We encourage all family members to test the Trio bracelet ECG function. Knowing one another’s autonomic nervous and pulse pressure results help prevent health problems in the family. Everyone enjoys the happiness of healthy body and family companion. 

 

2. Soul Matching Technology

Health Data are collected by heart rate variability (HRV) that analyze the state of the autonomic nervous system. Having accurate health data helps you better understand your current body and mind conditions. What is even more interesting is that, research papers has found correlations between heart rate and personality. At the same time, we have found the algorithm of coincidence factor from the long-term experiment of HRV frequency, which can be applied in daily life. Trio launches the world's exclusive patented "HRV" feature to test the “psychic fit” between you and your friends, expand your social circles, and help you find your "Buddies”.

 

Specifications

 

        Main Chip : NR51822

        G-sensor : LIS3DH

        ECG sensor : BL

        PPG : Silicon Lab

        Screen : 0.91 display

        Language : English/Chinese

        Battery : 100mAh

        Charger : USB clip

        Operating time : 4-5 days

        Standby time : 10-14 days

        Waterproof rating : IP66 

 

Selections

Four designs can be found during the crowd-funding stage, each comes with a bright silver metal watch frame. Since the strap size is the standard design, users are free to go to the watch shop and pick their favorite colors, styles, or materials for change.

 

 

Note: The colors of the above bracelet straps might look different on your monitor, kindly refer to the true products upon delivery.

 

 

Team Members

Wyncor engineering team specializes in analysis sleep quality, physical activities, autonomic nervous system and arrhythmia. At the same time, we incorporate artificial intelligence to calculate, analyze, warn, advise and improve the quality of sleep and provide accurate preventive health care services.

We co-operate with the Institute of Technology and Graduate Institute of Physiotherapy and Applied Multi-function Sensing Technology to develop the electrocardiogram devices such as Dr. Sleep, Dr. Sport, Dr. ANS and Dr. Cardiac. These devices provide great comfort at home for better sleep quality , stable Autonomic nervous system, exercise physical fitness and heart rate monitoring. The collected data are uploaded to the cloud, and accurate health reports are then generated through machine learning and artificial intelligence calculations.

These cloud data are encrypted so that outsiders can not obtain. However, the user himself can easily access by their password or download any data to his doctor, and authorize him or grant him the remote access for detailed analysis and diagnosis of the problems. Please visit our website for more information:  www.iwyncor.com 

 

Expectation

Most smart bracelet and watch are focused on fitness tracking but forgot the stress from our working environment that truly need to solve. We will add more office simple exercises and different coherent breath programs in our APP that can help more people to reduce their fatigue and stress with small effort. 

 

Trio Timeline

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We are going to pilot run the Trio. Our mass production is set to the end of January. The risk for delayed production lies in the delivery of packaging and raw materials to the production line may be delayed before the Chinese New Year season where the traffic is usually jammed. We therefore need to be prepared in advance. For the most challenging issue is the perk delivery,  we have the help from Floship company who are the certified shipping company, this truly can shorten the shipment processing and assurance to the delivery on time.

 

 

 

 Q&A

 

1. Do you offer a Warranty?

Ans: Yes, we do offer a warranty. The warranty period is 14 months.

2. What is the waterproof rating of Trio?

Ans: The Trio waterproof rating is IP66.

3. How many coherent breath program does Trio have?

Ans: Currently, Trio has 2 coherent breaths stress relief and sleep well breathing. We will provide Yoga and Zen meditation breaths near soon.

story:
Our Story

Love and Water Designs is an online community created by Alexis Fedor that connects artists with charities to create Wearable Philanthropy.  We hold design projects in the name of different charities, invite artists from around the world to submit designs inspired by the mission of the charities, have our community vote, rate and comment on each design they feel best expresses the mission of the charities and then print the chosen designs on limited-edition t-shirts.  We award the artists a cash prize and donate 50% of the profits to the charities for each shirt sold.

After launching the website in October 2010, Alexis spent her first year as a business owner learning all she could about what Love and Water Designs needs to thrive, based on her collective feedback from her actively supportive community. 

She learned what she needs to make her completely interactive site more community-driven and user-friendly, she learned what she needs to do in order to reach more artists who are interested in creating work for incredible causes and she learned how a well-executed website can generate a huge amount of sales, resulting in a huge amount of donations that go directly to the causes each piece of art represents.

The Impact

The impact of reaching our goal of $20,000.00 will result in allowing us to re-build our website and reach our goal this year of doing $100,000.00 in revenue, allowing us to give at least $25,000.00 to the charities we hold projects for, and at least $5,000.00 to the artists who create the designs.  It will also allow us to implement the outreach programs we already have in place and ready to go to reach more charities, artists and youth that comprise our community.  If we don't reach this goal we will not be able to re-launch our site, which will significantly hold up our progress.  Because our current site needs re-built in order to hold the amount of work and activity to generate this amount of sales and traffic, and because it has to be built on a platform that allows for everyone to have interactive profiles, we need to have an amazing Drupal website developer create that space for us.


What We Need & What You Get

$20,000 will allow us to do this:

$10,000 for our Drupal web development team to re-build our site that will allow for all artists to create profiles that let them interact with any other artist or charity on the site, allow us to showcase all art and all the projects we hold for charities, allow us to implement our charity meter that shows exactly how much money we raise for charities, and our Love Shack Points System for those who rack up points for being active community members.  It will also allow us to hold more space for quadruple the traffic we have now, and quadruple the sales, resulting in quadruple the amount we can give back.


$3,000 will go toward the implementation of our Youth Board, a year-long internship program comprised of a group of select high school students who work with us to learn the skills of social entrepreneurship and create outreach programs for other youth around the world to get involved with Love and Water Designs.  This will include a scholarship program.


$7,000 will allow us to schedule speaking engagements and outreach tours for the Love and Water Designs team to make in order to speak to groups of artists and charities around the country in order to expand our fast-growing community, pay for additional supplies and mailing materials and all other additional expenses that arise as a result of our new influx of community members, charities and sales.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't give to our campaign now but still want to help, or have already given and want to help even more, we ask that you pass our link around to your friends and family who might be interested in helping or sharing it with their friends and family as well!  Remember, a lot of a little adds up to a lot, fast.  We value and appreciate all of your support, in every way!

story:
The Story Behind The Brand

Hi, my name is Gabriel Anzueto, and I am the Founder of The Fetch Co. - a sustainable clothing brand. Our story began in 2016 when I was struggling with depression while studying at Lynn University.

At first, I turned to anxiety pills, but ultimately they did not work out. I felt I could not get out of that hole and got deeper into it. As a man, I felt like there was some pressure not to speak out about what I was going through. It is seen as a taboo to speak out about one's mental health. Men are often told not to cry or show weakness because it "takes away from our masculinity" but that is simply not the case. I knew I had to be honest about my mental health, and started to explore other options to treat my anxiety. It was then that I found my Chief Dog Officer Remi, the Weimaraner. A 90 lbs. bundle of love, loyalty, happiness, and respect. He came into my life at my lowest and helped me rebuild my life from nothing. Since then, aside from being my emotional support dog, he's been my best friend and companion.

Ultimately, Remi is the one that truly saved my life through his loyalty and support. It is then that I realized the importance of having a companion such as Remi. This experience pushed me to search for ways in which I could give back. My daily question was, If Remi saved my life, then why can't I come up with a business that saves other dogs' lives?

Love, Loyalty, Respect, and Empathy are the pillars on which I founded The Fetch Co. 

Our Mission and Vision

Our Mission is to give back by donating 20% of all our profits to organizations supporting stray and malnourished dogs.

The "Connect with a Pooch" program is a program that we plan to create in 2023 with the dogs that we will have supported by then and connect them with individuals that struggle with mental health and are in need of a companion.

Our Vision at Fetch is to become a worldwide known brand that can help different organizations around the world as well as to create the Fetch Foundation, a foundation dedicated to protecting dogs from abuse and to help people with mental health issues find a best friend that will love them unconditionally. 

 

 

Why is the campaign so important?

Being a person that suffered from depression and got saved by a dog made me realize that through the creation of different fetch collections we could do good. It is so important for us to give back that we will pledge to always give back 20% of our profits. Our Casual Apparel is perfect for those long walks with your best friend, snuggly Netflix nights with your pooch, and of course the long mornings in bed. Dogs have become such an important part of our lives so its our duty to give them more love than they give us.

COVID-19 has affected us all, imagine the detrimental effect it has had on stray dogs that lived through the feeding of tourists.

 

What You, the crowdfunding Founders will Help us achieve?

  • Crowdfunding will help us reduce costs from our manufacturers as well as reach more people and countries. 

  • It will help us provide job opportunities in Guatemala with our manufacturer.

  • It will also help us to reduce the costs of shipping and printing. 

  • It will help us further develop our website for the best user experience.

  • It will help us get closer to our mission of providing food and shelter for 100,000 stray dogs around the world by the year 2023. 

  • It will help us create a community that believes in the same pillars that fetch was built on and to be active about mental health and the positive effects dogs have on us.

  • It will help us be the voice of dogs that are of course voiceless and cannot defend themselves from the hate and negligence of many.

  • It will help us educate the young about how dogs and animals should be treated and respected.

  • It will help us get closer to creating the CONNECT WITH A POOCH program.

  • It will help us bring back jobs to manufacturers that took a hit during Covid.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking for $25,000 in funding, it will be divided like this:

We are asking for $25,000 because we have to also cover the indiegogo 5% fee, the wire transfer fees as well as other fees. The funding budget we have made is for $15,000 after all Fees have been paid for.

If the goal is surpassed we will be transparent and show you were the money is going towards as well.

Our marketing budget will help us market Fetch for the next 3 months. The funding will help us give bonuses to the people that have helped us so far, it is very important for our people to know we appreciate their effort and want to keep giving back to them. 

 

 

Get Excited About Our Perks!

 

 

The perks that we are offering are called the Founder perks! Limited edition apparel that only the founders of our crowdfunding will get.

Want to talk to the Founder, we will make it happen! Thats another perk for our founders.

You will appear in our website as a Founder, as a person that believed in Us to cause a good impact in the world and in dogs.

THE FETCH IMPACT!

The impact that this crowdfunding  campaign will create not just at The Fetch Co but worldwide will be massive.  You are getting us closer to helping us reach our goal of saving 100,000 stray dogs by year 2023, you are helping us reach our goal of connecting this dogs with people suffering from mental health. We believe we can become a global brand with the purpose of giving back, of giving hope and happiness in a world fueled with so much negativity. We know year 2020 hasn't been good to anyone, thats why here at The Fetch Co we plan to create an impact starting as soon as possible, making the start of 2021 AMAZING!

We as humans got our lifes changed around, imagine the stray dogs that relied on tourists to be fed. Dogs are also part of this world and have been impacted as well. We plan to create a program for post covid that will help save the stray dogs, give them nutrients and make them happy again.

Our brand brings value to the world in the sense that we promise to always give back not just in our monetary capabilities but in our service as humans, our employees will take a day of the month to help dogs in their city, we will call this day,  PAW DAY.

Our Brand brings value to this world because we are a brand with a purpose, a purpose to give happiness back and to reduce the negativity that we are being surrounded with.

Our Brand gives value to the world because we are anticipating what will happen in the next 5 years with our mental health, our mental health has taken a toll during the last 8 months, people are starting to suffer from depression and anxiety, psicologically the covid has left us with a feeling of not wanting to go out. At Fetch we know we can help take this issues to light by talking about mental health and the good effects dogs have on us.

 

Risks & Challenges

Running out of Stock:

Our biggest challenge for this campaign is running out of stock, and we don't want let you our founders down. Thats why we are limiting the number of perks available to ensure that every founder that orders, gets its perks. 

We have created the perks to be limited edition for our founders to have the best of the best.

International Returns:

Our second biggest challenge is the return of apparel when it comes to our international clients. Thats why it is very important for our international founders to verify their sizes in our size section.

The international returns wont be accepted because of the high prices to send back the product.

Marketing:

Our Third Challenge is how we are going to market our brand so that people know what we are doing and feel the connection.  Marketing is our way to go to open the door for people to know about our brand, our market is definitely the dog lovers. With more money for marketing more people we can reach. We plan to use Artificial intelligence for our campaigns.

Growth:

Our Fourth Challenge is the growth, we know we will become a fast growing company and brand. We know we have the brand and mission to do so. Our growth will be fast thats why we need your help to create that momentum, there are many ways to help, From buying our Merch to sharing our social media we plan to make all people that help us our brand ambassadors.

 

Sustainable packaging:

Our biggest challenge is to create the Fetch box, a box in which all your aparell will be delivered but also a box that can be used for good. We want to create a box that can become a food bowl, a bowl of water for stray dogs around your community. We want this box to be sustainable, to be functional, to help you give back to dogs and not just us. Our impact will be bigger with your help.

 

How do we plan to reach our goals?

At The Fetch Co, we have a team of hustlers, we have a team of people that defy the status quo, that believe in the mission, that see a vision that will create something bigger than ourselves. We are all about loving dogs and creating a sustainable brand. We are not a conventional company in which just the high level positions get a saying, we all get a saying, we all pitch in ideas and create a bigger one, everybody has a voice.

We have the vision to become a worldwide brand, we know we can reach all corners of the world and make the biggest impact possible

 

SIZE CHARTS

Hoodie Sizes:

 

T-Shirt Sizes:

 

Jogger Sizes:

 

 

How to support the Fetch Co. for free.

  • Follow us on Instagram & Facebook.

  • Share, like, repost, or tag (@thefetchco.official)

  • Spread the Word / Shout us out

  • Refrain from Negativity.

  •  Use our Hashtag! - #GoFetchCo
story_txt:
The Story Behind The BrandHi, my name is Gabriel Anzueto, and I am the Founder of The Fetch Co. - a sustainable clothing brand. Our story began in 2016 when I was struggling with depression while studying at Lynn University.At first, I turned to anxiety pills, but ultimately they did not work out. I felt I could not get out of that hole and got deeper into it. As a man, I felt like there was some pressure not to speak out about what I was going through. It is seen as a taboo to speak out about one's mental health. Men are often told not to cry or show weakness because it "takes away from our masculinity" but that is simply not the case. I knew I had to be honest about my mental health, and started to explore other options to treat my anxiety. It was then that I found my Chief Dog Officer Remi, the Weimaraner. A 90 lbs. bundle of love, loyalty, happiness, and respect. He came into my life at my lowest and helped me rebuild my life from nothing. Since then, aside from being my emotional support dog, he's been my best friend and companion.Ultimately, Remi is the one that truly saved my life through his loyalty and support. It is then that I realized the importance of having a companion such as Remi. This experience pushed me to search for ways in which I could give back. My daily question was, If Remi saved my life, then why can't I come up with a business that saves other dogs' lives?Love, Loyalty, Respect, and Empathy are the pillars on which I founded The Fetch Co. Our Mission and VisionOur Mission is to give back by donating 20% of all our profits to organizations supporting stray and malnourished dogs.The "Connect with a Pooch" program is a program that we plan to create in 2023 with the dogs that we will have supported by then and connect them with individuals that struggle with mental health and are in need of a companion.Our Vision at Fetch is to become a worldwide known brand that can help different organizations around the world as well as to create the Fetch Foundation, a foundation dedicated to protecting dogs from abuse and to help people with mental health issues find a best friend that will love them unconditionally.   Why is the campaign so important?Being a person that suffered from depression and got saved by a dog made me realize that through the creation of different fetch collections we could do good. It is so important for us to give back that we will pledge to always give back 20% of our profits. Our Casual Apparel is perfect for those long walks with your best friend, snuggly Netflix nights with your pooch, and of course the long mornings in bed. Dogs have become such an important part of our lives so its our duty to give them more love than they give us.COVID-19 has affected us all, imagine the detrimental effect it has had on stray dogs that lived through the feeding of tourists. What You, the crowdfunding Founders will Help us achieve?

It will also help us to reduce the costs of shipping and printing.

It will help us be the voice of dogs that are of course voiceless and cannot defend themselves from the hate and negligence of many.
It will help us educate the young about how dogs and animals should be treated and respected.
It will help us get closer to creating the CONNECT WITH A POOCH program.
It will help us bring back jobs to manufacturers that took a hit during Covid.
 What We Need & What You GetWe are looking for $25,000 in funding, it will be divided like this:We are asking for $25,000 because we have to also cover the indiegogo 5% fee, the wire transfer fees as well as other fees. The funding budget we have made is for $15,000 after all Fees have been paid for.If the goal is surpassed we will be transparent and show you were the money is going towards as well.Our marketing budget will help us market Fetch for the next 3 months. The funding will help us give bonuses to the people that have helped us so far, it is very important for our people to know we appreciate their effort and want to keep giving back to them.   Get Excited About Our Perks!

 
 
The perks that we are offering are called the Founder perks! Limited edition apparel that only the founders of our crowdfunding will get.Want to talk to the Founder, we will make it happen! Thats another perk for our founders.You will appear in our website as a Founder, as a person that believed in Us to cause a good impact in the world and in dogs.THE FETCH IMPACT!The impact that this crowdfunding  campaign will create not just at The Fetch Co but worldwide will be massive.  You are getting us closer to helping us reach our goal of saving 100,000 stray dogs by year 2023, you are helping us reach our goal of connecting this dogs with people suffering from mental health. story:
We are exciting to announce the second edition of KIBARDIN Just Watch. One year ago we produced 1,000 pcs. and successfully sold them to our 1,000 international fans. Join to our team and become the owner of the unique design timepiece from the second edition.

THERE IS A 'JUST WATCH' FOR EVERYONE.

Consider one of these inspiring watches if you want to make reading the time easier and quicker. Each watch has a significant and solid feel, and the chambered body is made from precision-machined stainless steel, topped off with a sapphire crystal lens. A JUST watch, in any of five versions, perfectly fuses the metal case, the metal dial, and the leather or sturdy NATO nylon strap to give a certain masculinity to the wearer.

From a wrist presence perspective, the watch has unique and minimalistic styling. It has the size and weight to grab the attention of those around it without being intrusive. The casing is flat and angled to your face. In fact, it is much thicker at the 12 o’clock side of the watch. This has the effect of positioning the watch face at such an angle that allows the wearer to look at the time without needing to turn the wrist.

The watch is fitted with a solid screw-in case back which is engraved with specifications. Behind the case back lies the Miyota GL30 Japanese Quartz Movement made by the Miyota division of Citizen LTD.

The watch is water resistant to 3ATM (to 30m/100ft) and comes with a full two-year warranty.

Highlights

The new KIBARDIN 'JUST' watch collection is based on numerous values, a passion for achievement, and the quest for technical and aesthetic excellence. We hope to give rise to a collection of exceptional watches that will have success among connoisseurs and devotees of future-oriented watches. The KIBARDIN timepieces line is shifting up a level with new watches endowed with high quality technology and designs.

Dedicated to the world of the brave, the independent, and the strong, the JUST watch’s powerful and refined aesthetic pays homage to the various reliability and design hallmarks of vehicle dashboards and lifesaving apparatus.

A JUST watch, a universal watch.

We made the watch in a truncated cylinder shape case with the crown placed at the top, above the 12 o’clock position. Traditionally, the crown is positioned on the right side of the case, at the 3 o‘clock or 4 o’clock position. Some watches even place the crown on the left side at the 9 o‘clock position. The crown position KIBARDIN has chosen is very exceptional.

Your watch is with you whenever you need time functions - you are face to face with it every time you slide behind the wheel. Its shape is integral to its function. A watch should be easy and pleasing to look at, as well as look cool in your car.

Due to the crown’s novel position, the watch can be worn on the left or right wrist, and you can read the time without needing to turn your wrist while your hands are on the steering wheel, on the desk during a business meeting or rendezvous, or working hard with tools.

Decide which wrist you would prefer to wear your watch on. Choose the wrist that is most comfortable and where your watch won't hamper your movements. This is typically your non-dominant hand, but the choice is up to the wearer.

The watch dial speaks to your personality.

When choosing a watch, it is important to consider the type of dial, its aesthetic and functionality. The dial is the first thing people notice, and is the focal point for the watch’s style. The five JUST watch faces contain the hour and minute markers and were created in five classic Arabic numeral and stick combinations. The natural affinities between the five dials are based on the main visual representations of the JUST watch style. The range of five minimalistic Black and White printed faces means everybody can choose a watch that will cultivate their own style and prestige.

Each dial design is created in limited edition with no more than 200 pieces.

Just Watch W-D3

 

Just Watch W-D1

 

Just Watch W-D2

 

Just Watch W-D4

 
 

Just Watch W-D5

 

Technical details.

  • Model:                                                 Three-hand Single Time Watch
  • Design:                                                Vadim Kibardin 2014
  • Year of Release:                               2016
  • Movement:                                        Miyota GL30 Japanese Movement
  • Battery:                                              SR621SW (estimated 3-year lifespan)
  • Accuracy:                                           -10/+20 seconds per month
  • Water-resistance:                            3ATM (to 30m/100ft)
  • Case and Crown:                             IP Black Coated 316 Stainless Steel
  • Crystal:                                               Flat Sapphire Crystal
  • Color:                                                   Black Face, Silver Hands
  • Dimensions:                                      Ø42mm x H 15mm (1.65” x 0.59”)
  • Weight:                                               90g
  • Band:                                                   Black Leather ZULU (5-Ring) 22mm strap
  • Package Size:                                   L110mm x W105mm x H90mm
  • Weight (incl. package):                 191g
  • Manufacturing:                                Czech Republic /Hong Kong
  • Warranty:                                           2 Years

Unique Lugs construction means the right fit.

A man should never wear his wristwatch loose. A separate solid screw-in frame is fitted to the back of the watch case, and fulfils the role of the standard watch lugs with a 22mm width. The strap is attached reliably to the frame for a perfectly snug fit.

Black Leather ZULU strap.

This high quality, attractive watch strap is made from genuine 2 mm thick leather with a smooth 'oiled' finish, and the rust-resistant black PVD coated 316L high quality stainless steel buckle and loop keeper ensure a tight fit. The ZULU strap design provides extra stability for your watch.

  • Width between watch lugs:           22mm
  • Regular length:                                  250mm excluding buckle
  • Thickness:                                           2mm
  • Color:                                                    Black
  • Buckle:                                                 Black PVD coated stainless steel buckle and four rings

Delivery Date.

The guaranteed shipping date for the Just Watch is 27 October 2017.

Taxes.

Overseas orders may be subject to additional import duties and taxes, which are levied once a shipment reaches its destination country. We have no control over additional customs charges and as such, these charges are to be borne and paid by the purchaser.

How will my order be shipped? How much is shipping?

We offer FREE Standard Worldwide Delivery on Just Watch - please allow 7-14 working days.

Which countries do you ship to? International Backers.

We're proud to have KIBARDIN fans in over 100 countries. We will ship Kibardin Just Watch worldwide, with the exception of Iran, Iraq, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees, and taxes applicable to your region.

Quality Certified.

KIBARDIN Just Watch will pass performance and quality assurance tests in order to meet the necessary local, national, and international quality standards relevant to a particular market or product set.

Risks and Challenges.

No risks, if we not deliver the Just Watch in time, you get it for free.

Warranty and Return Policy.

Kibardin Just Watch are guaranteed against defects in materials and workmanship for a full 24 months from the date of purchase (proof of purchase is necessary). If a product ever fails due to a manufacturing defect, even after extended use, we will at our discretion either repair the product without charge or replace it. Your satisfaction is our goal. If you would like to return the clock or exchange it for a different item, please contact us by email at info@kibardindesign.com within 48 hours of receiving your order. We will email you a replace/return document and request that you kindly complete and enclose this in the package, and pack the item in the original packing and manner with which it was received. You may return or exchange it within 7 days of delivery.

Need help? We're here for you.

If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at info@kibardindesign.com

P +420 774 100 500
Monday to Friday
Hours: 10 a.m.-5 p.m. Czech local time

story:
The Scent of Rhubarb & Custard, and just in case you prefer them separately, just the rhubarb or just the custard.

A couple of weeks back, a group of intrepid Glossers visited the 4160Tuesdays studio in Acton to agree on something very important - the exact proportions for the perfect rhubarb and custard fragrance. (There they are in the photo.)

Some wanted the creamy vanilla custard by itself, and some wanted the citrus rhubarb cologne, and so that happened too. In the end, we settled on the unexpected ratio of one part rhubarb to 29 parts custard. That was just right on everyone's skin.

On our way, we also found the perfect room fragrance: one part rhubarb to five parts custard, so we made that too.

For handmade small batch fragrances we've made them totally affordable. We're not bargain high street, but nor are we super spendy department store, although we do use some lovely posh materials which wouldn't be out of place in a shiny marble palace with crystal knobs on. The vanilla absolute we use is now $20,000 a kilo, but fortunately a little goes a long way.

Anyway, we've put up different perks in different sizes, but if there's a combination you really really NEED let us know and we shall make it so.

Shipping in the UK is included; if you need shipping to somewhere not listed, just ask and we'll quote you, We like to be inclusive. Talking of which, the citrus rhubarb cologne is as non binary as you can get; the vanilla custard is softer and sweeter but that's no reason for gents not to wear it. You order whatever you like.
story_txt: The Scent of Rhubarb & Custard, and just in case you prefer them separately, just the rhubarb or just the custard.A couple of weeks back, a group of intrepid Glossers visited the 4160Tuesdays studio in Acton to agree on something very important - the exact proportions for the perfect rhubarb and custard fragrance. (There they are in the photo.)Some wanted the creamy vanilla custard by itself, and some wanted the citrus rhubarb cologne, and so that happened too. In the end, we settled on the unexpected ratio of one part rhubarb to 29 parts custard. That was just right on everyone's skin.On our way, we also found the perfect room fragrance: one part rhubarb to five parts custard, so we made that too.For handmade small batch fragrances we've made them totally affordable. We're not bargain high street, but nor are we super spendy department store, although we do use some lovely posh materials which wouldn't be out of place in a shiny marble palace with crystal knobs on. The vanilla absolute we use is now $20,000 a kilo, but fortunately a little goes a long way.Anyway, we've put up different perks in different sizes, but if there's a combination you really really NEED let us know and we shall make it so.Shipping in the UK is included; if you need shipping to somewhere not listed, just ask and we'll quote you, We like to be inclusive. Talking of which, the citrus rhubarb cologne is as non binary as you can get; the vanilla custard is softer and sweeter but that's no reason for gents not to wear it. You order whatever you like.

story:
INTRODUCING OUTWARMER

The Outwarmer is the essence of culture that has been handed down through the ages. We have been advocating the idea of integrating culture into fashion, creating unique fashion by combining historical elements with contemporary popularity. Just like the Beijing Opera, the representative of Chinese traditional drama, this coat marries the ancient artistic with the ancient fashion history of our World. 

We are pleased to present the warm and comfortable Outwarmer. A unique creative idea that makes you stand-out in the cold, winter crowd!

Our specialized cloth, created for its warmth, for outdoor life has already been recognized by numerous A+ fashion sources like BuzzFeed and WWD. That is because we added the concept of fashion to the concept of high-technology.

Whether you are walking outside, on the way to work or participating in activities, you will be able to stay warm and comfortable and, be the center of attention with your fashion-forward Outwarmer! 

Good feedbacks from the first generation Heacket.

 

SUPERIOR FEATURES

 

Heating technology

While advancing the concept of "heating", we have created a coat that allows you to live comfortably even in the freezing winter weather while NEVER losing your sense of style. The Outwarmer offers two temperature zones; “hot” and “warm”. You can adjust the temperature to suit your comfort and to meet the temperature needs. 

Based on our clientele’s requests, we have made great improvements in the delivery of power source created specifically for this amazing coat. In order not to delay the receipt of your Outwarmer, you can use a power source you already have. Our internal USB interface supports all universal rechargeable power bank, standard 5V 2A.

 

Versatile designs

The design has you in mind! There are a total of seven pockets you can use for cell phones, wallets, headphones, keys and other personal items. Everything you want to take on the go has a place, keeping your items close at hand for easy access. The built-in “sleeve gloves” will keep your hands warm and cozy even if you left your mittens behind. 

 

Waterproof

 

 Machine washable

Outwarmer can be washed in a “cool water” setting right in your own home!

 

THERMAL MATERIAL

 

Outer cotton

In order to have both fashion and warmth, we chose the highest quality of DuPont cotton. This renewable-sourced fiber is a high lofting fiber which is shaped like a spring with a 3D spiral structure. This waterproof fabric not only allows you to be protected in the rain and snow but it offers unparalleled warmth retention. The Outwarmer silhouettes your body and offers a wonderful sense of fashion. This fabric and design insures warmth while not surrendering a soft and comfortable experience.

Inner lining

The inner lining is constructed of a silver dot matrix fabric. This matrix pattern allows for unmatched heat energy reflection while remaining breathable. This technology keeps you warm while wicking away moisture, releasing excess heat and leaving your body in total comfort.

Comparison

Test shows that DPM-1A made of DuPont cotton shows better thermal resistance performance compared to G200 which is made of branded polyester. DPM-1A made of DuPont cotton has better pill power performance, better compression ratio, and similar recovery ratio compared to G200.

 

PRODUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT

The factory is busy in production 

OUTWARMER is being produced

 

SIZE CHART

 

OUTWARMER HEATING INSTRUCTION

 

TIMELINE

story:
Short Summary

I am Adam Baek and since I was young, I have always had a passion for technology. As technology advances, products come and go. We hope to create this LED Smart Watch that not only looks sleek and amazing, but also has more functionality than other competitor smart watches. All at the most affordable price!

What We Need & What You Get

We need funding for manufacturing the product, we already have successful prototypes and just need the money to complete our business dream, production.

What you get for donating over $85 is your own LED Smart watch, with a built in microphone and speakers, which is Android and iOS compatible. You can answer calls, see texts, and much more!

The Impact

We need all the help we can get, without a sufficient amount of money we can not create a production rate that is affordable. Every dollar helps! Our goal is to help everyone have a stylish smart watch at an affordable cost!

story:
Following on from my successful campaigns for the Shuttl Dockable Wallet & the Oak Bark Leather Belt, I'd love to craft you a beautiful belt with a unique, eye-catching buckle design modelled on my 19th century Fire Brigade vintage original. The prototypes for these have proved to be real talking-points.

As usual, there will be no short-cuts taken - your belt will be hand-made from the finest English oak-bark tanned bridle leather with solid brass buckles & fittings.

 

Introducing The Firefighter Belt

I make high-quality leather goods so when I came across this old leather belt with an unusual buckle at a flea market a few years ago I couldn’t resist buying it. I was intrigued as to its original purpose & set about doing some research. 

Fortunately the buckle had a maker’s stamp reading ‘Morris Salford’. My research showed that John Morris & Sons of Salford, Manchester, England were a leading manufacturer of all types of firefighting equipment from the late 1800s & into the 20th century.   

The company were highly conscious of the fact that speed is of the essence & that every second lost in the early stages of fighting a fire is crucial. With that in mind, they came up with these innovative buckles that could be used to hold fire hoses firmly in place but which could be released in a fraction of a second, saving valuable time. 

It’s believed that firefighters would sometimes fit these cool-looking buckles to the belts they used to hold up their trousers. 

I've decided to bring this look back to life by having the buckles faithfully recreated. I’ve now managed to locate a traditional foundry here in England that can make these unique buckles for you by sand-casting them in solid brass. I’ll then turn them into belts using the same fantastic oak-bark tanned English bridle leather that I use for all my belts.

Incidentally, although the buckle has a quick-release feature, it can also be fastened & unfastened in the usual way just like a normal buckle. That's how I use it - although if you ever do need to undo your belt in a hurry, the option's there! It's also a great talking-point with an interesting back-story. 

Want to know more?  

Backers of my previous projects already know that the leather goods I produce are designed & made to last. The leather & hardware used are always of the highest possible quality. Team that up with my handmade, old-school construction methods & you’ve got a recipe for a product that will go on forever.  

So...what does it take to make the best looking, longest lasting belts?

• Great leather, tanned using oak bark in a very long, slow process  
• Solid, foundry-cast brass fittings  
• Thoughtful design   
• Skilled craftsmanship

1. Great leather

I use the finest of full-grain English bridle leathers. Tanned in Britain’s last remaining traditional tannery using oak bark & river water in a long, slow process that results in light, strong, beautiful leather. This really is the best belting leather I’ve ever seen. If it was a car it would be an Aston Martin. Backers of my previous belt project already know first-hand how great this leather is but, for those who'd like to know more, I've added a video & more details lower down the page.

2. Rugged hardware

Buckles & fittings used are solid brass, sand-cast & hand-finished in a traditional foundry here in the UK. Super-strong & great-looking, simple and honest. None of those cheap, brittle zinc alloy buckles used in most belts available in stores, whose plating peels off and starts to look scruffy in no time.  

3. Solid construction

I attach the buckles with tough, solid brass Chicago screws. From the front they look just like rivets but besides being stronger than most rivets, they’re removable, allowing for easy future changes of buckles if required, whilst avoiding the possibility of stitch holes weakening the leather or stitches wearing out or rotting away.  

4. Thoughtful design

Every part of these belts has been carefully considered. From the use of chicago screws to attach the buckles & the placement of those screws, to the carefully finished edges and even the oval shape of the holes that allow the prong of the buckle to lay flatter for a more comfortable fit.

5. Skilled craftsmanship

Every stage of the making process is carried out by hand right here in my own workshop. Most belts, even the most expensive, have the edges either left raw & ragged or coated with a thick layer of rubbery goo that eventually starts to crack & peel off. It makes no sense to me when a product’s quality is compromised in the interests of saving money. I believe that great materials deserve great craftsmanship so the edges of my belts are bevelled, dyed to match and finally burnished to perfection. It’s a labour-intensive process but I wouldn’t do it any other way. No rough or raw edges here!  

Three colours of leather are available - London Tan, Dark Oak and Black. These cover pretty much any shoe colour you may wish to co-ordinate with. All look great with jeans but the darker shades also work well with more formal wear. Just to be clear and to avoid any confusion, you can choose any colour, in any length and with any of the 2 buckle finishes - natural brass or nickel-plated brass.

All belts are 1.5 inches (38mm) wide. The belts come in two-inch increments. 26" 28" 30" 32" 34" 36" 38" 40" 42" 44" 46" 48" These sizes are measured from the end of the buckle to the centre hole of the five adjustment holes on the belt. This will give you two inches either way, allowing you to go up or down by 2" in waist size and still fit the belt.

PLEASE NOTE This measurement almost certainly won't be the same as your waist size or the size you buy your jeans in! This is because most people wear their trousers more on their hips than their waist and also because, if you measured yourself over the top of a pair of trousers, you'd find that the measurement was likely a couple of inches more than expected because of the added bulk of the fabric. So...in order to ensure a perfect fit first time, the absolute best way to find out what size belt you need is to measure a belt you already own and which fits you well. Go from the outer end of the buckle to the hole that you normally use. This is the measurement that we need to know. We'll make your new belt this same length, to the centre hole. If you don't own a belt that fits you, don't worry - you'll receive comprehensive measuring instructions with the backer's survey after the campaign closes.  

What is oak bark leather? 
Tucked away in the south west of England there’s a small leather tannery beside a river. There’s been a tannery there since Roman legionnaires were marching past, en-route to the local garrison and it’s been in the ownership of the current family for more than 150 years.  

Whereas over 95% of leather produced these days is tanned with chromium because it’s fast and cheap (it’s done in one day), this tannery continues to produce leather in the same way it did some two thousand years ago.  

Using nothing more than river water and sustainably-produced shredded bark from English oak trees, the tanning process takes a full 18 months from locally sourced hides arriving to finished leather leaving.  

This leather is truly wonderful. The slow, gentle, natural tanning process preserves the strength of the fibres and produces leather that’s light, super- strong, great-smelling and has a beautiful full surface grain. It’s used in bespoke shoes, saddles and luggage by artisans and makers around the world who, like me, having once discovered it, won’t use anything else. It’s the highest quality belting leather I’ve ever seen but it’s worth every penny. Incidentally, because this is full-grain leather it will sometimes carry marks picked up during the cow’s lifetime. From thorn-bush scratches to mosquito bites or stretch marks, these things aren’t imperfections to be sanded away, weakening the leather as is often done. I prefer to see them as badges of honour that showcase each product's natural individuality and handcrafted nature. They aren’t flaws or faults, they simply tell a little of the story of the life the animal has led.

No matter how good the leather is, for belt use it also needs to be thick enough. Thinner belts will deform & stretch but the oak bark leather I use is between 4mm and 5mm thick (between 10 and 12oz). What does this mean in practice though? Well, the average proper leather belt you’ll find on sale is usually around 2mm and will last up to 5 years if you’re lucky. A better one will be approaching 3mm thick & might give you a decade or two of service whilst costing you as much (or more) as my Oak Bark Belt. You’ve most likely never seen a leather belt of this thickness. If you want to hang a holster from it, go ahead – it’ll handle it just fine.

Time to get down to business! 
I want to make sure it's worth your while ordering here & benefiting from the economies of scale & cost savings from bulk ordering of materials that a Kickstarter campaign can provide. For that reason, I'm going to offer substantial reductions on the pricing that'll be on my website afterwards.

You can order multiples of belts in any combination of colours and sizes so if you're buying more for gifts or you're ordering together with some workmates, you'll make even bigger savings. 

Free shipping is included to anywhere in the world. As I'm in Britain, Kickstarter makes me display prices in GB Pounds but I'll do my best to convert to USD at current rates. 

1 Belt: £75 (approx $98 or 84 Euros) (£110 later, saving of £35) 
2 Belts: £145 (approx $189 or 162 Euros) (£220 later, saving of £75) 
3 Belts: £209 (approx $273 or 234 Euros) (£330 later, saving of £121) 
4 Belts: £269 (approx $352 or 301 Euros) (£440 later, saving of £171) 
5 Belts: £329 (approx $431 or 368 Euros) (£550 later, saving of £221)

Weeks 1-2 Indiegogo campaign runs 
Week 3: Reserve leather & hardware 
Week 4: Collect leather & hardware from tannery & foundry 
Weeks 5-10: Production & shipping of rewards 

Some feedback from backers of my two previous campaigns...

Just received mine today! omg.. SO GOOD! SMELLS REALLY GOOD!! thanks Peter for your awesome work!  

Its arrived and the finish is just perfect...beautifully made 

I just got mine it´s just perfect. Thanks Peter very nice job.  

Hi Peter, got my belts and they are perfect, thank you. Let me thank you one more time for these wonderful pieces of British craftsmanship, and I hope this is part of the beginning people will reconsider what kind of products should be supported by buying them and which kind of products shouldn’t!  

The belts have arrived, and are wonderful as promised. The look and feel are perfect, and it does even smell amazing. Very well done, and very happy as a backer.  

Got it! Simply superb! The best belt that I own.  

I could say all kind of nice things but when I opened the delivery this morning my wife asked do they make narrower belts in red leather for women? The ultimate seal of approval.  

Received my belt last week and I would say it has the best leather and workmanship in my collection thus far. Thank you Peter.  

Love it, love it, love it. I am so happy with my belt and hoping I can afford to buy them as Christmas presents.  

A big THANK YOU for those amazing belts! I love them, my wife loves them, as well as anybody I'm showing them to loves them! You did a really nice job there! Hope to see more projects from you and I'll more than certainly be a backer again! Cheers!

Amazing Wallet, this will last me a lifetime! 

Mine arrived today in tan and it looks, feels and smells fantastic. 

Just got mine today and i can certainly agree that the quality is top notch, this is one healthy piece of leather! 

I have received my wallet today, and I must say the finishing and the quality of leather is a lot higher than I expected. This is truly a well crafted wallet and every care has been put into it's construction. I can feel this has been built to stand the test of time and years of usage.Thanks for the beautiful wallet Peter. 

I got mine today. Thank you very much. It is lovely to own a wallet of true craftsmanship and beauty. I keep taking it out to small the leather. Well done Peter and thanks again. 

Just received my wallet, and wanted to say thank you for a beautiful piece and great craftsmanship. It truly is beautiful. Makes me regret not buying a few more in different colors 

Just received mine. So far I'm loving every single bit of it, even the smell. Incredible job Peter. 

Mine came earlier in the mail today- am absolutely pleased with it. Great quality, pleasant packing and a fantastic smell of leather. Thank you so much for your hard work Peter! 

Just got my wallet today. Really, really, really happy with it. It's excellent work. Thanks so much. 

A couple of extra videos showing more about the wonderful leather, the traditional tannery and the work that goes into making The Firefighter Belt.

  
 

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

Time to get down to business! I want to make sure it's worth your while ordering here & benefiting from the economies of scale & cost savings from bulk ordering of materials that a Kickstarter campaign can provide. For that reason, I'm going to offer substantial reductions on the pricing that'll be on my website afterwards.
You can order multiples of belts in any combination of colours and sizes so if you're buying more for gifts or you're ordering together with some workmates, you'll make even bigger savings. 
Free shipping is included to anywhere in the world. As I'm in Britain, Kickstarter makes me display prices in GB Pounds but I'll do my best to convert to USD at current rates. 
1 Belt: £75 (approx $98 or 84 Euros) (£110 later, saving of £35) 2 Belts: £145 (approx $189 or 162 Euros) (£220 later, saving of £75) 3 Belts: £209 (approx $273 or 234 Euros) (£330 later, saving of £121) 4 Belts: £269 (approx $352 or 301 Euros) (£440 later, saving of £171) 5 Belts: £329 (approx $431 or 368 Euros) (£550 later, saving of £221)



Weeks 1-2 Indiegogo campaign runs Week 3: Reserve leather & hardware Week 4: Collect leather & hardware from tannery & foundry Weeks 5-10: Production & shipping of rewards 


Some feedback from backers of my two previous campaigns...
Just received mine today! omg.. SO GOOD! SMELLS REALLY GOOD!! thanks Peter for your awesome work!  
Its arrived and the finish is just perfect...beautifully made 
I just got mine it´s just perfect. Thanks Peter very nice job.  
Hi Peter, got my belts and they are perfect, thank you. Let me thank you one more time for these wonderful pieces of British craftsmanship, and I hope this is part of the beginning people will reconsider what kind of products should be supported by buying them and which kind of products shouldn’t!  
The belts have arrived, and are wonderful as promised. The look and feel are perfect, and it does even smell amazing. Very well done, and very happy as a backer.  
Got it! Simply superb! The best belt that I own.  
I could say all kind of nice things but when I opened the delivery this morning my wife asked do they make narrower belts in red leather for women? The ultimate seal of approval.  
Received my belt last week and I would say it has the best leather and workmanship in my collection thus far. Thank you Peter.  
Love it, love it, love it. I am so happy with my belt and hoping I can afford to buy them as Christmas presents.  
A big THANK YOU for those amazing belts! I love them, my wife loves them, as well as anybody I'm showing them to loves them! You did a really nice job there! Hope to see more projects from you and I'll more than certainly be a backer again! Cheers!
Amazing Wallet, this will last me a lifetime! 
Mine arrived today in tan and it looks, feels and smells fantastic. 
Just got mine today and i can certainly agree that the quality is top notch, this is one healthy piece of leather! 
I have received my wallet today, and I must say the finishing and the quality of leather is a lot higher than I expected. This is truly a well crafted wallet and every care has been put into it's construction. I can feel this has been built to stand the test of time and years of usage.Thanks for the beautiful wallet Peter. 
I got mine today. Thank you very much. It is lovely to own a wallet of true craftsmanship and beauty. I keep taking it out to small the leather. Well done Peter and thanks again. 
Just received my wallet, and wanted to say thank you for a beautiful piece and great craftsmanship. It truly is beautiful. Makes me regret not buying a few more in different colors 
Just received mine. So far I'm loving every single bit of it, even the smell. Incredible job Peter. 
Mine came earlier in the mail today- am absolutely pleased with it. Great quality, pleasant packing and a fantastic smell of leather. Thank you so much for your hard work Peter! 
Just got my wallet today. Really, really, really happy with it. It's excellent work. Thanks so much. 
A couple of extra videos showing more about the wonderful leather, the traditional tannery and the work that goes into making The Firefighter Belt.
  
 
Break it down for folks in more detail:

Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

story:
Living in the present is all it matters in SILICA. More than hours, minutes, seconds; everyone should be reminded to live in every moment. That is the ‘Different Time’ experience; recreated in a watch that will remind us to live now, without overthinking the past nor the future.

The design highlights the seconds' hand on the face of the watch; allowing us to feel speed prior to knowing the time. What seems paradoxical is actually an attempt to recall you to live in the present as if it were a different time. More than a fashionable and useful accessory; SILICA establishes an emotional relationship with the user.

Down in history rests the sun, the sand, and the water as major time tracking tools. SILICA refers to these core elements and the environment where they coexist. The sand’s mineral – silica – as brand identity, and its blend with water and sun, symbolized in the Portuguese beaches that name the different models in this collection.

Founders Collection

The Founders Collection includes 6 watch models named after some of the most outstanding Portuguese beaches. This collection favors comfort and simplicity coupled with a classic but versatile design, both for women (36mm) and men (42mm).

Mood board 

Perks

Go-to-market

SILICA’s journey started in late-2018 as a result of an ideation session between friends that believed in starting their own walk for financial independence.

In 2019, SILICA went through a period of concept and product development; resulting in what is being presented today.

During this time, manufacturing was secured from a highly ranked manufacturer with comprehensive experience developing projects in this scope.

Multiple suppliers were tested to be sure SILICA watches were being manufactured with the best components by an experienced and credible team. A variety of prototypes and samples have been tested; having little uncertainty today about the look and feel that is going to be shipped to you.

Early in 2020, most of the funding was secured from private equity holders and the crowdfunding campaign has been launched today after being delayed 2-months due to the covid-19 outbreak.

As soon as SILICA’s crowdfunding campaign is finished, a production order will be placed to include all the units for the campaign backers as well as enough units for year 1 sales.

Having a time-to-market of about 4 months, SILICA is expected to start selling in October-2020. On this date, backers will also receive their watches and perks at the given address.

SILICA is a 100% digital company, looking to make all its sales through digital channels.

The team behind SILICA is already working on the development of the different distribution channels and they will keep you up to date on their progress through its social media and newsletter.

A series of news and pre-launch campaigns are also being projected, so be sure you are part of it.

Funding needs

SILICA has secured most of the funding requirements to be launched and to be live during its year 1 sales.

The additional funds will allow the team to improve its sales and marketing effectiveness, speeding up the sales funnel, the design of a new watch collection, and the design of a new product line.

Risk Management

At this point, the uncertainty around product launch is minimal. The final samples are 99% market-ready and there is no design or technological breakthrough that still needs to be worked out.

Every single unit is subject to a thorough quality check before leaving the assembly factory. Also, every watch has a 2-year warranty against defects in any internal part of the watch. It does not include: the life of the battery, wear and tear of aging, any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/ abusive use, lack of care, negligence, or accidents.

From a broader perspective, the world is still in the middle of a global pandemic with the covid-19 outbreak. Despite having more certainty today about how things can rollout, covid-19 can still delay SILICA’s time to market. For the moment, the selected suppliers have their operations running in full. The region has not been strongly hit by the virus and closures are not to be expected.  

The team will keep following developments closely and will keep you informed on the topic or any other threat that may emerge.

Product and commercial developments will also be shared with pictures and updates on Instagram, Facebook, and E-mail. If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to reach out.

Final remarks

Thank you for taking the time to read SILICA’s crowdfunding campaign. All your support, both monetary and non-monetary is sincerely appreciated.

We are a multi-disciplinary team of 4 with higher education in management, design, communication, and architecture. Having different experiences and perspectives did not stop us from sharing the same opinion on the essence of time.

We will keep exploring the 'Different Time' concept coupled with simple and versatile designs. Support us on bringing to market meaningful products meant to remind us about the benefits of appreciating every moment in life.

Do not forget to follow us on Instagram and Facebook. Join us developing this concept and start benefitting from a range of special offerings.

Not ready yet to invest in your next watch? No problem. Subscribe the Newsletter to receive exclusive news and perks during the upcoming months as we get to know each other better.

Looking forward to seeing you live a 'Different time'.

Website -  Instagram - Facebook

Announcement

SILICA will be sharing 5% of all the raised funds to a Portuguese entity that is working closely with the groups most impacted by the covid-19 pandemic. Entities will be identified right after the campaign is finished and all the investors will be asked to vote and decide who will receive these funds.

This is SILICA's token of appreciation to all the professionals that are working closely to narrow the impact in the most vulnerable groups of people, which now, more than ever, need all the help they can get. 

At SILICA, this is just the start towards a socially responsible company, a mission statement that will keep being developed and embedded in everything it does and stands for.

story:
Link is the first ever flip-shoe, an innovative shoe patent. Link promises a sense of freedom, simplicity, style, and lightness (both in look and weight) – a new species of shoe.

 

 

 

 



We chose colors that anyone could stand out with. Get excited!

 

 

Here are some behind the scenes clips:

 




 


The tiny things that make a whole

 

 

 

 


Still, what makes us different

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 


we’ll contact you to choose your size and color after the campaign ends

 

 

 

 


Walk with us so we can open the molds as much as possible

 

 

 


To maximize compensation, choose wisely and at the right time

 

 

If you order a larger quantity, you can reduce shipping costs.
You can choose the size and color at the end of the campaign.

 

 

 

All the testimonials below are from people who received the shoes for testing as part of the development process

 

 

 


The Link between us...

 

 

 

 


Our journey so far...

 

 

 


Hit one or more of the buttons below and share it on your network.
We can do this together
