story:
Help Verillas bring into production a brand new line of amazing, durable motoercycle leather boots. We have here a great opportunity for you to help us produce our new Moto spiral boots and get amazing rewards, such as gift certificates, boots,jewelry and art.

What is Verillas ? 

At Verillas, we strive to bring you the artisan quality, hand made clothing and boots. We travel the world looking for the best materals, the best craftsmen, and the best quality. We strive to give you clothing and boots that you can proudly wear 10, 20, even 30 years from now. We care about what you wear and we want you to not only look great but confidently know that the pair of boots you have on can and will last you for your epic travels and grand adventures.


The New Moto Spiral Boot

We at Verillas want to invite you to take part in our process by helping to fund the latest boot design we are planning to bring into production. Our Moto spiral boots have quality tread and a thick protective covering for your legs. These make great boots for the motorcyclist in your life, and are flexible enough for the parkour runner. We have to know that there are people who want this boot before we begin having it made. So by you supporting this campaign, you are ensuring that not only can you gain a pair of amazing boots but that others can also get a pair once they're available in our shop. In exchange for supporting us now, you get the boot first, and also a plethora of other rewards exclusive to this campaign.

What do you get? Your perks for helping us are. 

$25 Verillas Gift Card -$25 gift card for Verillas.com you can use on any item at checkout. Gift card good toward anything on Verillas.com



   $50 Fairy Fossil Necklace - One Fairy Fossil necklace from Verillas. This Artisan pewter necklace that comes as pictured above.
$100 for a $120 Verillas Gift Card - Get a bonus $20 dollars on your $100 gift card with this reward. Gift card good toward anything on Verillas.com

$150 for a $180 Verillas Gift Card -Get a bonus $40 dollars on your $150 Verillas gift card with this reward.Gift card good toward anything on Verillas.com


$200 Spiral Boots - One pair of Ayya Spiral Tabi low cut hand made leather boots in limited edition North Star Edition.The ultimate in heirloom quality, these are made of genuine cow leather, thick stock, with classic Ayya designs. Custom tread tabi soles,
Zipper closure for easy on and off.  

$400 Ayyawear Spiral Moto Boots - One pair of Verillas yet to be released Ayyawear Spiral Moto Boots,  custom sized just for you. When this boot is in our shop it will cost $449.00 USD.But you can save $50 right now and get custom size only via this perk. Available in four colorways Black, Brown stripe, Gray Stripe and Textured Onix. The ultimate in heirloom quality, these are made of genuine cow leather, thick stock, with classic Ayya designs. Custom tread tabi soles, Zipper closure for easy on and off.Textured Onix colorway is only available through this campaign.

$1000 Ayyawear Verillas Golden Ticket One custom color limited edition pair of Verillas yet to be released Ayyawear Spiral Moto Boots, custom sized just for you.One Ronin Hoodie (any color or size) One pair of any Ayya jeans.One Fairy Fossil necklace . 25% off your next purchase from Verillas.com  



Where is the money going? 

Producing high quality leather boots as we do is costly. The money from this campaign will go to fund the first run of the new Moto spiral boot. We have done this before with all the boots we have to offer right now on our site. But in order to have this new type put into production we have to know that you want it. If we make our target amount that will be enough to fund 200 pairs being produced. If we go over then we can have more made. 

Where to find us. 

www.Verillas.com

https://www.facebook.com/VerillasLifestyle

https://www.facebook.com/AyyaStyle

story:
Intro

Hi! Alisa here. I am a hobby artist from Tallinn, Estonia. Been doodling around for some time and I feel like I am ready to jump to the next level.

I want to transform my art to colorful enamel lapel pins. Something tangible and wearable, perfect size for my doodles and a nice way to send a message to the world. As a result of numerous brainstorms the idea of this pin collection was formed. Although these fellas were all born in different times, they for sure have one important thing in common - they were perfect spirit lifters just when most needed!

So here I am sharing my set of Emotional Support Pins with you, hoping that with your support these pins can brighten everyone’s day as well.

Expressing struggles that we all encounter in our daily life, these pins strive to be personally relevant to every owner. Pins’ design reflect my doodling style: cheerful and silly, but ultimately soft and caring.

With this campaign I want to fulfill my dream and make the very first batch of custom enamel pins. The initial plan is to get a minimum batch of 100 pins of one design. However, with your support even full set of four different Emotional Support Pins might go into production. The more choice for you and more pins for everyone! Please see the Stretch Goal descriptions below for the details.

If you can’t back my project, but still want to support the idea, please share and help me spread the word about Emotional Support Pins. Sharing is caring!

You can follow me on Instagram (@accordingtoalisa)

Enjoy!

 

Let's get down to business...

Due to the minimum order limit from manufacturer, it is a fixed goal campaign.
If the initial goal of $600 will be reached, your funding will allow me to order 100 pieces of soft enamel pins of proper quality from European manufacturer and ship those to you once ready.  However, do not let this threshold stop you from backing. I have a range of stretch goals planned for you. With every unlocked stretch goal the batch of relevant design (100 pieces) will be manufactured.

Technical specs for all designs:

  • size: 30 mm/ ~1.2 inch at the widest point
  • soft-enamel pin
  • black dye plating
  • black rubber clutch

Soft enamel will allow for vibrant colors and sharper lines with nice embossed look. I believe live freehand lines give these pins extra hearty handcrafted feeling.

Planned time frame:

June: Indiegogo campaign to raise the funds
July-August: manufacturing, delivery to me and quality check upon arrival.
August: shipping the perks to backers.

Pins and goals

***Mid-campaign update: now initial goal includes 2 pin designs instead of one! ***

The initial goal includes production of two pins "Unicorns and rainbows" pin and "Sky's the limit" pin. Every next stretch goal will add one more design to the selection. 

Initial goal ($600): Unicorns and rainbows

Mock-up and specifications:

The ultimate spirit lifter. If anyone tells you that life is not supposed to be all “unicorns and rainbows”, this pin will always remind you that it actually is.

Designed with affection towards all people out there striving to stay positive! You keep us all going, and this pin will help you do that.

 

Initial goal ($600): Sky’s the limit

Mock-up and specifications:

In desperate need of motivation to achieve something? Oh, come on, it is 21st century, even the sky is not the limit any more! This astronaut will lead your way to great beyond. Beyond your wildest dreams and challenges, that life might throw at you. He will help you to reach the highest goal you set for yourself.

Designed with utmost devotion to people that set the bar high and inspire people around them.

 

Stretch goal #1: Melomaniac (unlocks at $975)

Mock-up and specifications:

No matter the initial mood, right music always makes it better. The Melomaniac unconditionally shares your passion for the music, no matter the style. This guy will cue you in for some good vibes when they are just couple of tunes away.

Designed with and admiration for all the music lovers around the globe.

 

Ultimate stretch goal: Plushie (unlocks at $1275)

Mock-up and specifications:

This seems like a big ask, but if we reach this goal, all backers that have already selected a perk will receive Plushie pin as a gift.

I have a soft spot for this one and I would love to see this pin come to life. This fluff is a “spirit animal” that is here to carry all your emotional burden for you so you do not have to.

Designed with care for every single person who needs to share emotions with someone, who would always understand and support.

 

Risks & Challenges

  1. Please note, that images where pins are shown on outfits, are digital visualisation, not actual pins. We do not have any pins produced at the moment, but images are here to help you imagine planned real-life size. Actual color may slightly vary. 
  2. This is a fixed goal campaign, meaning, if we do not reach initial goal amount of $600, designs will not go into production and all backers will be refunded.
  3. Choosing perks, keep in mind that only "Unicorn" and "Sky's the limit" (aka Astronaut) designs are included into initial goal. Meaning, if you select 3-pin perk, but eventually only Unicorn and Astronaut designs will be funded, you will have to select from these two designs only. The more Stretch Goals will be reached, the more designs will be unlocked and available for selection. I’ll poll all backers in the end of campaign for selection.

If you still have any question about my stretch goals or anything else, feel free to ask in comments.

All in all, I try to reduce the risk as much as possible, still, as with every campaign, some unexpected issues might appear. I will keep my backers updated on every step of the project.

 

Still reading? Interested, but not sure if you can back this project?

Every bit of support and feedback matters. You can help me make some noise around and spread the word about this campaign. Indiegogo offers a wide range of share tools that will help you do this. 

I appreciate your input a lot!

 

If you want to keep me and my doodles company on in our artistic adventure, follow me on Instagram (@accordingtoalisa). 

And, if you have any questions, do not hesitate to ask!

I want to transform my art to colorful enamel lapel pins. Something tangible and wearable, perfect size for my doodles and a nice way to send a message to the world. As a result of numerous brainstorms the idea of this pin collection was formed. Although these fellas were all born in different times, they for sure have one important thing in common - they were perfect spirit lifters just when most needed!
So here I am sharing my set of Emotional Support Pins with you, hoping that with your support these pins can brighten everyone’s day as well.
Expressing struggles that we all encounter in our daily life, these pins strive to be personally relevant to every owner. Pins’ design reflect my doodling style: cheerful and silly, but ultimately soft and caring.

With this campaign I want to fulfill my dream and make the very first batch of custom enamel pins. The initial plan is to get a minimum batch of 100 pins of one design. However, with your support even full set of four different Emotional Support Pins might go into production. The more choice for you and more pins for everyone! Please see the Stretch Goal descriptions below for the details.
If you can’t back my project, but still want to support the idea, please share and help me spread the word about Emotional Support Pins. Sharing is caring!
You can follow me on Instagram (@accordingtoalisa)
Enjoy!
 
Let's get down to business...
Due to the minimum order limit from manufacturer, it is a fixed goal campaign.If the initial goal of $600 will be reached, your funding will allow me to order 100 pieces of soft enamel pins of proper quality from European manufacturer and ship those to you once ready.  However, do not let this threshold stop you from backing. I have a range of stretch goals planned for you. With every unlocked stretch goal the batch of relevant design (100 pieces) will be manufactured.
Technical specs for all designs:

size: 30 mm/ ~1.2 inch at the widest point
soft-enamel pin
black dye plating
black rubber clutch

Soft enamel will allow for vibrant colors and sharper lines with nice embossed look. I believe live freehand lines give these pins extra hearty handcrafted feeling.
Planned time frame:
June: Indiegogo campaign to raise the fundsJuly-August: manufacturing, delivery to me and quality check upon arrival.August: shipping the perks to backers.
Pins and goals
***Mid-campaign update: now initial goal includes 2 pin designs instead of one! ***
The initial goal includes production of two pins "Unicorns and rainbows" pin and "Sky's the limit" pin. Every next stretch goal will add one more design to the selection. 
Initial goal ($600): Unicorns and rainbows
Mock-up and specifications:

The ultimate spirit lifter. If anyone tells you that life is not supposed to be all “unicorns and rainbows”, this pin will always remind you that it actually is.
Designed with affection towards all people out there striving to stay positive! You keep us all going, and this pin will help you do that.
 
Initial goal ($600): Sky’s the limit
Mock-up and specifications:

In desperate need of motivation to achieve something? Oh, come on, it is 21st century, even the sky is not the limit any more! This astronaut will lead your way to great beyond. Beyond your wildest dreams and challenges, that life might throw at you. He will help you to reach the highest goal you set for yourself.
Designed with utmost devotion to people that set the bar high and inspire people around them.
 
Stretch goal #1: Melomaniac (unlocks at $975)
Mock-up and specifications:


No matter the initial mood, right music always makes it better. The Melomaniac unconditionally shares your passion for the music, no matter the style. This guy will cue you in for some good vibes when they are just couple of tunes away.
Designed with and admiration for all the music lovers around the globe.
 
Ultimate stretch goal: Plushie (unlocks at $1275)
Mock-up and specifications:

This seems like a big ask, but if we reach this goal, all backers that have already selected a perk will receive Plushie pin as a gift.
I have a soft spot for this one and I would love to see this pin come to life. This fluff is a “spirit animal” that is here to carry all your emotional burden for you so you do not have to.
Designed with care for every single person who needs to share emotions with someone, who would always understand and support.
 

Risks & Challenges

Please note, that images where pins are shown on outfits, are digital visualisation, not actual pins. We do not have any pins produced at the moment, but images are here to help you imagine planned real-life size. Actual color may slightly vary. 
This is a fixed goal campaign, meaning, if we do not reach initial goal amount of $600, designs will not go into production and all backers will be refunded.
Choosing perks, keep in mind that only "Unicorn" and "Sky's the limit" (aka Astronaut) designs are included into initial goal. Meaning, if you select 3-pin perk, but eventually only Unicorn and Astronaut designs will be funded, you will have to select from these two designs only. The more Stretch Goals will be reached, the more designs will be unlocked and available for selection. I’ll poll all backers in the end of campaign for selection.

If you still have any question about my stretch goals or anything else, feel free to ask in comments.
All in all, I try to reduce the risk as much as possible, still, as with every campaign, some unexpected issues might appear. I will keep my backers updated on every step of the project.

 
Still reading? Interested, but not sure if you can back this project?
Every bit of support and feedback matters. You can help me make some noise around and spread the word about this campaign. Indiegogo offers a wide range of share tools that will help you do this. 
I appreciate your input a lot!
 
If you want to keep me and my doodles company on in our artistic adventure, follow me on Instagram (@accordingtoalisa). 
And, if you have any questions, do not hesitate to ask!

story:
We are The Stretch Suit, a British fashion brand on a mission to develop the world's most comfortable clothes, to bridge the gap between work, travel and play.  Our team consists of frequent travellers, world class athletes and designers with a drive to revolutionise travel and work-wear.

After years of analysing traditional, uncomfortable men's shirts, we asked ourselves, "Why haven't shirts evolved with the lifestyle of the modern man?". 

So we created, The Super Stretch Shirt.

Old fashioned cotton shirts absorb moisture, leaving you feeling uncomfortable and hot under the collar, whereas The Super Stretch Shirt is designed for performance and comfort with its lightweight moisture wicking fibres used in footballer's and tennis players shirts. Keeping you cool and comfortable whatever your mission is.

We believe, for a man to thrive, he needs freedom to move, breathe and stretch.

Our design HQ is in London and our shirts and made in Europe.  Our clothing manufacturing company has over 35 years of experience, producing men and women's clothing for luxury retailers.

The performance fabric used in The Super Stretch Shirt is unlike traditional men's shirts.  

Designed for stretch, durability and breathability; this fabric is also moisture wicking, a key element in our design.

Offering comfort, breathability and super stretch fabric, designed to adapt to any lifestyle. It's sharp and formal, yet feels like a t-shirt.

The demanding, fast-paced lifestyle we live in requires men to be adaptable, flexible and enduring; just like The Super Stretch Shirt.

We believe a man's shirt should accommodate his lifestyle. Freedom to move and stretch allows a healthier and more active lifestyle. 

Look good, Feel Fresh even when its Untucked

Whether you're working, entertaining or travelling, we don't believe that looking smart should mean feeling constrained.This is why we have developed The Super Stretch Shirt, where freedom of movement and comfort are key, you can look professional and feel comfortable with the untucked look thanks to our stream lined design.

Style without restrictions, The Super Stretch Shirt is built for modern day men. 

We believe we have bridged the gap between work, play and comfort.

With durability and stretch being key features, they have been put to the test by parkour athletes, martial artists and business professionals.

We don’t believe in making compromises when it comes to looking sharp. We especially don’t believe in compromising on comfort.

Our Stretch Shirts are created with the latest textile technology, giving you freedom to move, allowing you to perform at your best.

Tried and tested by world class athletes, martial artists and Hollywood stunt men, The Super Stretch Shirt can withstand high intensity movement and long hours.  

The perfect shirt for travel, running for a train or enduring a long haul flight, The Super Stretch Shirt will allow you to move with ease.

Our moisture wicking fabric technology will keep you from feeling hot under the collar, leaving you fresh and cool all day.

The Super Stretch Shirt is ideal for business travel; lightweight, breathable, with easy iron fabric, allowing you to look your best in any climate.

It's now easy to maintain your classic style over seas, no matter where you travel.

The Super Stretch Shirt is extremely quick drying, giving you more time to explore and get on with your business, wherever you are in the world.

Stay Cool Look Fresh - Arrive at your business meeting sweat free, looking sharp and ready to impress every day.

The Super Stretch Shirt is light weight, wrinkle resistant and can be easily packed ready for the long haul.

Our super stretch shirts are easily machine and hand washable meaning no more dry clean visits and money saved, ideal when you've got better things to do.

We developed our durable, wrinkle resistant, Super Stretch Fabric in Europe.

Tried and tested among Hollywood stunt men, parkour athletes and martial arts champions, The Super Stretch Shirt can withstand high intensity movement, allowing you to feel comfortable all day.

The Super Stretch Shirt is currently available in both White, Black and Navy (Limited quantities made) - perfect for any occasion.

Our adjustable cuffs allows you to change the size of your cuff or simply roll up your sleeves for different looks.

The Super Stretch Shirt is available in sizes Small to XXXL, so whatever your size, we have you covered. 

 

You can purchase your Super Stretch Shirt today by selecting a reward on this Kickstarter campaign. Early Bird rewards are also available for our early backers.

 All of our UK sizes are in inches. 

We will ship your items worldwide, direct from our London, UK headquarters, using our trusted courier partners.

Get the latest news and updates from The Super Stretch Shirt by following us on social media! 

 

All orders will now be shipped within 72 hrs of order.

story:
How does it work?

Putting on the "Original" Mr. Shirt accessory is as simple as a wrap, snap and tug away from staying tucked in all day!!!

What is the "Original" Mr. Shirt accessory? 

Shirt stays have been the solution for those looking to maintain a professional look throughout the day. However, they are uncomfortable to wear and can sometimes provide a wake-up call as they shoot up your leg. The Mr. Shirt accessory is our flagship product and is a modified shirt stay that is not only effective in keeping your shirt tucked in but comfortable to wear as well. Let's take a closer look at the product below...  

Innovative velcro design allows the accessory to adjust and fit any leg size.

Clips allow for strong and easy connection to the shirt and the adjustable sliders aid in decreasing or increasing the tension.

 

How the accessory looks attached.

The difference an "Original" Mr. Shirt Accessory makes on the right!

What sets us apart?  

The high-quality elastic allows for a more reliable and comfortable experience. No measurements, no sizing just a quality product you can trust to keep that shirt of yours in place all day. Also, when its time to head to the bathroom, the velcro allows for easy on easy off access. We wouldn't let you wear it; if we wouldn't wear it ourselves.

Why be interested in Mr. Shirt? 

At Mr. Shirt, we believe in the fact that every individual should look their best whether in the office, at a social event or climbing Mount Kilimanjaro. Studies have been conducted and found a fascinating insight -- men who tuck their shirts in are happier, wealthier and generally more successful. Hence the slogan for Mr. Shirt Inc, "Look Good! Feel Good! Do Good!".  

Mr. Shirt Inc. is a Michigan-based veteran start-up located in Lansing, Michigan. As a veteran start-up, we pride ourselves on utilizing an American manufacturer and being able to stamp 100% American Made on our packaging. 

Risks and challenges

Here's how we at Mr. Shirt have mitigated those risks...

1) Teamed up with a top notch vendor who has confirmed minimum order quantities and can handle ever-increasing capacity. They source, cut and sew the "Original" Mr. Shirt accessory making them a triple threat for the Mr. Shirt team.

2) Shipments go out same day and ship free in the United States.

Have a concern, comment or question? If so, please get ahold of us at help@mrshirtinc.com

story:
What is Nascence?

Why Do We Want To Start This Project

How Can You Help?

Where Will The Money Go?

What We Need & What You Get

If we don't reach our target?

What do you get? - The Perks!


What is Nascence?

Nascence is a project designed to help emerging fashion designers from outside of the UK develop a network of stockist and customers in the UK and the Republic of Ireland.  



Why Do We Want To Start This Project?

It is nearly impossible for the designers from some parts of the globe to do it themselves.  We are a team of two fashion lovers who have spent our early careers working in the fashion industry as a Fashion Wholesaler and Fashion PR Consultant where we have been surprised and disappointed to recognise how many talented designers don't get the opportunity to produce and share their collections with us in the UK due entirely to logistical or financial limitations.  As a Team, we are ideally placed in terms of spotting real talent and then generating sales for the emerging talents that we find around the globe.  We believe that with your help, we can facilitate the growth of talented designers from around the world by giving them access to the vibrant UK market which is reknown for it's appetite for original and creative fashion collections.  

We have seen a problem and we have the skills to do something about it with your help.  The first designer we have identified as a great prospect is Mariella Pilato.

              

        

  • If you like fashion, you will LOVE the first collection we want to finance produced by Mariella Pilato, a Jewellery designer based in Bali, Indonesia (Where is Bali?).  Plus, you will enjoy the perks even more!
  • Your support spreading the message and contributing financially to the campaign will mean that Mariella will be able to turn a dream into a reality by having her creations enjoyed by fashion lovers and many more in the most vibrant market for fashion in Europe, the UK.
  • Your support will be rewarded and remembered with some fantastic perks and the eternal gratitude of the Team at Nascence and Mariella.

How Can You Help?

 The Team at Nascence believe that crowdfunding is the perfect way to raise funds for our project because we hope that many of our contributors will also be fashion lovers who want to wear Mariella's current and future Collections. We want to interact with our supporters (Facebook,Twitter and Instagram), listen to feedback about the Collections of our Designers and encourage you to introduce your friends and family to the fantastic collections that you played a part in supporting.  With your financial and moral support, we want Nascence, and you our supporters, to be the perfect UK partners for talented, emerging designers by providing the business infrastructure, supporters network and finance to produce and distribute their first Collections to hit the UK in a big way.  For many of the designers we want to work with, it is simply a lack of business know-how and resources that prevents them from taking their collections from one-off orders to being stocked in boutiques up and down the UK.   

Where Will The Money Go?

All money raised through this campaign will be used for the production, shipment and then sale of the first batch of products from Mariella Pilato in the UK.  Nascence will then use it's wholesale network to have the Collection regularly stocked in shops around the UK creating a lasting network for the distribution of Mariella's current and future collections.  

In order to finance Mariella's first batch of Jewellery for wholesale in the UK, we require:

£8000 - Production of a bulk amount of Mariella's Collection, 'Patterns of Crystallization'.  A significant order like this will enable Mariella to dedicate her time to her fashion label and the collection full-time which is important for future growth of the label because every piece is handmade.  With the sales push by Nascence, we will be able to provide a steady stream of future orders allowing the label to grow and become self-sufficient.

£2000 - Shipping and insurance from Mariella's workshop in Bali to Nascence's base in London.  The inhibitive cost of shipping and insurance from Bali is one of the main hurdles that have prevented Mariella from establishing a firm presence in the UK previously.

£5000 - For a three month Marketing and Sales push to fashion outlets across the UK and Republic of Ireland after which we hope to generate second orders for Mariella's collection from at least 10 different outlets. 

Wait a minute!  That all adds up to £15000 but the Indiegogo campaign target is £10000.  Have we made a mistake you ask?  No.  Nascence London is a Team of two people who really believe in the potential of this project so we want to put our combined savings into the sales and PR push so that the total amount we aim to raise from Indiegogo is  £10000 and we will put at least £5000 into the business, marketing and sales infrastructure.

If we don't reach our target?


If we do not reach our £10000 target, we will use the money we do raise to manufacture a smaller batch of Jewellery.  We will also continue to try and raise funds from friends and family to hit our £10000 target.  

If we go over our £10000 target, we will manufacture a larger batch of Jewellery which will give Mariella a longer production period and we will increase the target number of stockists that we aim to secure in the PR and Sales push.  This would represent a great success for us and maybe we could even stretch to some sparkling wine at our first Fashion Show to which all our supporters will be invited!

What do you get? - The Perks!

What we love most about Indiegogo is that we are able to demonstrate our appreciation for your support with more than our heartfelt words. We have put together a set of perks that we feel will express our gratitude and ensure you will always feel part of the Nascence London Project.

story:
Short Summary

Located in the quiet community of Vancouver, Washington, Second Star Designs is a small business owned and operated by a family with large dreams.  Created in 2006 and inspired by children of all ages, each treasure produced by this mother of five is created with beauty and comfort in mind.  Using a variety of colors and textures, each item is carefully hand-crafted with attention to quality and detail; creating collections that are timeless and without a specific season.  Our products are individually hand-crafted, with strict attention given to both quality and detail. We want our customers to be happy with their Treasures ... enough to pass them along to future generations. The only way for us to accomplish that is through careful consideration of our suppliers and sourcing of our materials. Where ever possible, we purchase organic fabrics manufactured from sustainable resources; we take steps to reduce our overall footprint by using innovative ways to turn discarded clothing items into wearable art.

After years of following these simple guidelines, we have approached a peak on our road to success - the opportunity for us to present to the world our designs and business model.  With this debut, we hope to expand our business demographic and create jobs not only back in our hometown, but around the world as well.

What We Need & What You Get

So far, we've raised the majority of our initial budget ... investing these monetary resources into supplies, advertising, shipping/freight, and airfare.  To fully achieve our goal, all that remains are a few travel expenses and a bit of financial compensation for our design team who will be presenting our fashions on the runway.  I believe that $900 is a realistic goal and I know that we will be able to reach that goal with your help.  Expenses that we are planning for include:

- accomodations for our crew
- travel expenses to and from the venue
- food & beverage for the crew 
- shipping our our entire clothing line to and from the event

Every little bit helps and every dollar will go toward the completion of this project ... even if means that we are unable to fully realize our goal and have fewer people participating in this great opportunity.

The Impact

Second Star Designs has been selected as the only children's clothing designer to participate in an international fashion runway event. This eco-oriented, small business will showcase 15 of their top designs for the 2012/2013 season alongside dozens of other, incredibly talented fashion designers.

Baltimore FashionWeek is among the first major runway events in the United States to have opened the catwalk to children's clothing designers.  Not since 2010 has a children's clothing designer graced the fashion runway; of all artisans who applied to participate in this event, Caryn Stockwell, of Second Star Designs in Vancouver, WA, was the only children's clothing designer chosen by the designer selection process. She will be opening for Baltimore FashionWeek with the debut of her 2012/2103 collection on Saturday, August 18, 2012, at the Pikesville Hilton in Baltimore County, MD.

The potential of this endeavor is great - allowing for other venues around the world to follow in the steps forged by Baltimore FashionWeek and Second Star Designs.  Through the utilization of recycled and organic materials, the designs being presented on the runway will help to expand the possibilities of fashion designers around the world.

Other Ways You Can Help

We wish to thank you personally for any contribution given to us.  Please take a moment to check out the different contribution levels to see some of the great participation gifts that we have to offer.

If you are unable to help financially, that's okay too.  We still want to you to be a part of this exciting journey.  Please feel free to "like" the Second Star Designs Facebook page, where you can follow along with us on our journey.  It is there that we will give a special "thank you" and acknowledgement for any contribution that you are able to make.  You can also follow our journey on Twitter @tinksecondstar.  When we reach our fundraising goal, the rewards listed will spill forth.

Thank you all ... from the bottom of our hearts.

Second Star Designs
story_txt:
Short Summary
Located in the quiet community of Vancouver, Washington, Second Star Designs is a small business owned and operated by a family with large dreams.  Created in 2006 and inspired by children of all ages, each treasure produced by this mother of five is created with beauty and comfort in mind.  Using a variety of colors and textures, each item is carefully hand-crafted with attention to quality and detail; creating collections that are timeless and without a specific season.  Our products are individually hand-crafted, with strict attention given to both quality and detail. We want our customers to be happy with their Treasures ... enough to pass them along to future generations. The only way for us to accomplish that is through careful consideration of our suppliers and sourcing of our materials. Where ever possible, we purchase organic fabrics manufactured from sustainable resources; we take steps to reduce our overall footprint by using innovative ways to turn discarded clothing items into wearable art.
After years of following these simple guidelines, we have approached a peak on our road to success - the opportunity for us to present to the world our designs and business model.  With this debut, we hope to expand our business demographic and create jobs not only back in our hometown, but around the world as well.


What We Need & What You Get
So far, we've raised the majority of our initial budget ... investing these monetary resources into supplies, advertising, shipping/freight, and airfare.  To fully achieve our goal, all that remains are a few travel expenses and a bit of financial compensation for our design team who will be presenting our fashions on the runway.  I believe that $900 is a realistic goal and I know that we will be able to reach that goal with your help.  Expenses that we are planning for include:
- accomodations for our crew- travel expenses to and from the venue- food & beverage for the crew - shipping our our entire clothing line to and from the event
Every little bit helps and every dollar will go toward the completion of this project ... even if means that we are unable to fully realize our goal and have fewer people participating in this great opportunity.


The Impact
Second Star Designs has been selected as the only children's clothing designer to participate in an international fashion runway event. This eco-oriented, small business will showcase 15 of their top designs for the 2012/2013 season alongside dozens of other, incredibly talented fashion designers.
Baltimore FashionWeek is among the first major runway events in the United States to have opened the catwalk to children's clothing designers.  Not since 2010 has a children's clothing designer graced the fashion runway; of all artisans who applied to participate in this event, Caryn Stockwell, of Second Star Designs in Vancouver, WA, was the only children's clothing designer chosen by the designer selection process. She will be opening for Baltimore FashionWeek with the debut of her 2012/2103 collection on Saturday, August 18, 2012, at the Pikesville Hilton in Baltimore County, MD.
The potential of this endeavor is great - allowing for other venues around the world to follow in the steps forged by Baltimore FashionWeek and Second Star Designs.  Through the utilization of recycled and organic materials, the designs being presented on the runway will help to expand the possibilities of fashion designers around the world.


Other Ways You Can Help
We wish to thank you personally for any contribution given to us.  Please take a moment to check out the different contribution levels to see some of the great participation gifts that we have to offer.
If you are unable to help financially, that's okay too.  We still want to you to be a part of this exciting journey.  Please feel free to "like" the Second Star Designs Facebook page, where you can follow along with us on our journey.  It is there that we will give a special "thank you" and acknowledgement for any contribution that you are able to make.  You can also follow our journey on Twitter @tinksecondstar.  When we reach our fundraising goal, the rewards listed will spill forth.
Thank you all ... from the bottom of our hearts.
Second Star Designs

story:
Boulevard de Magenta 

Goes To Vancouver BC Fashion Week

Details, craftsmanship, experimentation and history: these values are the driving force behind Wendy’s multimedia approach to apparel design. Her experience as artist, interior designer, business owner and (somewhat) reformed punk-rocker combine to influence the point-of-view behind the clothing and accessories that are Magenta by Wendy Ohlendorf.

In the mid-90s, Wendy opened a shop in Portland featuring over 20 local designers. It was there, in the back workroom, that her love for apparel design grew and became the art form she now focuses on.

Wendy has been fortunate to show in the Portland Market at Portland Fashion Week, and has been receiving acclaim for her designs through print, social media, and a broad spectrum of clientele including news anchors and pageant title holders. It is through this exposure that her work has been recognized by the International Design Coordinator of Vancouver BC Fashion Week.   "I am incredibly excited for the invitation from Vancouver BC Fashion Week to showcase my work on the runway.  This invitation has not only given me the opportunity to showcase my work on a broader scale, but has also been an incredible nod that I am doing the right thing.  Following my dreams and believing in myself!  The love and support from my family and friends has being invaluable.  I am truly blessed and grateful to have the ability to take my work to the next level.  Thank you all for helping to get me there."

Your support is needed to help raise the funds needed to get Wendy and Boulevard de Magenta to VFW! Your contributions will be directly applied to the registration fees, the sample showroom for buyers and representatives of large scale retailers.

Please contribute what you can to send me on my way to an international audience!

THANK YOU!!!

*Watch the special message video in the video gallery tab above*

Where Your Money Will Go

$3800 - Registration Fees required by Vancouver BC Fashion Week to participate in the runway show.  The runway shows in Vancouver are attended by 20,000 people.  Including representatives of Vogue, Elle, and Marie Claire.
$5000 - Required registration fees and a booth in the exclusive sample showroom.
$Beyond - Required registration fees, booth in the showroom, and a jumpstart on the next collection!
Every little bit helps!
If my base goal is not met, I still receive your contributions toward getting there!
Contributions can be made by PayPal (preferred) or credit card.  PayPal contributions will get to me much more quickly!!!!

The Perks

Level 1: $5 Your name on the supporter's page on www.magentapdx.com, the Boulevard de Magenta website.
Level 2:  $10 Invitation to the VIP Supporter's Party at the Fluevog Retail Store, Portland. Where the designs that walked the runway will be on display.
Level 3: $20 Receive a postcard from Vancouver BC.  Hand written by Wendy!
Level 4: $40 Attend the send off, pre-show traditional dinner at Boxer Ramen. (1 Ramen included)
Level 5: $50 contribution  - $25 Gift Certificate for any Fluevog Purchase at the VIP Supporter's Party hosted by the Fluevog Retail Store, Portland.  Where the designs that walked the runway will be on display. (10 available)
Level 6:  $60 Gift Certificate toward a custom design and consultation by Wendy Ohlendorf of Boulevard de Magenta. 
Level 7:  $100 Limited Edition Boulevard de Magenta Necklace. Heart shape with 2 tags that read "Boulevard de Magenta"


Level 8:  $125 Custom Raglan Sleeve, "Jersey Dress" in Tropical Wool and vintage Rayon Challis.  One of a kind, custom fit, your choice of sleeve fabric. 


Level 9: $150 contribution - $300 Value Headshot Package from Studio Saint James.  Including a studio session, personal editing and photo re-touches, and hi-res images. (5 available)
Level 10: $250 Have a couture gown named after you.  Your named garment will be featured on runways, in print, and on the Boulevard de Magenta website.
Level 11: $500 Guests of Honor dinner at my loft, home cooked by Wendy.


All Levels:  **All Florida supporters will be invited to the Florida Friends and Family Party December 2014.**
* Non-Perk based and anonymous contributions also accepted in all denominations.
* Perks are transferable and make great gifts

    The Impact

    Your contribution will not only make it possible for me to accept the invitation to showcase my work in an international marketplace, Vancouver BC Fashion Week, but will also help me to continue to reach my goals and take my designs to the next level.
    It was only in Paris, April 2013, that I realized my true desire and made a commitment to myself.  A promise to be true to me, go after what I wanted in my life, and most importantly, fearlessly make my art.  Since then the Universe has responded, and reciprocated with a bounty of opportunity, all of which I have given myself to full force.  I hope to continue to reach these new heights and continue to grow and share my passion with the world as the opportunity arises....this time I'm just going to have to achieve it a bit more creatively and ask for a little help from my family and friends.
    Until now the goals I have set and the opportunities that have arisen I have been able to achieve largely on my own.  I am not a person that easily asks for help.  So in some ways asking you now for your help to achieve this next goal, is also helping me to overcome another obstacle and achieve a personal level of growth, that it is ok to ask for help sometimes.
    If you know me than you know that I go forward with complete dedication, and 100% concern for the quality of the outcome.  I promise that this endeavor will be no different. I am grateful for your support, love, encouragement, and mostly for the belief in me to go after my dreams full force!


        Other Ways You Can Help

        Twitter

        Facebook

        Promote Me

        Indiegogo Share Tools

        Donate Items To This Campaign 

        Donate Your Ideas To Me

story:
We need your help to bring the first affordable designer high quality wooden eyewear that is optimized for prescription lenses alive. For the 2013 Holiday Season, our team at WOOED eyewear would like to create a prescription compatible collection for you and your loved ones. 

It is challenging to design prescription-compatible wooden frames due to the curvature we needed to create in the wooden frames. Current wooden frames are usually flat due to the wood fibers’ limitations. Any prescription lenses in flat-shaped wooden frames will be distorted and the image won’t be clear. Our expertise in wooden sunglasses will allow us to fulfill our dream of one of a kind, ecofriendly wooden eyewear that is durable and stylish. 

Referral Help:

We need your help to spread the word for our Indiegogo campaign! 

Indiegogo allows us to track how many referrals we get from Indiegogo users so we're giving away watches and other accessories to the top 6 people who refer the most traffic to our campaign page!

All you have to do is be logged in with an Indiegogo profile or with your Facebook profile and then share our campaign! Once you are logged in, view our campaign page here:

http://igg.me/at/Wooed/

Just below the video at the top of the page there is the "Share This Campaign" box. 

Simply copy and paste the link from the box and share it with your friends! The number at the end of the URL is unique to your login and allows us to keep track of who sends us referrals. You can also use the social media buttons to share the campaign on Facebook, Twitter and Google Plus.





Why WOOED wooden frames?

A. Eco-friendly and non-toxic

As a totally natural product our frames are also recyclable, biodegradable, energy efficient and non-toxic. All wood used in this line are from sustainably harvested sources.  The natural growth cycle of wood is a key element in reducing CO2 from the atmosphere, helping to mitigate the "greenhouse" effect and reduce ozone depletion. 

B. Designed to showcase wood’s natural pattern

With our minimal treatment, each pair showcases their unique natural wood grain patterns. Because of our handcrafted process and wood’s natural grain, each pair is also unique to its owner.

C. 16 Designs to choose from

Only 8 of them are listed here. Please check out our image profile for more styles.

D. High quality lenses

Prescription lenses: Our prescription lenses are made from polycarbonate, the most impact-resistant lens material on the market. Our lenses provide 100% UV protection and two coatings: anti-reflective and anti-scratch.

Polarized lenses: Our sunglasses offer high quality industry standard 100% UVA/B blocking polarized lenses.

E. German stainless steel (two spring) hinges

We use German stainless steel two spring hinges for smooth, consistent movements. Our spring hinges are very durable, give a more customized fit, and are more expensive.  Our Premium spring hinges are a terrific value and complement the high quality of the frame.

F. Designed for comfort

Our frames are light, at around 2-3 ounces (half the weight of pair of acetate/plastic frames). They are also built to be durable. Wood fibers are engineered in the way the shape doesn’t break the fiber so the frames are strengthened through layers of wood. We always warrant our products for three months. 

Why do we need your support to create this collection?

The frame prototype is fully developed and tested. In order to bring them to market, we need to work with a high-end lab to provide prescription services. We have to purchase top quality wood and other custom materials as well as pay the expert craftsmen to shape them into the stylish frames you see below. We need your help to bring these glasses from a dream into existence.  And, as reward, we want you to be the first to wear the WOOED prescription frames. In order to launch this collection: we need your support to make them a reality: partner with craftsmen, update our current website to handle prescription and personalization services, bring our logistics up to standard to match the customized demand and money for the materials -such as high quality polarized lenses, German spring hinges and the beautiful wood and materials.

Reward Level 

About WOOED as a brand

This product was born from the our love for life, travel, outdoor and the environment. We hope to provide you with a unique experience to be re-connected with nature in your daily life. 

FAQ

Q: How do we pick which style I want?

Please select the prescription/sunglasses option and we will send out google doc/emails/calls to collect the prescription information! So sit tight!

Q: Can the glasses come with prescription clear lenses?

Please select the prescription option and we will send out google doc/emails/calls to collect the prescription information

Q: Can the prescription lenses be sunglasses?

Yes. Please select the prescription option and we will send out google doc/emails/calls to collect the prescription information

Q: When multiple units are shipped, is only one shipping charge applied?

Yes, regardless of the number of units shipped, a single charge is made for postage.

Q: Do you provide a warranty?

Yes. We do.

Q. Do you ship globally?

A. Yes. It’s a small world! Where there is sun, there is WOOED. We have happy customers in Australia, Norway, Sweden, Asia, all over North America and England, to name a few. 

Q. Tell us more about the polarized lenses WOOED uses?

A. All WOOED sunglasses are equipped with high quality scratch resistant polarized lenses. We are extremely proud of our lenses which we have thoughtfully designed to not only offer you full 100% protection from harmful UVA/B rays, but are also glare and scratch resistant. They are a perfect balance of durability and comfort, and are incredibly durable while being also feather-light. WOOED’s polarized lenses have selective filtering that reduce your exposure to sun rays and reflected light from bright surfaces like snow and ocean waves that can cause eyestrain and fatigue.

Order WOOED gift card for Christmas?

If you want to give WOOED as a gift this holiday season you can print a WOOED Gift Certificate at home! Or you can order a professionally printed WOOED gift card.

Still have questions not answered? Don't worry. Please email us contact@wooedbywood.com and we will get back to you ASAP :-)

Much love from team at WOOED!

www.wooedbywood.com

story:
316L Stainless Steel

Our case, case back, clasp, crown, and quick release spring bar pin are all made from 316L stainless steel which is a steel alloy that is known for is strength and corrosion resistance. The same steel is used in jet engines and military tanks.

Sapphire Crystal

Our watch crystals are made from Sapphire which is a top of the line crystal and is know for its scratch and shatter resistance. Sapphire is next to diamond on the hardness scale and is rated a 9 out of 10 for hardness.

Swiss Movement

For the movements, the heart of the watch, we partnered with a Swiss company called Ronda. Ronda has a long track record and reputation of offering reliable, accurate, and quality timepieces.

Top Grain Italian Leather

Our straps are made from top grain Italian leather; the best you can get. The are vegetable tanned which allows them to wear naturally over time. The more you wear them, the more comfortable they get.

All Natural, Responsibly Sourced Wood or Bamboo

Our watch dials are made from all natural wood or bamboo. Our wood is responsibly sourced and replenished. We use wood because it makes each individual watch unique. Each wood grain pattern is different from the last. We love promoting individuality.

Quick Release Spring Bar Pin

Each watch comes with a quick release spring bar pin which makes changing bands quick and simple. Each watch will also come with an extra silicone sports band for water and sporting activities.

10ATM or 100 Meter Water Resistance Rating

The watches are rated at 10ATM or 100M water resistance so you'll never have to worry about water damage. 

We started our design process with the goal of a good looking wood and stainless steel hybrid watch. We completed our first round of prototypes but after putting them on, we knew we had a long way to go. They looked great but they didn't fit our reputation of offering lightweight and comfortable watches.

We spent over a year researching and testing ways to keep the watches lightweight and comfortable while using stronger and more durable materials like stainless steel, sapphire, and Swiss movements. Three designs and countless samples later, we nailed it.

Our ergonomic case back rises at a 30-degree angle to match the natural concave of your wrist

25% More Mobility Than Traditional Watches

Traditional flat cases restrict your wrists natural movements. Our ergonomic case design rises from the movement at a  30-degree angle which matches the natural concave of your wrist. This provides your wrist with a comfortable 100% range of motion. 

316L Stainless Steel

Our case, case back, clasp, crown, and quick release spring bar pin are all made from 316L stainless steel which is a steel alloy that is known for is strength and corrosion resistance. The same steel is used in jet engines and military tanks.

Top Grain Italian Leather

Our watch dials are made from all natural wood or bamboo. Our wood is responsibly sourced and replenished. We use wood because it makes each individual watch unique. Each wood grain pattern is different from the last. We love promoting individuality. 

Quick Release Spring Bar Pin

Each watch comes with a quick release spring bar pin which makes changing bands quick and simple. Each watch will also come with an extra silicone sports band for water and sporting activities. 

While Calvin was not involved in the design or manufacturing of these watches, he was very instrumental in founding Luno. When we started designing our first line of watches over 2 years ago, Calvin was very helpful in answering questions and giving feedback/suggestions. We wouldn't be here today without the passion he instilled in me (Bo) and the help he offered while we were starting. 

Luno Lifestyle

At Luno Wear we work hard and we play hard. We're students, fathers, mothers, husbands, wives, friends, and everything in between. Our watches are designed to work well in whatever life throws our way.
story_txt:
316L Stainless Steel
Our case, case back, clasp, crown, and quick release spring bar pin are all made from 316L stainless steel which is a steel alloy that is known for is strength and corrosion resistance. The same steel is used in jet engines and military tanks.

Sapphire Crystal
Our watch crystals are made from Sapphire which is a top of the line crystal and is know for its scratch and shatter resistance. Sapphire is next to diamond on the hardness scale and is rated a 9 out of 10 for hardness.

Swiss Movement
For the movements, the heart of the watch, we partnered with a Swiss company called Ronda. Ronda has a long track record and reputation of offering reliable, accurate, and quality timepieces.

Top Grain Italian Leather
Our straps are made from top grain Italian leather; the best you can get. The are vegetable tanned which allows them to wear naturally over time. The more you wear them, the more comfortable they get.

All Natural, Responsibly Sourced Wood or Bamboo
Our watch dials are made from all natural wood or bamboo. Our wood is responsibly sourced and replenished. We use wood because it makes each individual watch unique. Each wood grain pattern is different from the last. We love promoting individuality.

Quick Release Spring Bar Pin
Each watch comes with a quick release spring bar pin which makes changing bands quick and simple. Each watch will also come with an extra silicone sports band for water and sporting activities.

10ATM or 100 Meter Water Resistance Rating
The watches are rated at 10ATM or 100M water resistance so you'll never have to worry about water damage. 



We started our design process with the goal of a good looking wood and stainless steel hybrid watch. We completed our first round of prototypes but after putting them on, we knew we had a long way to go. They looked great but they didn't fit our reputation of offering lightweight and comfortable watches.
We spent over a year researching and testing ways to keep the watches lightweight and comfortable while using stronger and more durable materials like stainless steel, sapphire, and Swiss movements. Three designs and countless samples later, we nailed it.
Our ergonomic case back rises at a 30-degree angle to match the natural concave of your wrist

25% More Mobility Than Traditional Watches

Traditional flat cases restrict your wrists natural movements. Our ergonomic case design rises from the movement at a  30-degree angle which matches the natural concave of your wrist. This provides your wrist with a comfortable 100% range of motion.

Our case, case back, clasp, crown, and quick release spring bar pin are all made from 316L stainless steel which is a steel alloy that is known for is strength and corrosion resistance. The same steel is used in jet engines and military tanks.

story:
Dirty Gold Clothing some-ary

  • Atrist Name: DTMS
  • Creative Designs, Atristic Expressionism
  • Quality fabrics 
  • Limited Supply
  • Original Brooklyn Swag
  • Only 15 of each design will printed to maintain the integrity of the art.

website = dirtygoldclothing.com

DTMS is a Brooklyn artist who has lived in New York City's toughest projects and perfers to remain anonymous, due to wanting his art to be the focus of the company, not himself. The artist is interested in having his artwork put on shirts and sweatshirts, thus we are starting a clothing company called "Dirty Gold Clothing Company." His work is expressionism in its raw form. The art pieces are metaphors for social issues affecting New Yorkers as well as people worldwide. The exact meaning of the art piece is never truly revealed, but it is left open for interpretation. The piece has a name that goes with it that would give more insight to the meaning of the work.

The artist uses his works to express the strength of common people and gives them power in powerless circumstances, and other pieces are simply expression of a certain mood. Each piece is rather abstract and simple. Much of the influence is a mix of mythology and realism. The art is raw, and at times vulger, but always meaningful and purposeful. The art represents the power of connections between people who struggle and how the street-level bond that people have often moves mountiains in a more abstract mind-state. 

The are pieces are limited. There are many works that will be printed, but only a few of each piece, to maintain the integrity of the designs as true art pieces. Only 15 of each will be sold. The shirts/hoodies/crew neck sweatshirts and hats will be of the highest quality and will be numbered 1 of 15 etc, so the person who is purchasing will be know which number of 15 they own. The purpose of Dirty Gold is to produce high quality art and high quality clothing that is relevent and current to today's social issues. There will be Special Edition pieces for Martin Luther King Jr. day, Valentine's day etc. 

We hope to eventually open a store-front in Brooklyn when Dirty Gold becomes a successful Brand. 

Check out the website above to see some of the pieces that will be put onto shirts and read the Brand Philosophy as well. Also, read the poem on the site about Mayor Michael Bloomberg. Many of the pieces are based off of the artist's poems. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need $5000 to print and produce the designs that are already created.

$5000 will enable the following:

  • Purchasing of high quality T-shirt and Sweatshirt fabrics to print on.
  • The costs of screen printing the designs onto the shirts (Made in Brooklyn, NY)
  • Purchasing labels for the clothing.
  • The ability to work here in Brooklyn without having to outsourse our printing.
  • The creation of multiple designs and use multiple color schemes.

Other donors who contribute $40 or more will have an opportunity to receive more. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Word of mouth is the best and only advertisement we use. We are not on social media and refuse to be. We have a website that is set up to display designs and poems from the artist, but that is simply a way for people to see upcoming designs and tell others about them. We do not advertise on the street, on the radio or on Facebook. It is simply a world of mouth campaign. 

Thank you for reading and for anyone who contributes, regardless how big or small...THANK YOU! You are all helping the dream come true.

story:
Revolutionize the way you care about your pups and bring you peace of mind.

Dogs are known to be human’s best friend and we all love our pups. Truth be told, we often see them as our kids and are constantly wondering if there’s anything more we can do to learn more about their wellbeing and keep them as healthy and happy as possible.  

As human, we need our UP or Fitbit to track our activity and understand ourselves better, and for our beloved pups, we also need something to help us keep tabs on their behavior, activity level and whereabout. We care about their welfare the way we care about our own and would love to share that same love and care for our pups with other dog lovers as well.

What if there’s something that allows us to do things like that? 

With a CTO who dedicated his free time fighting for animal rights and volunteering at an animal shelter, our  team really took the development of Lucky Tag to heart.

A Holistic Approach To Take Care Of Your Best Friend

Lucky Tag is a colorful, cute, on-collar tracker that gives you detailed insights into your pup’s activity level, behavior pattern and trends over time. It also recognizes the temperature your pup is in, locates his or her whereabouts, and encourages interaction with other loving dog owners like you.

With it, you can obtain in-depth insights into your pup’s life whether you are around or not and be notified when further actions are needed. You can check in on your beloved pups whenever, wherever.

Besides taking care of your best friend in a healthier way, Lucky Tag also allows you to locate your pup with the help of others.

Dog lovers who own the Lucky Tag app on their smartphones can now help you find your beloved pup by messaging and guiding you to him or her. You can also use the app to exchange contacts and engage conversations with other dog owners and start building new friendships. 

Lucky Tag is all about your pup and knowing what’s going on with him or her. 


Lucky Tag does more than just tracking and monitoring your pup’s activity, it also embodies a collaborative searching feature that helps you find your lost pup and engage with other dog owners.

What can LUCKY tag do?

TRACKING ACTIVITY, INACTIVITY & HEALTH

Lucky Tag tracks the daily walking, running activity and inactive rest periods of your pup. Our supported app presents you with an eye-catching visual snapshot of your pup’s activity highlighting the data and details that matter. 

How has he or she been feeling? Has she walked, run, played, or rested over the course of a day? How have things been trending over a certain period of time?

SENSING AMBIENT TEMPERATURE

With the Lucky Tag device and app, you can understand your pup’s health by tracking his or her activity level that is correlated with the surrounding temperature. When the ambient temperature is high and the activity level of your pup seems low, you know he or she might be feeling drowsy and it’s time to give him or her some water and go take a walk. 

FINDING NEARBY VET

The Lucky Tag device and app took the activity monitoring feature to the next level with the “Finding Nearby Vet” feature. With it,, you can get a better sense of when your pup is most active, active or inactive. 

When irregularity occurs, a warning message will pop up on your phone and “Nearby Vet” is just one click away. No more googling or yelping. 

Moreover, share the information collected with your vet to make better healthcare decisions for your pup and take necessary actions.

FIND MY DOG VIA COMMUNITY

According to National Humane Society and the National Council of Pet Population Study and Policy, over 10 million pets get lost or stolen in the U.S. every year and only one-tenth of them get found and reunite with their owners.

As dog lovers ourselves, we were saddened by this heartbreaking statistics and have decided to take on a more proactive approach to help prevent missing dogs from happening. We know that nerve-wracking and heart-broken feeling you have when your pup wanders off and you have no idea where to find him or her. Lucky Tag now comes to the rescue. 

When searching for your pup with Lucky Tag, you are not the only one searching for it, it’s a search party for everyone who has the device. Once you send out a notification to the Lucky Tag community, with collaborative effort, all Lucky Tag app owners within the network get notified and work together to help you locate your pup. The more, the merrier.

Be a good Samaritan and help each other out.

INTERACT WITH OTHER PUP OWNERS

We are trying to build a big community for the Lucky Tag family. Every member has his or her profile with their beloved pup. Within the community, you get to exchange information and interact with others like you. 

Or, you can even help search for their lost pups. Who knows, this might just be the start of a new friendship.

STAY CONNECTED WITH THE LUCKY TAG APP

Want to know how your pup is doing throughout the day? 

Stay connected with our supported app and receive updates and data on his or her activity status.

Whether you are occupied at work, away on vacation or just running some errands and gone for the day, you can check in on your pup via the app any time, anywhere.


LET LUCKY-HUB KEEP AN EYE OUT WHILE YOU'RE GONE.

Most of the time we aren’t at home, and it would be great if we can still keep an eye out for our pups. Lucky Hub solves this issue, and will keep you notified wherever you go.

With just a no-hassle-no-fuss setup, the Lucky Hub can notify you if you aren’t home for a period of time, it can still keep you informed on how your dog is doing at that moment, and also tell you if he isn’t performing too well and may need to seek attention.


DID WE MENTION THE APP IS SUPER CUTE AND USER FRIENDLY AS WELL? 


HOW IS LUCKY TAG DIFFERENT

The core of Lucky Tag is beacon technology. Every Lucky Tag has an unique ID that is configured for each dog and constantly sends out Bluetooth signals as far as 250 feet for smart phones nearby to detect and identify the ID. 

Lucky Tag tracks and logs your pup’s activity level as well as ambient temperature uninterruptedly while syncing the data with your smart phone, which can last up to 10 days.

With the "Find My Dog" feature of Lucky Tag, it helps you locate your missing pup with the collaborative effort of Lucky Tag devices near by.  By taking advantages of the multiplied distance of all Lucky Tag devices, the search range is potentially limitless.

What makes the Lucky Tag even cooler is the social feature of the Lucky Tag app. You can also use it to pinpoint close-by Lucky Tag owners and exchange contacts with one another. If there’s an user within 150 feet and the bluetooth is on on both sides, you can send him or her a message even without 3G or WiFi.


Prior to Lucky Tag, we’ve already had experiences in developing beacon-technology-powered products for different fields. Yet, as dog lovers ourselves, we are eager to bring this technology to our best friend and make a difference to the way we take care of them.

Now, we need your support to spread the words, invite friends and family to join our community so that we can take it to the next level and make it available for all dog lovers like you.

With your support, we can:

  • promote responsible dog caring
  • help you monitor your pup’s activities, notify you when something is up and take proactive measures to care for him or her
  • continue to dedicate our effort and time in perfecting the Lucky Tag as well as developing a new platform that benefits other kind of pets 
  • build and expand the Lucky Tag community to help search for lost pups and reunite them with worried owners  
  • provide you early access to our IndieGoGo specials with attractive and affordable pricing

In addition to the Lucky Tag app and what’s mentioned above, we are also planning on offering a Lucky Tag hub to help you receive real-time activity updates on your pup, store the data and automatically sync it to the cloud so that you can access any time anywhere in the near future.

It is in our heart to promote fun yet responsible dog caring and improving the lives of our beloved pups the way they bring joy to us.



Lucky Tag started with a group of pet lovers from both technical and creative background hoping to create something that is beneficial to their pups. With wearables being the talk of the market and our expertise in beacon technology, it hit us, “why not do what we do best and create an useful wearable for our pups?”

After months of testing and refining the concept, we narrowed it down to 3 major features: Dog’s Health Tracker, Find My Dog and Social Interaction Between Dog Owners.

Yet, the best part is: 

This idea just got patented and we are now brining it to everyone with an affordable and competitive price so that we can all have peace of mind when it comes to our fluffy friend.

That’s why we designed Lucky Tag.


Design

Lucky Tag consists of a core unit and a strap. It is super adorable and comes in 8 fun colors. 

Not only is it cute and eye-catching but also very light and sturdy with a rugged, waterproof casing.

As amazing as it sounds, there also lies the most important question of all- Is it safe?

To address that issue, we adopted the FDA-certified non-allergic, soft silicone. It is completely safe, non toxic and can be easily and securely attached to any collar to avoid being bitten off or broken by pups themselves. 

Oh and, YES, Lucky Tag does come in small sizes for smaller dogs as well.


Technology

Because we care about our pups as much as we care about ourselves, we have decided to use the best sensor chips we could find, along with temperature sensor and G sensor to automatically collect and record the data detected onto our Mobile Beacons. 

On top of that, we also managed to provide wide RF search range without consuming much power.  Unlike those GPS-centric devices which consumes lots of power, we designed Lucky Tag in a way that you don't need to change it for at least another 4 to 6 months and we use the most common CR2032 battery which does not require weekly charging. In English, it saves lots of power and that's the beauty of applying beacon technology!  

Lucky Tag is iOS and Android-compatible and devices must be using Apple iOS 7 or 8 or Android 4.3 or higher with Bluetooth 4.0. 


We have ample experience in GPS and RF technology, not to mention the fact that the Airyzone Mobile Beacon we designed has temperature sensing capability as well as low power-consumption. 

For the past year, our Mobile Beacon has been successfully applied to various industries, such as semi-conductor manufacturing, transportation technology and smart shopping.

Learning from the experiences, we decided to further utilize it and embed it onto our most exciting product ever- Lucky Tag.

As of now, we have already completed the followings:

Dec 31, 2014 Lucky Tag Prototype

Jan 31, 2015 filing or FCC, CE

Mar 31, 2015 Lucky Tag Hub  Prototype 

Apr 30, 2015 App Design Complete

May 15, 2015 Mass Production

Jun 30, 2015 Ready for Shipping


And to move forward, we need your support!

Please do pledge and help spread the words, we will really appreciate it!



Risks & Challenges

 The biggest challenges we are facing would be the limitation of beacon technology which the "Find My Dog" feature of Lucky Tag is based on. It relies on the collaborative support and power of a mass community. Meaning, if there are more people using it within a certain range, the higher the density, the better the feature works. However, if there are only a couple of users, then the feature will not be able to fully function. And, that is exactly why we need your support to help us build and grow the community.
Please back us and be part of the revolution.


FAQ

  • How is Lucky Tag different from all the other pet wearables out there?

    Lucky Tag is the very first dog wearable that combines three functions into one device, satisfying the needs of pet healthcare, LBS social among near by dog owners, and searching for missing dogs. Most of the products in the market features only one function let alone two.

    Yes, there are many KEY-Finder type of products in the market, including the Tile and TrackR, but these are all based on Bluetooth FindMe profile. On the technical side, Lucky Tag is based on a new kind of technology called Airyzone Mobile Beacon, which is very similar to Apple's iBeacon, but with much lower power-consumption. This difference in technology results in the high efficiency in finding lost dogs.

    Last updated:

  • How does the "Find My Dog" feature works exactly?

    We use beacon technology to locate missing dogs. For example, if one lost dog with Lucky-Tag is walking around on the street, then other Lucky-Tag App users within 40 to 100 meters can help the dog owner locate his/her whereabout quickly. On the other hand, for all the other KEY-Finder products out there, their App can only find items within 30 meters at most.

    Last updated:

  • In terms of locating missing dogs, how is the Beacon Technology approach different from the GPS approach?

    Regarding the cost and accessibility, yes, there are a few products in the marketplace that combine both GPS and motion sensor for pet healthcare and pet searching, however, the problem is that they are either too expensive, power-consuming or in need of a monthly GSM SIM card subscription fee. Most importantly, those products can only operation without recharging for up to three or five days. In comparison of those devices, Lucky Tag uses a CR2032 battery which does not require weekly charging and the battery life can last up to 6 month till the next replacement.
