story:
VISIT US @  www.TRAKLINE.com
   

                              WHAT MAKE TRAKLINE BELTS BETTER >>

1 - PERFECT FIT:  In this ever-changing world, you need a belt that adapts with you, every 1/4 inch of the way. Trakline Belts conform to your exact waist size, every time.

2 - ADJUSTABILITY:  With over 40 sizing positions, Trakline Belts are 8X's more adjustable than traditional belts.

3 - NO HOLES:  That's right.  No more worn-out, stretched-out, augmented, poor-fitting belt holes to deal with. Instead a modern, hidden trak system.

4 - STYLE: Designed for MEN who care about their appearance, our buckles are simple, smart and distinctive. 

5 - QUALITY:  We could make our belts out of less expensive materials, but we like quality stuff.  The buckles are solid stainless steel and the belts are full-grain leather (the best).

>> featured on:  Dude I Want That, Gear Hungry, ShoppersBase & Crowdfund Mafia

                                                  Visit us @ www.TRAKLINE.com

SO HOW'S IT WORK ?
When a Trakline belt is pulled snug around your waist, the buckle locks firmly at your exact waist size - every time you put it on. To remove or adjust, pull the small tab under the buckle. It's that simple. Not only do Trakline belts fit much better than traditional belts, but they're easier to take on and off AND they last longer.  Watch the video and see for yourself - because seeing is believing... 

We recently completed a successful KICKSTARTER campaign to fund the first production run!  Thanks to our supporters - mission accomplished :)

Now we're on INDIEGOGO to accomplish two additional goals.

First, we need the funds to design, develop and prototype more product styles, and second, we want to give back to a great charity >> Working Wardrobes. 

Of course to accomplish all this we need your support. In return, we want to give you the best belt you'll ever own...

                                                  Visit us @ www.TRAKLINE.com
OUR STORY
Two years ago my wife bought me an expensive, designer belt for my birthday. She wanted to upgrade my wardrobe. Unfortunately for me, the belt holes didn't line up with my waist size that day. So I did what a lot of guys have done, I added a couple holes. But in the process >> I ruined the belt. Needless to say, my wife was not happy.

INSPIRATION
I learned 2 simple lessons that day.  First, never puncture any gift from your wife and second >> belt holes don't work all that well. Not much of a surprise, considering they were introduced during the "Dark Ages" and really haven't changed since.

Consider that as you work, walk, eat, sleep, play (or even diet) - your waist size naturally fluctuates. Unfortunately, traditional belts only offer you 1 inch spaced holes. Who's waist fluctuates 1 inch at a time?  Not mine. So I made it my mission to find a better fitting belt >> that looked good too. But when I scoured the marketplace... I came up empty. That's when I got inspired to create a whole new kind of belt. 

THE BOTTOM LINE
Every man knows that belt holes aren't fun to deal with. They stretch-out, wear-out and rarely seem to fit just right. Don't you think you deserve a belt that not only looks great, but fits perfectly too ? ...We think so.

CREATING A NEW KIND OF BELT
After a year and a half of designing, sampling, prototyping and testing >> we came up with the TRAKLINE BELT.

                                                 Visit us @ www.TRAKLINE.com

First - we employed a belt with a trak system.  This 10-inch trak is sewn into the back of the belt and completely hidden from sight. Next, we designed a unique (PATENT PENDING) buckle to interface with the belt and give you over 40 sizing positions all in 1/4 inch increments. That 8X's more adjustable than your traditional belt. When a Trakline belt is pulled snug around your waist, the buckle locks firmly at your exact waist size. The result = a simple, stylish belt that offers the perfect fit, every time. (see photos)

WHAT ABOUT QUALITY ?
We designed Trakline belts to last >> because we like quality. The buckle is constructed of solid stainless steel (with brushed nickel finish) and the belt is full-grain leather (the best) with double stitching. Yes, the buckle does contain a small amount of nickle (as is necessary) to stabilize the steel.

HOW DO YOU KNOW I'LL LOVE IT ?
When we completed the final samples, we handed them out to a few friends and associates to test for us. The only problem was, when we went to get the belts back, no one wanted to give them up. All the guys loved their new belts, they said it was the best fitting, best quality belt they ever had and above all >> they didn't want to go back to their old belts.

WHY INDIEGOGO, YOU ALREADY DID KICKSTATER ?
Yes, we recently completed a successful campaign on Kickstarter to raise the funds for our first production run. Thanks to our supporters, we far surpased our initial goal.  But unfortunately after the campaign was over there were still two things we wanted to accomplish that we hadn't planned or budgeted for. We wanted to design, develop and prototype new product styles, and we wanted to give-back in a meaningful way.

                                       Visit us @ www.TRAKLINE.com

OKAY, SO WHAT'S THE MONEY FOR ?
(1) Making your Trakline belt(s), (2) Designing, developing and prototyping more product designs, and (3) Giving back to a charity.  Specifically the funds will augment phase 2 of our production run and reduce our raw material costs. This savings will facilitate tech drawings, molds, prototypes and samples for new product styles. AND we're giving a portion of the proceeds and plenty of belts to Working Wardrobes (see below).  The extent of our donation will depend on the sucess of the campaign.

GIVING BACK
Over the past 20 years Working Wardrobes has helped tens of thousands of veterans and other at-risk folks find a life-changing job. They do this by not only providing clothing, but needed counseling and other outreach services. They help folks help themselves.  See Working Wardrobes

PERKS
In return for your support, we want you to give you a genuine Trakline Belt at a great DISCOUNT! Check out the Perks column for the styles and pricing.  In addition, we're offering FREE SHIPPING to all U.S. orders. For all International orders (outside the USA) please add extra shipping as specified.

GIFT FOR GUYS
Trakline Belts make a great gift that guys can wear and appreciate everyday... not like that tie you're thinking about buying him.

                                        Visit us @ www.TRAKLINE.com

BELT DETAILS
At the moment, we have 4 buckle styles (Icon, Intrepid, Evolve & Eureka) and 2 belt colors (black or brown) to choose from (see photos).  With your help we will have more styles shortly.  The Belts are 1 3/8 inches (35mm) wide and should fit thru most jean or dress pant loops. Currently our belts fit waist sizes UP TO 44 inches (118 cm).  After this camapign we will have more styles, larger sizes and women’s buckles available. After the campaign you can visit us @ http://www.TRAKLINE.com

On the back of each belt we've printed waist sizes to show you precisely where to trim your Trakline belt (with scissors) . The trimmed end then snaps securely into the buckle.  It's easy.  It's best to try the belt on before trimming.  The purpose for trimming, is to get your belt length within your "waist range", then the 10 inch trak system can create your perfect fit every day.

THE TEAM
Karl Kozak: Sales & Marketing
Mauro Bove: Manufacturing & Quality Control
Steve Olson: Product & Web Design
The three of us have been good friends and business associates for over 10 years. So when I approached Mauro and Steve with my idea to create a new kind of men's belt, both thought it was a great idea who's time had come and jumped at the chance to get involved. Not just because of our friendship, but because they mutually agreed that traditional belts were not only outdated, but that there had to be a better method. And I wanted them on board because of their skill sets and expertise. I thought they were perfect for this project.

For the past 15 years Mauro has been in product manufacturing and quality control. As a result, he's manufactured a wide variety of high-quality retail products for some of Americas biggest retailers. Steve is an all-around talented designer, who's been crucial in creating our product designs, drawings and the website. My background has been in business management and sales. Over the past 20 years, I've successfully launched, grown, managed and sold several companies. Together, the three of us make a great team.

                                   Visit us @ www.TRAKLINE.com

PRODUCTION DETAILS
Once we complete the IndieGoGo campaign we will immediately commence production on our second order of Trakline belts. Based on the factories estimate, the manufacturing process should take about 40-50 days to complete.  Once the production is completed, we will ship the belts to our office in San Diego, California, and then repackage individual orders and ship out to supporters within about 2 weeks. It's that simple.

THANK YOU !
Thanks in advance for your support and for taking the time to learn about our campaign, we really appreciate it !

Please see the Perks in the right hand column and pass this on to your friends.

Trakline's unique buckles are PATENT PENDING.  'Trakline Belts' is a registered U.S. Trademark.

                                   Visit us @ www.TRAKLINE.com

WHAT THEY SAY - 
"Trakline banished the meager five, 1"-spaced holes of traditional belts from their full-grain leather strips, and replaced them with a secure Trak system boasting 40 sizing positions at 1/4" increments. The result: a perfect fit at my precise waist size, whether it's Liquid Diet Monday or Chicken & Waffles Saturday." - Dude I Want That.com !

"What we love about Trakline belts is that each belt fits to your exact waist size, every time you put it on. So if you are having a fat day, there is no need to punch an extra hole to give you a little more breathing space, just pop on a Trakline belt and fit it to your exact waist size." - ShoppersBase.com

"Never again worry about being between belt holes. Trakline Belts are reinventing the wheel for men’s belts. They fit your exact waist size every time with over 40 positions!" - The Crowdfund Mafia

CHALLENGES
Fortunately, as a team we've been involved in manufacturing and product development for over 20 years and know the pitfalls and snags to watch out for. And we have a successful, existing relationship with the factories involved.

Still, we understand that all this doesn’t completely eliminate all the the challenges and obstacles going forward.

In our case, timing is the biggest obstacle. In the best-case scenario, we will have belts in hand 5-6 weeks after this campaign is over and turn these around in as little as 2 weeks, getting the belts in the mail on time.  If, however, there's a delay of any sort, the worst case scenario is that we could be delayed another 2 weeks (approximate).  Of course, our intent is to get all the orders done ahead of schedule, rather than behind. But in the end >> we want to create the best quality belt possible.

 

                             Thanks for your time and support !

After the campaign visit us at  www.TRAKLINE.com

story:
TAKE ENERGY WITH YOU - WHENEVER, WHEREVER

FlameStower is a small, portable power source that captures the energy from open flame - campfires to cookstoves- and converts it direct into electricity. Outlets?! We don't need no stinking outlets! Just bring a FlameStower - one end in the fire, some water in the can - and within a minute you're charging your cell phones, GPS, AA and AAA batteries, whatever you need to keep your adventure charged! 

FlameStower keeps all of us online when we're off-grid:

  • outdoor adventurers who want a light-weight, easy to use, durable power supply
  • professionals requiring reliability over all else, NO FRAGILE PARTS, an ideal solution where IT lasts mere hours
  • communities in the developing world where cell phone use is increasing way ahead of affordable electricity.

The low power demands of modern devices change the way we think about energy: one of the most powerful tools the world has known – a cellphone allowing instant communication and limitless knowledge – now fits in your pocket and needs only five volts to keep going.

We're making ways to keep people connected and simultaneously ease the demand for power grids throughout the world, encouraging energy efficiency from everyday activities and giving all people the power of electricity, any time, anywhere. 

______________________________________________________________

CALLING ALL TRENDSETTERS - GET YOUR FLAMESTOWER T-SHIRTS THIS WEEKEND ONLY!!


A lot of people have been asking us -"Hey, I dont camp, but I dont wanna just give you $." Well, for this weekend only we're offering our incredibly gorgeous FlameStower t-shirts! Designed by an international team of fashion experts (us and a t-shirt company), you can now walk the streets in distributed energy style. 

 Can YOU tell the model from the founder? Neither can we!

$30 and you too can look like these two studs!

______________________________________________________________

WE NEED YOUR HELP

With your purchases and support today we will make the big push to extreme affordability that'll help make energy a reality for all In return, you get a great product to keep your devices running during your outdoor adventures!

Our goal is to sell 300 units in the next 30 days

Our hope is to sell and deliver thousands more to people around the world!

______________________________________________________________

A Simple, Affordable Design!

FlameStower has moved fast through prototyping, engineering, and product design, and we're near ready to deliver first generation chargers.  Key advantages of our device include:

  • a lightweight, easy to use, patent pending design that collapses into the size of a digital camera 
  • flexibility in our heat source – FlameStower works with any open flame
  • thermal management to allow fast warm-up times and long charge duration
  • simple circuitry that changes low, variable voltages to 5 V in a USB port.

FlameStower has a smooth, modern form that collapses down to a beautiful, hardwearing package.  It's portable, durable, and functional- with no extra frills.  We strive to create the simplest, most direct path to extreme affordability for everyone.

______________________________________________________________

Charging the World~ Because We Should

When we introduce people to FlameStower, we usually ask three questions: 

  • Do you have a cell phone? Yes. 
  • What would happen if your battery died? I’d cry.
  • When do you charge your cell phone? At night. 

When they see our device in operation, they usually ask a question of us: why in the world hasn’t anyone done this before? 

For a lot of us, the need for FlameStower isn't great - nothing is easier than plugging into the wall to get our energy. But the grid isn't everywhere.

EMERGENCY USE- How many times has your phone died and you have no means of charging it?  We aren't talking about lighting up a campfire in the street when you need to text someone, but think about people who break down on the side of the road and need to call for help.  The campers who get lost and need a GPS.  What a relief to have a dependable portable charger with an energy source that can be created anywhere!

BUSINESS OFF-GRID- Many people work in remote areas- but they still report back to places where up-to-the-second technology is expected.  Peace Corps, Army, Navy, Greenpeace, forest rangers, the list goes on and on.  Having the FlameStower would allow these people to stay connected, no matter where they are!

GLOBAL AID- Right now, there are over 700 million cell phones in Africa alone, double the amount in the United States, and only 40% of the people have access to electricity.  There is an enormous gap limiting access to global knowledge and spurring the demand for fast, cheap energy. By tapping into the one universal household energy, cooking dinner, FlameStower provides electricity to charge a cell phone, no grid required. Imagine the possibilities!

______________________________________________________________

MEET THE TEAM

FlameStower was founded out of Stanford's d.school in April 2012 and has grown to include:

Andrew Byrnes - a Stanford materials science grad student, old man Byrnes returned to school after teaching, adventuring, writing novels, rolling sushi, and developing utility-scale wind and solar projects. Andrew is dedicated to cleantech and changing the way people relate to energy, and once yelled at Tom Cruise for illegal parking. DONATE TODAY!!

Adam Kell - another matsci grad student, Adam developed novel Si fabrication processes with an area PV manufacturer while going to school and cycling the Santa Cruz Mountains.  Previous employment includes sustainable urban farming and selling motorcycles.

Mark Duarte - Mark and Andy both come from beautifully-weird Tucson, AZ. A mechanical engineer at Stanford, Mark is a design genius who isn't afraid to push the limits of personal energy design or stake his devotion to Toby Keith.

Matt Claussen - our fearless electric engineer, Matt's first day was spent trying to sell FlameStowers to a room full of VCs when all we had was a non-functional, highly dangerous chunk of hot aluminum. Got married last year to his wife Cristina; he knows the honeymoon is over because she's stopped laughing at his jokes

________________________________________________________________________

Finally...Some Details

Since our launch we've worked through a great number of engineering and design challenges. FlameStower works, but for a first generation product we feel it's important to give you some details about what you're buying and some of the experiences we've had. 

WILL IT CHARGE MY PHONE?

YES! We've charged iPhones, iPods, Nokias, Samsungs, LGs, and run LEDs. We feel confident in FlameStower's ability to charge all devices through a USB connection, however some - specifically the iPhone 3GS and iPod touch - have been finicky. We're working through these issues and hope to have them resolved by the time we send your FlameStower. If you have any questions don't hesitate to contact us and we'll answer your questions. 

HOW FAST DOES IT CHARGE? 

FAST!  Depending on the temperature, between 1 to 2 minutes after being put in contact with the flame, FlameStower puts out a steady 5V USB charge. We're not as fast as charging from an outlet, but we're getting better...maybe with FlameStower 3G.

THIS IS IN THE FIRE...IS IT DANGEROUS?? 

NOT ANY MORE DANGEROUS THAN A FRYING PAN.  Parts of the device get very hot during operation - thats how we operate - but our design lets you place it then leave it while your mobile devices charge a safe distance away. After the fire's out, let your FlameStower sit for a few minutes and you are good to go!

________________________________________________________________________

HOW CAN I HELP?

DONATE TODAY!!! - We need more funding to help make our product more streamlined and affordable. This is what crowd funding is all about- if everyone gives a few dollars, our dreams become a reality.  Any and every dollar counts!  

SPREAD THE WORD!!! - tell your friends, Like us on Facebook and follow our Twitter, or send out an email blast with a link to this page.  We are confident that our product will speak for itself, we just need a LOT of people to listen!

BUY A FLAMESTOWER AND USE IT! - Actions speak way louder than words.  If you are going camping with friends, or taking a long road trip into an off-the-grid area- bring a FlameStower!  If your car breaks down or you get lost in the mountains- how rad will you look when everyone needs a GPS or someone needs to call AAA and you have the only means to charge your phone?!

What would happen if your battery died? I’d cry.

When do you charge your cell phone? At night. 

When they see our device in operation, they usually ask a question of us: why in the world hasn’t anyone done this before? 
For a lot of us, the need for FlameStower isn't great - nothing is easier than plugging into the wall to get our energy. But the grid isn't everywhere.
EMERGENCY USE- How many times has your phone died and you have no means of charging it?  We aren't talking about lighting up a campfire in the street when you need to text someone, but think about people who break down on the side of the road and need to call for help.  The campers who get lost and need a GPS.  What a relief to have a dependable portable charger with an energy source that can be created anywhere!
BUSINESS OFF-GRID- Many people work in remote areas- but they still report back to places where up-to-the-second technology is expected.  Peace Corps, Army, Navy, Greenpeace, forest rangers, the list goes on and on.  Having the FlameStower would allow these people to stay connected, no matter where they are!
GLOBAL AID- Right now, there are over 700 million cell phones in Africa alone, double the amount in the United States, and only 40% of the people have access to electricity.  There is an enormous gap limiting access to global knowledge and spurring the demand for fast, cheap energy. By tapping into the one universal household energy, cooking dinner, FlameStower provides electricity to charge a cell phone, no grid required. Imagine the possibilities!
______________________________________________________________
MEET THE TEAM

FlameStower was founded out of Stanford's d.school in April 2012 and has grown to include:
Andrew Byrnes - a Stanford materials science grad student, old man Byrnes returned to school after teaching, adventuring, writing novels, rolling sushi, and developing utility-scale wind and solar projects. Andrew is dedicated to cleantech and changing the way people relate to energy, and once yelled at Tom Cruise for illegal parking. DONATE TODAY!!
Adam Kell - another matsci grad student, Adam developed novel Si fabrication processes with an area PV manufacturer while going to school and cycling the Santa Cruz Mountains.  Previous employment includes sustainable urban farming and selling motorcycles.
Mark Duarte - Mark and Andy both come from beautifully-weird Tucson, AZ. A mechanical engineer at Stanford, Mark is a design genius who isn't afraid to push the limits of personal energy design or stake his devotion to Toby Keith.
Matt Claussen - our fearless electric engineer, Matt's first day was spent trying to sell FlameStowers to a room full of VCs when all we had was a non-functional, highly dangerous chunk of hot aluminum. Got married last year to his wife Cristina; he knows the honeymoon is over because she's stopped laughing at his jokes
________________________________________________________________________
Finally...Some Details
Since our launch we've worked through a great number of engineering and design challenges. FlameStower works, but for a first generation product we feel it's important to give you some details about what you're buying and some of the experiences we've had. 
WILL IT CHARGE MY PHONE?
YES! We've charged iPhones, iPods, Nokias, Samsungs, LGs, and run LEDs. We feel confident in FlameStower's ability to charge all devices through a USB connection, however some - specifically the iPhone 3GS and iPod touch - have been finicky. We're working through these issues and hope to have them resolved by the time we send your FlameStower. If you have any questions don't hesitate to contact us and we'll answer your questions. 
HOW FAST DOES IT CHARGE? 
FAST!  Depending on the temperature, between 1 to 2 minutes after being put in contact with the flame, FlameStower puts out a steady 5V USB charge. We're not as fast as charging from an outlet, but we're getting better...maybe with FlameStower 3G.
THIS IS IN THE FIRE...IS IT DANGEROUS?? 
NOT ANY MORE DANGEROUS THAN A FRYING PAN.  Parts of the device get very hot during operation - thats how we operate - but our design lets you place it then leave it while your mobile devices charge a safe distance away. After the fire's out, let your FlameStower sit for a few minutes and you are good to go!
________________________________________________________________________
HOW CAN I HELP?
DONATE TODAY!!! - We need more funding to help make our product more streamlined and affordable. This is what crowd funding is all about- if everyone gives a few dollars, our dreams become a reality.  Any and every dollar counts!  
SPREAD THE WORD!!! - tell your friends, Like us on Facebook and follow our Twitter, or send out an email blast with a link to this page.  We are confident that our product will speak for itself, we just need a LOT of people to listen!
BUY A FLAMESTOWER AND USE IT! - Actions speak way louder than words.  If you are going camping with friends, or taking a long road trip into an off-the-grid area- bring a FlameStower!  If your car breaks down or you get lost in the mountains- how rad will you look when everyone needs a GPS or someone needs to call AAA and you have the only means to charge your phone?!

story:
You know the old saying, "you shouldn't put all your eggs in one basket".  But now, with Thomas Hobbs, Jr's invention, The Unbreakable Egg Carton and Colorful Bubble Wrap you can!

Design Features

This product is a specially designed packaging enhancement for eggs that incorporates protective bubble wrap within each egg carton.  The cartons themselves would still be fashioned from the commonly used plastic foam or cardboard materials but would feature an increased interior area to accommodate the wrap as well as a convenient closure enhanced with Velcro. Lining each egg crevice as well as the top of the carton, the wrap would be fabricated of the plastic air cellular cushioning material similar to Bubble Wrap.

In addition, as the name of the product implies, the wrap would be offered in a wide variety of colors to further appeal to consumers. Thus packaged, eggs are completely swathed in this cushiony lining, which provides an effective buffer as the eggs make their journey from the farmer to the market.

Advantages & Benefits

The Unbreakable Egg Carton & Colorful Bubble Wrap would provide a simple, cost effective means of protecting fragile eggs during shipment and transport.  Incorporating, soft, cushiony bubble wrap inside egg cartons, this packaging enhancement would handily alleviate the breakage risk that is common with egg distribution.  In this manner, egg manufactures would be able to package and distribute this food in its perfect form.  As a result, consumers would not have to spend valuable time in the grocery store hunting through cartons to find one that is completely filled with undamaged eggs.  Thus, suppliers would not lose money on eggs that are unsellable.

The consumer would also benefit The Unreakable Egg Carton and Colorful Bubble Wrap, as this unique packaging idea would protect eggs up until the time as they are consumed in food preparation.  As such, consumers would be able to purchase eggs in confidence, ensured that the shells will not break even if the carton is dropped onto hard concrete.  Equipped with a Velcro closure, this packaging concept would provide additional security for the eggs stored inside, preventing the top from springing open on impact.

story:
AppFlamingo

Template-based App Making

Today, app making is extremely difficult with the few options available.

You could try to code yourself, but that would take a long time, and not everyone wants to do that.

You could try to outsource to developers, but that usually costs a lot of money. Simple apps cost about $5000 while more complex apps can cost anywhere from $50,000 to $200,000.

Some app making platforms have sprung up to consult these problems and indeed they do. However, we believe they didn't consult all the issues. That's why we made AppFlamingo.

What is it?

AppFlamingo is an online platform (a website) I created with friends in an attempt to make app making as easy as possible, while keeping the costs low.

The site is template-based, meaning that you can choose from a set of template we have made and then populate the templates with whatever is necessary, which depends on the template selected.

We think that the process will take less than 30 minutes with the development console we have made. We've shown the process for one template (fact) in the video.

Again, the site is template-based. Here are the templates we have developed so far for at least one platform.

  • Fact

  • Business

  • Quiz

  • Tower Defense

  • Blog



We don't want to reveal too much before we are ready to launch but the name of each template should make its function clear. If anyone is specifically curious about these templates feel free to contact me and I'll be happy to respond.

Is there a benefit to making apps?

Apps are growing in importance everyday because of growing smartphone usage. There are many reasons to make apps, and we will support as many of these reasons as possible. I've come up with a few reasons below:

Some people make apps as a venture for money. We will give you the option to choose whether or not to implement one of a few ad-networks. You will of course be able to set the price-point on your app.

Other people might find a more miscellaneous use to the apps. With the quiz-template a teacher could make an app for his or her classroom. A business could make use of both the business and blog template. Someone who just wants to make an app might have a very good idea for a tower defense game.

How much money does an app cost?

I've set the price at a one time payment of $45. Cheapest alternatives generally require $50 of recurring payment per month, per app over the year.

story:
The House of Perna is a luxury women's wear brand based in Delray Beach, FL, USA. We produce all garments in the United States and pride ourselves on the quality of our goods. We use couture techniques not used on most Ready-to-Wear clothing, providing you couture finishings at a ready-to-wear price.

Our clothes are made to help you feel confident and comfortable in all situations. They're made for those that like to stand out in a crowd and help you exude your inner beauty.

The House of Perna is made in America, created for you.

As an American fashion brand, showing at Los Angeles Fashion Week is always the goal. We need your help to make it happen.
